Product Offerings
Propulsion Systems
Martinrea is a global leader in propulsion solutions, committed to driving vehicle advancements through innovative engineering and R&D. We provide “cap-less to engine” systems, delivering power and performance.
LEARN MORE
Flexible Manufacturing
Martinrea's flexible manufacturing group provides just-in-time manufacturing and vertical integration expertise to our global customers. Our success as an automotive supplier is matched by our capabilities in complex assemblies for agriculture, medium-duty trucks, and aerospace.
LEARN MORE
Lightweight Structures
To meet the needs of the ever-changing automotive industry, Martinrea provides lightweight solutions to lower emissions, vehicle weight, and fuel consumption. We collaborate with customers, as a true partner to engineer breakthrough technologies.
LEARN MORE
Investor Relations

We are focused on building shareholder value on the principle of prudent, profitable and sustainable growth based on innovation, lean thinking and entrepreneurial spirit. We continue to serve our customers by improving our products and processes, developing and utilizing the talents of our people and making strategic acquisitions.

We Make The Building Blocks of Sustainable Technologies

A
t Neo, we make the building blocks of modern technologies that enhance efficiency and sustainability. Our products help to deliver the technologies of tomorrow to consumers today.

Sustainability is part of the DNA of our Company.  Our advanced industrial materials are critical to technologies that reduce air and water pollution, achieve better fuel economy, increase energy efficiency, and reduce greenhouse gases and other harmful air emissions.

We also work hard to manufacture our products using sustainable practices, such as recycling and feedstock recovery.  This helps us reduce environmental impacts throughout our supply chain.

Sustainable technologies start with Neo Materials.

Neo's Latest Sustainability Report

N
eo’s newest Sustainability Report provides details on the Company’s environmental, social, and governance performance in 2023. The Report expands Neo’s formal reporting process to explain and document Neo’s ongoing efforts to help fast-forward the world’s transition to a more sustainable and less carbon-centric future.

Download a print-ready PDF version here.
A Compelling Growth Story

N
eo Performance Materials Inc. is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol “NEO.” A profitable, dividend-paying company with a strong balance sheet and robust cash-flow generation, Neo is well positioned in markets that are forecast to see robust, long-term growth driven by multiple global macro trends, such as vehicle electrification, industrial automation, consumer electronics, energy-efficient lighting, air and water pollution control, superalloys, and many others.

Learn more about Neo in our latest Investor Presentation.

We Share A Passion for Innovation

N
eo’s more than 1,800 team members at facilities around the globe share a passion for designing, perfecting, and delivering innovative advanced materials to our customers. We love delivering the technologies of tomorrow to consumers today.

We also believe in a larger mission: making products that make a difference in the world. Learn more about our Company in the words of our employees in this video.

Sustainability: What is Good for the Environment is Good for Business

S
ustainability is not a buzzword at Neo. It is part of the DNA of our Company. Our advanced industrial materials are critical to technologies that reduce air and water pollution, achieve better fuel economy, increase energy efficiency, and reduce greenhouse gases and other air emissions. We also work hard to manufacture our products using sustainable practices that reduce environmental impacts throughout our supply chain. See examples of our commitment to sustainability in this video.

A
t Neo, our advanced industrial materials enable a wide array of everyday and emerging technologies. Our materials deliver a range of powerful properties to the products in which they are used, including magnetic, catalytic, luminescent, electrochemical, thermal stability, and superconductive. BLOG: THE CHALLENGES OF METAL MANAGEMENT

While closed-loop metal management presents numerous environmental and economic benefits, it is not without challenges. One of the main hurdles involves sorting metals, which encompass a wide range of materials from household waste, industrial scrap, and end-of-life products. The diverse nature of these sources means metals often intermingle with other materials, such as plastics, glass, or different grades of metals, requiring further processing to maintain the quality of the recycled metal. Velan. Quality that lasts.

Velan is a leader in industrial valves with expertise in demanding applications from severe service to clean energy. We excel in critical markets such as nuclear energy where our proprietary valve solutions and extensive installed-base set us apart.

Renowned for safety, reliability, and performance, our high-quality valves support global energy transition, embodying innovation and excellence across industries.

Get in Touch
Velan Announces Major Strategic Initiatives

We are pleased to announce the divestiture of our asbestos-related liabilities and the sale of our French subsidiaries. These strategic initiatives will reduce risk, while strengthening our financial position and enhancing our standing as a leader in the industrial valve industry.

History

Velan’s commitment to cutting-edge innovation has been second to none since day one. Starting as a single-product manufacturer in 1950, we now proudly offer one of the most comprehensive industrial valve product lines on the market.

REBAR FABRICATION AND INSTALLATION

SERVICES & PRODUCTS
LOCATIONS
CAPACITY

As the largest rebar fabricator in North America, Nucor has the capacity to fabricate and deliver over one million tons of rebar each year. Our teams provide experience, collaboration and customized execution for projects of all sizes.

PARTNERSHIP

With our proactive planning, efficient customization and commitment to accuracy, your project is in trustworthy hands.

EXPERIENCE

The Nucor Rebar fabrication team is highly experienced in the construction industry, with a focus on excellence through safety, accuracy and on-time delivery. Our in-house teams provide dedicated on-site support, project management and logistics.

REBAR PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Our full-service approach ensures that we meet the unique specifications of your project. The Nucor team will collaborate, customize and implement your plans through every step of the process.

REBAR DETAILING AND FABRICATION SERVICES

EXPERTISE FROM PROJECT INITIATION TO DELIVERY

Rebar fabrication is more than just the cutting and bending of reinforcing steel; it starts with specialized planning and project management to ensure effective delivery. During the design phase, our rebar fabricators work with you to determine the ideal plan of action that can reduce overall costs and improve outcomes, no matter how complicated your requirements.

REBAR PLANNING PHASE

Project scheduling
Review drawings and communicating with project engineers as needed
Identifying constructability issues

REBAR PREPARATION PHASE

Detailing rebar for efficient installation
Creating placing drawings and fabrication production order
Scheduling the fabrication and delivery as required to meet the concrete pour schedule

REBAR INSTALLATION SERVICES

Our team provides dedicated support and communication between the project coordinator, the fabrication team and the construction manager on your job site to stay on schedule.

Nucor’s rebar installation team acts as an extension of your construction team to ensure safety and efficiency from project coordination through final delivery.

REINFORCING PRODUCTS

REBAR PRODUCTS

Fabricated rebar
Corrosion-resistant rebar
Epoxy coated rebar
Galvanized rebar
Welded wire mesh
Anchor bolts
Stud rails and concrete embedded materials
Other specialty items

REBAR CUSTOMIZATION

Rebar cages (Available in diameters 200–1500mm)
Threaded bar
Rebar couplers
NUCOR REBAR LOCATIONS

Each of our 70+ Nucor Rebar Fabrication locations offer full-service solutions from estimating to rebar installation.
View our full list of Nucor Rebar Fabrication locations below.

Brose stellt sich neu auf

Die Brose Gruppe wird aufgrund der aktuellen Abrufzahlen die gesteckten Ziele auch in diesem Jahr nicht erreichen. Der Umsatz liegt in der Vorschau mit 7,7 Milliarden Euro um 7 Prozent unter Plan und 3 Prozent unter dem Vorjahr. Die fehlende Auslastung der Produktion und steigende Kosten belasten das Ergebnis. Das Unternehmen erwartet für das Geschäftsjahr 2024 einen Verlust von rund 53 Millionen Euro.

Zur Presseinformation 

Brose würdigt Lieferanten mit den Supplier Awards 2024

Auch dieses Jahr verlieh Brose die Supplier Awards, um die hervorragende Zusammenarbeit zwischen dem Automobilzulieferer und seinen Lieferanten zu würdigen. In den Bereichen Innovation, Qualität und Nachhaltigkeit wurden diesmal insgesamt vier Lieferanten für ihr Engagement und exzellente Leistungen ausgezeichnet.

Zur Presseinformation 

Änderung der Leitungsstruktur in der Brose SE

Die Gesellschafter des internationalen Automobilzulieferers Brose haben am 02. Oktober 2024 die dualistische Variante der Brose SE in die monistische umgewandelt. Die Gesellschafter haben Stefan Krug neben seinen Aufgaben als Geschäftsführender Direktor Produktion mit der Gesamtleitung des Unternehmens beauftragt.

Zur Presseinformation 

Technologietag 2024 schafft Raum für Innovationen

Wie lassen sich neue Ideen hervorbringen? Mit einem intensiven Austausch zwischen unseren internen Experten und externen Partnern. Aus diesem Grund veranstalten wir regelmäßig unseren Technologietag, bei dem sich unser Standort Bamberg in ein spannendes Messegelände verwandelt.

Weiterlesen 

Virtual Reality in der Produktentwicklung spart Zeit, Kosten und Ressourcen

Regelmäßig taucht der Produktentwickler Eike Fröhlich in eine virtuelle Welt ein und analysiert Prototypen an einem Fahrzeugmodell. Dabei simuliert er beispielsweise verschiedene Varianten von Türbedienungen oder identifiziert mögliche Verbesserungen.

Weiterlesen 

Brose stories

Industrie und Wissenschaft: Zusammenarbeit fördert Innovationen und Fortschritt

Weltweit arbeitet unser Familienunternehmen mit regionalen Hochschulen zusammen. Der Austausch mit jungen Menschen ist Teil unseres Verständnisses von Innovation und Fortschritt. Denn wir profitieren von Forschungsergebnissen und wissenschaftlicher Expertise. Im Gegenzug dafür, geben wir Einblicke in den Praxisalltag und die Herausforderungen eines global agierenden Industrieunternehmens.

Mehr dazu hier 

Mehr als ein Job

Wir bieten Ihnen Einstiegsmöglichkeiten nach Maß und individuelle berufliche Perspektiven.

About

Since 1965, we’ve worked hand-in-hand with our clients from all over the world to expertly and safely build, manufacture, and provide the tools, materials, and infrastructure needed to make projects come to life. Specializing in the industrial sector, we proudly serve clients in Power Generation, Oil & Gas, Nuclear, Pulp & Paper, and Mining industries.
Construction

Industrial construction projects are made simple with our processes specifically developed to make the client experience a positive one.

Maintenance

Your maintenance and turnaround needs are taken care of seamlessly with our team of professionals who specialize in the industrial sector.

Manufacturing

Our state-of-the-art fabrication, blast and paint shops offer full support for construction, as well as a turn-key solution for stand-alone clients.

Portable Wheelchair Lifts
Wheelchair Lifts for Trains
Engineering Services

Welcome to the official web page of Adaptive Engineering Inc. We are a professional engineering firm that designs, manufactures, and sells equipment to allow people with disabilities to get around easily, safely, and with dignity.

Adaptive Engineering Inc. is a leading manufacturer of mobile wheelchair lifts for providing temporary access to homes, schools, colleges, churches, stages, historic sites, and other locations. The best part about our units is that they usually work without any modifications to the building – you just roll them into place and go! If you would like to find out more about the simplest way to provide temporary wheelchair access to homes and commercial buildings please check here: Mobilift CX.

We also manufacture and sell the Mobilift TX, the #1 station-based wheelchair lift for railways in the USA and Canada. Our train customers include the biggest names in the passenger rail industry like Amtrak, VIA Rail, MBTA and Caltrain. We our proud of our +30-year history of providing accessibility solutions to the transportation industry.

The Mobilift VX is the ideal lift for providing wheelchair access to ships, boats, ferries and other vessels. Adapted for the marine environment with a non-corrodible finish and an all-weather rating, the Mobilift VX is the perfect accessibility solution for landings, docks, piers, and marinas. The manual power system saves the cost of running electrical services your dock and the provides unsurpassed reliability. To find out more about this ADA compliant lift, see our Mobilift VX page.

Mobilift Playlist

Mobilifts are a great solution when you need a mobile vertical platform lift (VLP). But what about when the best solution is an inclined platform lift (IPL). If this is what you need, then check out the Lift2Go, developed by our sister company Adaptive Concepts Ltd.

In addition to manufacturing and distributing our wheelchair lift products, Adaptive Engineering’s talented design group is always looking for new products to serve our customers. Please contact us if you have an accessibility problem that needs a great solution!

Testimonials
Mobilift Solves Temporary Access Problem for School

“The Mobilift manual wheelchair lift is exactly what we needed. It is easy to use and move around, yet once the mechanism is set in place, it is solid and stationary. We have been pleased in using it to get our wheelchair students onto the stage in our auditorium. When we do not use it, we wheel it into a corner where it is out of the way. I would recommend this unit for other schools.”

Principal, J.L. Bernstein School

Accessing Historic Buildings is Easy with the Mobilift – No Power Required!

“Our University has many historical buildings which were not designed or entry by the disabled. The lift is very mobile, easy to position, easy to operate and flexible. Operators need minimum training and the device is low in maintenance time and cost. We have used the lift in garden areas where electrical sources are non-existent.”

Project Manager, University of Virginia

Mobilift and Adaptive Engineering Inc Standout in Streetcar Access Application

“The Nelson Electric Tramway Society, operators of a historic 110-year old Streetcar, have contracted Adaptive Engineering to supply 2 fully operational Mobilifts for use in Nelson. These lifts allow our Society to accommodate a segment of our Society with mobility issues. I would not hesitate to recommend their services and products to other organizations needing their expertise.”

Secretary/Treasurer, Nelson Electric Tramway Society.

Adaptive Engineering Inc Provides World-Class Wheelchair Access to Passenger Rail Service

“Adaptive Engineering has provided Rocky Mountaineer with products that enable us to seamlessly board our mobility challenged guests onto our train. As a world-class luxury travel provider, we have a reputation to maintain in terms of quality, customer service and safety, all of which we get when working with Adaptive Engineering and utilizing the Mobilift TX product.”

Manager, Procurement and Facilities, Rocky Mountaineer

Our design process focuses on early-stage collaboration to provide detailed technical guidance and to support product development every step of the way.

Explore Design 

Extrude

Operating multiple presses with plants in both Canada and the US, we deliver the highest quality extrusion solutions with the industry's shortest lead times.

Explore Extrusion 

Fabricate

Our extensive fabriation capabilities let us meet any manufacturing challenge, using the right process to provide complete solutions.

Explore Fabrication 

Finish

A variety of established finishing capabilities ensure your product is brought to life with the exact look and feel you require.

Explore Finishing 

Tight Tolerances

Our specialty is tight tolerances. Using state of the art equipment, ALMAG thrives on meeting challenging Customer requirements and ensuring quality products in extrusion, fabrication and finishing.

Innovative Design​

At ALMAG we are not afraid of complex designs and pushing industry limits. This allows our Customers the freedom to design innovative products that separate themselves from their competition.

Inspired Solutions

Gaining an understanding of our Customers and their product’s form, fit and function, we use our experience to create inspired solutions. This approach allows us to build the opportunity for creative ideas to be Made possible.

Tight Timelines

ALMAG provides some of the most competitive timelines in the industry. With new tooling available in 10 business days, this gives our Customers a competitive advantage, allowing them to provide the best possible service to their Customers.

Sometimes it takes a little inspiration to get started!

ALMAG’s interactive Inspire tool showcases numerous design elements and fabrication and finishing processes that can be used in a variety of applications, so that you leave nothing unexplored.

Get started with our interactive Inspire tool here.

Get to know ALMAG

Meet some of the people and processes that make us industry-leaders.

ALMAG is looking for people to join our team and make things possible

We are currently hiring for a variety of positions in a wide range of our departments. If you want to work for a one of Canada’s Best Managed Companies and be a part of a community that values exploration, creativity, and professional growth, we’d love to hear from you!

Careers

FEATURED PROJECTS
FENCING AT SAPUTO STADIUM ELITE DOUBLE WIRE

A beautiful and high-quality fence is essential at a stadium to create a pleasant and safe environment for the public. It defines the perimeter, ensures crowd control, and improves the aesthetics and overall experience. Omega II Fence Systems® added elegance to the Saputo Stadium.
The site's Landscape Architects specified the well-designed Elite Double Wire fence system to ensure a safe environment for the public. Despite the challenges of a tight time frame, Omega II worked closely with the contractors to complete the project on schedule. Our dedication and solution-based team enable us to add value to a project like this one and make the design a successful reality.

Through our family of exceptional people and enduring brands, Masco Canada delivers innovative water solutions to the building and home improvement markets in Canada. We have been inspiring Canadian homes, communities, and lives for more than 100 years. Over that time, our business has stayed grounded in strong values and truly committed people, seeking the best for themselves, our customers, and our communities.

Strive for a better world

Diversity, Equity and Inclusion is a core enabler to achieving our collective purpose of delivering better living possibilities for all. We aspire to be a company where everyone feels respected and that they belong, and where everyone has the access and opportunity to achieve their full potential. Masco Canada is building a culture where everyone is respected, heard and valued. When we’re all heard, we’re all exposed to diverse ideas that can change perspectives, spark imaginations and fuel innovation.

Discover the power of manufacturing excellence at Steelhaus Technologies. Our unwavering dedication to excellence, innovation, and digital integration ensures that we deliver superior solutions for even the most challenging markets in the world.

LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR MANUFACTURING FACILITIES
Our industry-leading capabilities are driven by a large manufacturing footprint across six state-of-the-art centers, encompassing over 450,000 square feet. With a wide range of equipment, including over 100 CNC machines, lathes, and mills, we have the capacity to bring your ideas to life.

6 MANUFACTURING LOCATIONS.

FUEL OUR INNOVATION.
V0 20,000 PSI @ 850 DEG F​
Testing is a cornerstone of our commitment to quality. Our in-house facility sets the standard by combining engineering, prototyping, and testing under one roof. Our team of experienced engineers is dedicated to developing and supporting industry-leading technologies and excel in designing completions, multistage, thermal, flow, sand control, and geothermal technologies. To ensure rapid prototyping and efficient testing, we have a dedicated machining and testing facility with four test bays and capabilities of handling pressures up to 20,000 PSI at 850 degrees Fahrenheit.

Revolutionize Your Workflow

Long lead times stifle projects. They let your focus and momentum drift away. Latencies complicate production runs and encourage inventory buildup. But it doesn’t have to be this way.

At Protocase, we’ve developed a unique mass custom manufacturing process that’s ultra-fast, flexible and easy.

Get custom enclosures and parts in 2-3 days, with no minimum order. Revolutionize your workflow and simplify your part sourcing with the world’s fastest custom manufacturer.

HOW TO WORK WITH US

SEND YOUR CAD DESIGN

Get Started »

Starting from a CAD drawing is the quickest and easiest way for experienced CAD users to specify custom parts.

 

USE OUR DESIGN SERVICES

 Find Out How »

Too busy or don't have the CAD software? Take advantage of our design services. We can start from a sketch, a description or components.

 

USE OUR FREE CAD SOFTWARE

Download Now »

Protocase Designer is the fastest way to design parts, panels and enclosures, and features instant quoting and ordering. No prior experience required.

 

START WITH A FREE CAD TEMPLATE

Create a Template »

Once you have a design in hand, this is an efficient option to get a price quote quickly and easily.

SUPPLIER OF CHOICE FOR OVER 16,000 ENGINEERS & DESIGNERS

Here's why we're the supplier of choice for over 16,000 engineers who work for organizations that range from one-person firms to the largest and most prestigious companies, universities and research institutes.

One-Stop Shopping

We supply fully finished enclosures in your choice of steel, aluminum, stainless, or galvanneal, including cutouts, powder coat, silkscreen, fasteners, and hardware, all in one easy stop, to save you time.

Built in 2-3 Days *

We offer unheard-of manufacturing speed. This lets you complete your electronics before you finalize your enclosure design, greatly reducing painful and time-consuming rework.

No minimum orders

We're here to help our customers get their jobs done, so we'll give your order the same priority and respect, whether it's a single enclosure for a one-off project, or a production run of thousands.

Quality Service

Protocase's sales and technical staff are here to serve you and help you make your project a success. We encourage our customers to communicate directly with our expert designers, and if you're either too busy or lack the resources, we can even design your enclosure for you.

Advanced Design Tools

Protocase has developed advanced tools that make it faster and easier to design enclosures. Protocase Designer® free 3-D CAD is the fastest and easiest way to design custom rackmounts, U-shapes, L-shapes, and front panels, and offers real time price quotations and online ordering.

*"Built in 2-3 days" assumes the usage of in-stock materials. Premium or 3rd-party capabilities, as well as higher volumes, will extend the lead time. For full details, please view our Terms & Conditions.

Since 1985, Bri-Chem has established itself as a North American industry leader for the distribution and blending of oilfield drilling, completion, stimulation, and production chemical fluids. Investor Relations
Bri-Chem. An Independent Chemical Distribution, Bagging, and Blending Company

Bri-Chem provides national infrastructure together with technical expertise to ensure a seamless drilling fluid supply process. For over 30 years, we have combined strategic drilling fluid supplier relationships with expert logistics, making us the premier supplier of drilling fluid chemicals, cementing and stimulation products, liquid and dry toll blending and bagging to the North American oil and gas industry.

Ready to invest in us? Get in touch today.

With a price range that’s a fraction of the cost of a full sized passenger elevator, the Elvoron LU/LA is the top choice for low rise, commercial projects.

Inclined Platform Lifts

The Artira is an inclined platform lift designed to carry passengers up and down straight or curving stairways, over flat landings or over spiral staircases.

Seat Lift

With this custom stairlift, you can move efforlessly and safely on curved, spiral staircases and even in condominiums with several flights.

CMP Advanced Mechanical Solutions
Committed to upholding the highest standards in Contract Manufacturing
We know what your products mean to you and your customers
Technology
Since installing its first CNC turret press over 30 years ago, CMP has been committed to using the most advanced manufacturing technology in the industry. Today, best-in-class laser fabricators, press brakes and machining centers allow us to tackle our clients most demanding production challenges. Our commitment to Industry 4.0 means our staff use the latest productivity, quality management and training tools; providing our clients with rapid response times and superior quality products.
Electro-Mechanical Expertise
CMP serves a large range of customers across the spectrum of high-tech industries. Our exposure to the different requirements of these markets, combined with our commitment to vertical integration and robust supply chain practices, allows us to produce a wide variety of complex assemblies. Through collaborative efforts to identify opportunities for more advanced integration, we can reduce the management burden on operations and procurement and allow our clients to focus on core activities.
Innovation
CMPs engineering, quality and project management teams are committed to creating a positive client experience at every stage of our engagement. From prototype through pre-production and into volume manufacturing, we are constantly looking for ways to improve. Our operations and design teams work together with clients to leverage our experience and technology to propose innovative solutions for complex challenges.

Renewable natural gas.
Decarbonization in the fast lane.

Renewable natural gas (RNG) is a transportation fuel made from organic waste. It can drastically reduce carbon emissions by over 300% versus diesel, and at a fraction of the price. Unlike conventional natural gas, renewable natural gas is not a fossil fuel and does not involve drilling or fracking.

Clean Energy is the largest provider of renewable natural gas for the transportation industry in North America. We produce RNG at dairy farms nationwide and then distribute it through our extensive network of 600+ fueling stations, ensuring convenient access for the 50,000 heavy-duty trucks, buses, and large vehicles running on RNG daily.

Learn More
Sustainability
without sacrifice.

The new Cummins X15N natural gas engine is a game changer for heavy-duty trucking. We can now combine the powerful carbon reduction benefits of RNG with the performance needed for long-haul applications.

Power ratings up to 500hp, torque up to 1850 lb-ft, and 700+ mile range
Nationwide network of fast-fill RNG fueling stations for tractor-trailers
Meets stringent EPA and CARB regulations in 2024 and 2027

Patriot Forge also undergoes annual validation by various customers and organizations to these and numerous other international, industry and customer-specific requirements.

For more than 100 years, John Crane has equipped global process industries to meet mission-critical challenges. Our customers depend on John Crane to ensure their operations run efficiently and effectively. We deliver on that promise with technologies that maximize reliability, innovations that improve efficiency and services that enable a proven rapid response.
As pioneers of progress, we are committed to leveraging our legacy of technology leadership, innovative solutions and service excellence to help customers achieve their net-zero ambitions. We’re fully committed to supporting global efforts that address climate change and are taking concrete steps to reach net carbon neutrality by 2050. Building a sustainable future, today.

Products
View all products
Mechanical Seals

The scope of our mechanical seal product range far exceeds any other seal manufacturer. From small elastomer bellows seals used in millions of domestic water pumps to double mechanical seals that ensure maximum sealing safety and large, highly customized dry-running gas seals for mission critical high speed turbo compressors, John Crane has the right product for any application.

Learn more
Seal Support Systems

The right seal support system is critical to promoting seal reliability and overall energy efficiency. John Crane customizes support systems to meet a variety of seal specifications, contributing to safe, cost-effective, reliable operations that reduce harmful environmental effects. Our support systems comply with constantly changing design codes and standards, equipping end users to meet increasingly stringent demands.

Learn more
Seal Face Technologies

Our comprehensive suite of seal face technologies are designed to overcome rigorous sealing challenges, including limited seal face lubrication and severe-service duties that adversely affect reliability, operational costs and seal life. Designed by our engineering experts, John Crane’s face treatment options help your equipment power through low-lubricity and dry-running conditions by using advanced micromachined patterns and features to improve seal face lubrication to optimize the performance of rotating equipment in all process industries. Available for different seal types, dependent on the unique challenges faced by the application, John Crane delivers the right face technology for the right application.

Learn more
Power Transmission Couplings

For more than 50 years, John Crane’s flexible couplings have helped rotating equipment operate at optimum levels and with maximum availability. As a result, John Crane’s couplings have become the first choice of many of the world’s leading companies. Our policy of continuous innovation and product development ensures that we satisfy the changing demands of the market while fully complying with all relevant industry standards.

Learn more
Filtration

Ensuring optimal performance in your energy and industrial processes requires expert filtration solutions. As your partner, John Crane is committed to helping you achieve operational excellence. Our expertise in gas, liquid and polymer filtration is not just about providing solutions; it’s about delivering a promise of substantial operational savings. Leveraging our legacy of technology leadership, our experts are dedicated to tailoring filtration solutions that align seamlessly with your specific needs.

Learn more
Packing

Do you want to minimize leakage from your pumps in an effective manner? Operators and maintenance managers face this costly challenge on a daily basis. John Crane offers a wide selection of compression packing, automatic packing, floating packing and injectable packing materials. Learn more about our packing, which is equipped to handle the vast majority of sealing solutions across nearly all applications.

Learn more
Services

We serve our customers through a combination of technical expertise and quick response times, supporting mission-critical operations across various process industries.

Careers
Industries
Founded more than 100 years ago, John Crane has a long legacy of solving mission-critical energy and process industry challenges. Our world-changing products, solutions and services equip operations to navigate the new energy landscape without sacrificing the safety and reliability that earned John Crane its good name.
Contact our team
Oil and Gas

Reliability, safety and sustainability are all essential in oil and gas applications. John Crane offers a wide range of innovative services and applied engineering solutions to help highly regulated, mission-critical operations embrace the energy transition while achieving their operational goals.

Learn more
Power Generation

John Crane’s depth and breadth of applied engineering expertise, product innovation and reliability services help plants of all types increase uptime, reduce emissions and improve efficiency in the new-energy era.

Learn more
Chemical

With a wide range of complex equipment, the chemical industry faces key operational challenges — and it trusts John Crane to solve them. Our 200 global rapid-response facilities ensure that chemical industry customers are never far from service, repair or support.

Learn more
Pharmaceutical

From clean-in-place components to batch documentation and certification of material integrity, John Crane provides pharmaceutical processing companies with the engineered components and services they need to stay ahead in a rapidly-changing industrial landscape.

Learn more
Polymers

Polymerisation is the first basic step in plastics production. John Crane’s products, services and solutions help extend the life of polymer applications and increase production by limiting unplanned downtime, enhancing efficiency and identifying other key process improvements.

Learn more
Mining and Minerals

With decades of experience serving the mining and minerals industries, John Crane understands the critical nature of maximizing equipment reliability, emissions reduction and performance in harsh environments.

Learn more
Food and Beverage

To achieve optimal efficiency while meeting stringent health and safety standards, food and beverage industry plants and manufacturers must maintain a complicated balancing act. John Crane makes this manageable by engineering reliable, specialized components that improve productivity, enhance efficiency and eliminate contamination.

Learn more
Pulp and Paper Processing

To achieve optimal efficiency while meeting stringent health and safety standards, food and beverage industry plants and manufacturers must maintain a complicated balancing act. John Crane makes this manageable by engineering reliable, specialized components that improve productivity, enhance efficiency and eliminate contamination.

Learn more
Refrigeration Compression

From oil refineries to petrochemical plants, many mission-critical operations require refrigeration for temperature-specific processes. Trust John Crane to ensure every compressor seal and coupling maintains optimal performance and reliability.

Learn more
Wastewater and Clean Water Management

Characterized by high volumes and abrasiveness, wastewater and clean water management poses significant challenges for supporting equipment design. Our cost-effective solutions reduce energy consumption and increase the efficiency of equipment used in all types of clean water and wastewater applications, from filtration to chlorination.

Learn more

Quality You Can Feel.Confidence You Can Hold.
mini-ball™ Valves

dahl pioneered the ¼-turn mini-ball™ valve supply stop for North America in 1984. We’ve continued that tradition of innovation over the past 40 years, introducing products like female compression connections that work with existing stops or fittings. Our modular mini-ball™ design was developed by our in-house engineers, but every product we build is guided and perfected by feedback from plumbers in the field.

See All mini-ball™ Valves
BETTER MATERIALS.
BETTER VALVES.
FOR BETTER THAN 70 YEARS.
Plumbing Jobs Done Right

dahl valves and fittings are built for professional plumbers who care about delivering top quality to their customers. Find the right components to tackle your toughest jobs with ease—skirted toilet installs, retrofit supply stops, appliances, and more.

See All Applications
Where to Buy

Guaranteed for life (really)

All of our mini-ball™ valves, fittings, and globe stops are guaranteed for the life of the installation, even if the property is transferred or sold.

When we say our valves are premium, we mean it.

Learn More

Our belief system has always been a very simple approach: do a good job, provide quality service, and install quality materials. The successes we’ve experienced are due in no small part to the products we install. Dahl is not just a quality product, but like us, an organization that stands behind what they do.

Shane R Letts, Letts Plumbing, Concord California

“The quality of dahl valves gives us peace of mind.  We’ve never seen one fail.  They’re competitively priced… for my money the best value in the plumbing business. We can’t switch from dahl, because our techs would freak out if we tried to make them use anything else.”

Devin Carel, Anderson Plumbing, Heating & Air, San Diego, CA

“To me, dahl valves are perfect… priced right, easy to work with, and they never leak.  Their 3-way Universal Tee is awesome, particularly under a kitchen sink.  dahl makes my job easier, every day.”

Tim Paris, Paris Plumbing, Seattle, WA

“The quality of a plumbing fixture is really only as good as the valves behind it.  When I discovered dahl, I knew I’d found a product line with quality that’s equal to any other install.  dahl valves are solid, easy to work with and covered by a LifeTime Warranty.  Who else can say that?”

Roger Peugeot, Roger the Plumber, Overland Park, KS

“To keep our journeymen happy, it’s dahl or nothing!  They’re a little spoiled, because dahl valves are so easy to work with, and so reliable.  We want our customers to have the very best.  That’s why our trucks start the day loaded with dahl valves.”

Vince Marino and Dawn Kennell, Vince Marino Plumbing, Finksburg, MD

“The most important thing our business has is its reputation.  That’s why we always recommend premium products like dahl valves.  All you need to do is pick up the valve to feel superior quality.  Every dahl valve we install is good for our reputation, and helps our business grow.”

Don Caughlin, My Plumber Heating & Air, Manassas, VA

We’ve used dahl for 10 years because of reliability. If a valve installed out of sight starts leaking, it could be months before it’s noticed. That’s a disaster. dahl quality is so good after 10 years we haven’t seen a leaker. We run 60 trucks, so I figure dahl has saved us thousands of dollars in callbacks we didn’t have to make.  We’ll never switch.

Bill Hawes, San Diego, CA

Have never had any issues with leaks on valve or on valve body at install date or several years later. Also never seem to seize after months of not being used.

Clare Masse, Miller Plumbing and Electric, 14 Main Street, Zurich, Ontario

We work in some of the finest homes in Toronto, and so I don’t play games with quality. It’s dahl or nothing. dahl people are all about solutions – just like us. If I need a special, one of a kind valve, they’ll make it up on the spot and I’ll have it the next day. That’s why I’ve insisted on dahl products for over 40 years.

Mark Altman, M&T Mechanical, North York, Ontario

À propos
de nous

Fondée en 1998, Groupe PRO-B se spécialise dans la conception, la fabrication, l’installation, la maintenance et l’entretien de tuyauterie industrielle, de chaudronnerie et de structures d’acier. Elle offre aussi des services de mécanique de chantier et d’entrepreneur général. Groupe PRO-B a récemment fait l’ajout d’une division institutionnelle offrant les services de mécanique de procédé. Forte de son expertise et de sa renommée, notre entreprise souhaite mettre à la disposition de sa clientèle industrielle et institutionnelle son savoir-faire et son professionnalisme, et ce, peu importe la taille de votre chantier. La satisfaction de nos clients et
l’accompagnement de notre personnel font de notre entreprise un leader dans son domaine. 

Pour tous ses secteurs d’activités, Groupe PRO-B offre un clé en main : conception, ingénierie, fabrication, installation et suivi. Nous fabriquons des produits sur mesure, selon vos exigences. Nous installons partout au Québec et au Canada. Notre expertise est reconnue également à l’international.

Notre engagement

Pour une relation de confiance et un vrai partenariat, faites-nous part de vos projets et nous verrons, ensemble, comment les surpasser!

PRECISION CNC MACHINING & FABRICATION SERVING USA

North America's global supplier of USA CNC Machining services to industry leading OEM’s. ABS Machining established in 1971 has a proven track record of success delivering quality precision machined parts, fabrications and assemblies for the most demanding projects. Our people supported by our scope and breadth of capabilities are committed to providing our valued customers with excellence in all they do. As an ISO 9001:2015 certified company, ABS prides itself on offering personalized service that is backed by a team and plants capable of meeting your requirements.

VIEW MORE

PRODUCTION MACHINING SPECIALISTS TO THE USA

From the inception of all programs, ABS builds a team of program managers and specialists dedicated to the successful management of each project who begin a collaborative review of all Quality, Manufacturing and Engineering requirements. Our in process manufacturing team, tracked with our ERP and Quality Department ensure a total customer satisfaction is achieved. With decades of supplier recognitions, for many critical components, ABS continues to be awarded programs globally, based on an solid commitment to quality, cost and reliability.

CAPABILITIES

ABS: YOUR PROVEN, INTEGRATED MANUFACTURING PARTNER

As markets become increasingly competitive, integration is becoming a necessity for OEMs. ABS is an integrated machine shop which means we offer a complete manufacturing solution. We perform multiple steps along the supply chain including machining, heavy fabrication, welding, and assembly. Integrated manufacturers deliver significant value to OEMs by streamlining the manufacturing timeline, improving the reliability of the final part, and minimizing the number of suppliers involved – improving supply chain efficiency and reducing risks. 

6 STATE OF THE ART PLANTS ...

Within our facilities, which houses over 50 cranes ranging in lift capacity from 5,000 pounds to 160 tons, servicing our massive installation of machine tools; 80 machine tools with some being the largest ever made.

 
Americas
Reshoring Partners
for OEMs
WHY PARTNER WITH ABS?

Not just any manufacturer can create quality heavy fabrications. These projects require specific tools, equipment, and processes as well as personnel with the right skills and expertise to handle such large structures. With over 50 years of proven experience serving a variety of industries, ABS offers OEMs expertise, facilities, and time on tools to safely and successfully perform integrated heavy fabrication projects.

AT ABS - QUALITY DRIVES US

Quality is the key driver at ABS and is an integral part of every process we undertake, and our quality team works hand in hand with our manufacturing and engineering teams to ensure quality is part of every decision we make. We provide OEMs a reliable and dependable process that yields consistent results. Consistent quality is hard work and requires rigorous, on-going monitoring of every process from purchasing to manufacturing to distribution. But the effort and focus on quality is well worth the reward. Our robust quality control and quality assurance programs ensure uniform, high-quality parts, and are one of the reasons ABS stands out from the competition.

AMERICAS RESHORING PARTNER FOR OEMS

To strengthen their supply chain while maintaining quality, many OEMs are relocating manufacturing closer to home – a process known as reshoring. Reshoring is the opposite of offshoring; and is simply bringing manufacturing back from overseas. Reshoring is a much more competitive and attractive option when Total Cost of Ownership and Brand Reputation are considered. Reshoring with a trusted manufacturing partner like ABS delivers superior quality, streamlined logistics, less inventory on water, and excellent proximity to U.S. and Canada to maintain more control over the supply chain.

CONTINUOUS INVESTMENT IN TECHNOLOGIES, FACILITIES, AND PEOPLE

At ABS, we know that we must invest in the future with state-of-the-art technologies in order to continue offering OEMs cutting-edge machining solutions. The culture of ABS drives continuous investment, and we are known for our capital investment initiatives to provide customers with the most advanced facilities and technologies. ABS invests regardless of economic cycles, and we also upgrade our existing capital to ensure all assets are leading edge in the industry. Our investments are not limited to equipment and software programs: we also continuously invest in and expand support staff roles such as, Safety, Quality, Engineering, and Production Control in order to better serve our clients.

AdvanTec Marine is the parent brand to Diamond Sea Glaze, Freeman Marine, Pacific Coast Marine, Steelhead Marine, and USA Sliding Doors. Our brands specialize in the design, engineering, and manufacturing of specialty application marine closures. We are one of the largest marine manufacturers in the world. We have geographic locations in the US and Canada, and ship to over 50 countries worldwide. Our customer base includes North American & International Navies, Governments, Militaries, Commercial Vessel, and Super Yacht Builders. We are a growing team of close to 300 people, and all of our products and solutions are conceived, designed, engineered, and manufactured here in North America.

For over 40 years our brands have collectively been the leader in innovation and creative manufacturing systems. We are committed to delivering solutions to meet customer requirements. We accomplish this using our process of customer consultation, creative and collaborative thinking, innovative design solutions, and world class manufacturing systems. No matter what vessel type, size, or industry, we have the product you need. Our goal is to build, supply and support the finest equipment in the industry.

We offer after sales service, installation, and support for all products sold.

DÉCOUPE LASER, POINÇONNAGE, PLIAGE, SOUDURE OFFERT DANS LE GRAND MONTRÉAL ET PARTOUT AU QUÉBEC
À PROPOS

Fondée en 1935 sous l’appellation de Général Métal Work, notre entreprise a connu une évolution constante et fulgurante sous la nouvelle direction en 1997. Nous avons opté pour les marchés de la nouvelle économie avec des équipements de pointe et des matériaux durables afin de vous assurer un service de gamme. Chez Groupe GMW, notre équipe courtoise vous assure un excellent service à la clientèle et pour répondre à vos attentes. Avec une bonne croissance des affaires et la diversification de nos services, nous vous offrons un service de livraison de qualité. Nous mettons à profit notre savoir-faire pour la réussite de vos projets et nous collaborons avec vous dans le respect mutuel. Nous desservons le Grand Montréal et partout au Québec.

​

Équipe multidisciplinaire

Norme ISO-9001-2015

CWB bureau canadien de soudure

POURQUOI FAIRE AFFAIRE AVEC GROUPE GMW? 

Vous souhaitez effectuer le découpage de vos métaux à Baie-d'Urfé? Groupe GMW est votre partenaire fiable et un allié pour obtenir un travail bien exécuté et fait conformément aux normes. Nous vous proposons un service clé en main, professionnel, concis et efficace. Nos services sont destinés à la clientèle commerciale et nous sommes à l’écoute de nos clients afin de répondre à tous vos besoins. En collaborant avec nous, nous vous assurons un service de livraison de qualité. Contactez-nous par téléphone ou par courriel, pour avoir plus d’informations.

SECTEURS D’ACTIVITÉS

Industriel

ASSOCIATIONS PROFESSIONNELLES

Chez Groupe GMW, nous découpons vos métaux en employant rigueur et une attention particulière.

Explore our Capabilities
WHO WE ARE

BMP Metals, a family-owned and operated custom precision sheet metal fabricator has continued to deliver on a commitment of quality since 1984.

WHAT WE DO

Custom engineering design, CNC machining, milling & turning, electromechanical assembly, welding, paint coatings, 3D printing, laser punching and much more.

QUICK INTRODUCTION

BMP Metals is the manufacturing arm of the Bempro Global Group and specializes in machined and fabricated sheet metal manufacturing. It's no mistake that we've been in business for over thirty-five years.  Check out our video and see why >

WATCH THE VIDEO
Contact Us
Submit
STRENGTH IN DESIGN & ENGINEERING

With a SolidWorks native work environment, seats of ProEngineer, AutoCad, CadKey and a secure FTP web server, our in-house engineering department is capable of processing a wide variety of job formats.

Here's what makes our team of engineers such a great value-added service to our customers;

DESIGN

With several professional engineers combining for over 25 years of production experience, the engineering design department is capable of taking your initial idea and turning it into a manufacturable product.

METHODS

To ensure successful manufacturing, our engineering department will:

​

Define the process, equipment & jigs.

Establish the workflow & layout of workstations.

Improve the processes by eliminating waste or improving piece rate.

Develop detailed manufacturing documentation.

STRENGTH ANALYSIS

To facilitate customer design requirements, the engineering department is capable of running Finite Element Analysis (FEA) of piece parts or assemblies.

A PROUD MEMBER OF THE BEMPRO GLOBAL GROUP

Family owned and operated since 1984, the Bempro Global Group of Companies are recognized and respected for their passion to take on all challenges. Driven by talented and dedicated people, Bempro continues to grow as a result of our proud tradition towards innovation and service. The Bempro Global Group of Companies consists of BMP Metals (Custom Metal Fabrication), CableTalk Systems (IT Infrastructure Solutions) and ClimateWorx International (Mission Critical Climate Control).

WE'RE GROWING & WE NEED YOU!

BMP Metals, based out of Brampton, Ontario is a proud Canadian company offering competitive salary and benefits.  Check out our career page often as we are always on the look out for great people to join our team.

Charlton & Hill and Wood's Homes Fundraiser

To involve the community, we are offering their customers the opportunity to contribute by providing discounts on service bills, with a portion of the proceeds going directly to Woods Homes. Since 1941 - Providing the Best in Plumbing, Heating, & Air Conditioning for Your Home

Charlton & Hill is a name you probably already know; we've been a reputable Lethbridge plumbing company since 1941. Our commitment to excellence is based upon our desire to keep our customers happy. The work we do is what keeps your family warm, safe, and healthy all year long.

We offer emergency services, and it all begins when you give us a call for your free estimate. For the best plumbing, heating, and air conditioning service around, we're always there for you, just a phone call away.

Our Commitment to You

Our commitment to "Quality Proven Over Time" has been a long-standing tradition within our community and Southern Alberta for many years. We would be delighted to provide you with quotations, service, products, and advice in any of our areas of specialization.

LEARN MORE

Residential Plumbing Services

We're not just another plumbing company; we're the preferred plumbing company locals trust for premium work. Whether it's plumbing repairs, drain cleaning, or sump pump service, it will always be top-notch quality.

Our technicians are expertly trained and professionally vetted before being invited to the team. We've been the name you can trust for over 80 years and will continue to be for decades to come.

FIND OUT MORE
Heating & Air Conditioning Solutions

Only the best will do when it comes to your home. We know that's how you feel and so should your HVAC company.

All of our heating and cooling work is executed with skill and precision, and your satisfaction is guaranteed. For superior performing, long-term solutions from your home comfort systems, call Charlton & Hill to schedule service from this heating, cooling, and plumbing company in Lethbridge..

FIND OUT MORE

Duct Cleaning Services

Clean air ducts are the foundation of a healthy home environment, but over time, they can accumulate mold, fungi, bacteria, and dust that compromise indoor air quality. At Charlton & Hill, we understand that maintaining a clean and healthy indoor environment is crucial for your comfort and well-being. Our duct cleaning service is designed to deliver superior results that you can rely on.

Experience the difference with Charlton & Hill's comprehensive duct cleaning solutions in Lethbridge, ensuring your home's air quality remains optimal.

FIND OUT MORE
Electrical Services

Charlton & Hill goes beyond being just another electrical company; we're your partners in maintaining a safe, efficient, and reliable electrical system. Whether it's wiring upgrades, lighting installations, or electrical troubleshooting, expect nothing but top-notch quality from our experienced electricians. With over 80 years of trusted service, we're here to provide excellence that lasts for generations.

For dependable, lasting solutions that power your property, get in touch with Charlton & Hill, the trusted name for electrical services in Lethbridge.

Manufacturing and Engineering Solutions for Military & Defence

Ben Machine is an industry leader in end-to-end manufacturing and engineering solutions for military & defence industries. We are experts in precision CNC machining with on-site capabilities in sheet metal fabrication, certified welding, finishing and assembly.

Ben Machine is registered under the Controlled Goods Program (CGP) and complies with International Trade in Arms Regulations (ITAR). Our manufacturing specialists work with your design engineers to deliver fully integrated, cost-effective solutions in a timely manner. Working with your team, we transform your high precision part design concepts into high precision manufactured components.

Request A Quote
Our Services
Learn More
CNC MACHINING​

Our facility offers the latest manufacturing technology to provide our customers with complete quality precision parts, faster lead times and competitive pricing. Our skilled engineers and machinists are supported by a full compliment of 3, 4 and 5 axis CNC mills along with CNC lathes with live tooling.

A serious cost driver in CNC machining is the set-up time of the machine. Costs increase as the more machines and set-ups are required to produce the part. Ben Machine has strategically invested in the latest CNC machine technology, allowing multiple operations to be completed on one machine and set-up. Our clients see lower part costs, higher quality, and reduced lead times as benefits of our industry expertise.

Read More
PRECISION SHEET METAL FABRICATION

Ben Machine is a leader in high precision sheet metal manufacturing. Between our team of engineers and fabricators combined with state-of-the-art equipment, sheet metal bends to our expectations. There are many methods for manipulation of sheet metal which we offer our customers for a turn-key part from simple brackets to complex aerospace enclosures—and all to your exact final requirements.

Read More
WELDING AND ASSEMBLY​

Ben Machine is a certified welder of both ferrous and non-ferrous materials for the aerospace and defense industries. Our engineers and certified welders develop processes and execute MIG and TIG welds. In addition, we have aluminum spot welding to join sheet metal parts and aluminum dip-brazing for complex aerospace enclosures.

Our assembly team turns the components made on Ben Machine’s shop floor into finished products. Parts leave our factory complete, bound straight to our customer’s production area.

Read More
FINISHING SERVICES

Ben Machine, a full-service provider, offers National Aerospace and Defense Contractors Accreditation Program (NADCAP) compliant painting, anodizing, chromate conversion coating, passivation, silk screening and plating of parts all done within our facility. With strong supplier partnerships, Ben Machine also offers heat treatment, non-destructive testing and more to meet a range of customer requirements.

Read More

Quality Communicates

Since our founding in 1973, a core company value is the understanding that quality is communicated in our work in each step in the manufacturing process. Ben Machine has built its reputation as recognized experts in machining and sheet metal fabrication. Our certifications in AS9100D and ISO9001:2015 are audited by the internationally recognized SAI Global.

Tight tolerances and accuracy were expected by our early customers, as thousands of parts depended on Ben Machine’s attention to detail. Over the years, quality has become part of our culture, a way of life, that customers experience in every interaction with employees or products.

Our focus on quality drives our industry leadership in delivering value, precision, and turnkey engineering support for complex aerospace and military programs. With high confidence in our finished parts, we offer Kanban and vendor managed inventory (VMI) programs as part of our total manufacturing solution approach.

Ultrafit's Vision

BECOME THE MOST INNOVATIVE, COMPETITIVE TUBULAR SOLUTIONS MANUFACTURER 

IN NORTH AMERICA WITH THE HIGHEST QUALITY AND SERVICE TO OUR CUSTOMERS, 

REGARDLESS OF SIZE AND INDUSTRY

UltraFit Manufacturing (“UltraFit”) is a North American leader in tube bending and parts manufacturing. Its manufacturing expertise covers a broad range of processes, from complex tube bending and forming to welded fabrication and sub-assemblies.

UltraFit works with industry-leading companies, primarily in the automotive and heavy equipment markets and are the trusted source for OE, aftermarket and performance exhaust products.  The company guides projects from design through manufacturing to delivery.  UltraFit works closely with its customers to achieve the appropriate production system, from small batch runs to a constant supply of quality parts with just in time delivery.

The UltraFit Way
Accountable

Keeping promises to own clients, your co-workers and yourself.

Passionate

Show pride, enthusiasm, and dedication in everything you do.

Solutions Oriented 

Focus on finding solutions and achieving results, rather than making excuses or placing blame.

UltraFit provides precision pipe and tube bending and other structural steel forming with carbon steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and other alloys. We have an extensive selection of bending equipment and dies to ensure rapid turn around for specialized sizes and profiles.

ABOUT US
100% Canadian owned and operated.

Located in Toronto, Ontario; EM Dynamics is proud to be a 100% Canadian-owned and operated company delivering unparalleled integrated manufacturing services.

Our state-of-the-art, triple manufacturing facilities include over 180,000 square feet of engineering and production space. Inside our walls, we boast industry-leading machinery and equipment from world-class providers to reach a high degree of control, innovation and efficiency for companies in the diverse range of industries we serve, from robotics to architecture.

To execute our manufacturing process and breathe life into our projects, we have an unrivalled, dedicated team of seasoned engineers and technicians leading our frontlines. To add to our team, our company recruits the brightest minds in the field through collaborations with top local university and college programs. Through constant reinvestment in technology and training programs, we ensure that our teams’ knowledge base is not only expansive but also perpetually growing to better serve our clients.

Scovan is shaping the future of energy.

At Scovan, we act as a partner with clients to create lasting value in the emerging energy industry. Our innovative and sustainable solutions are built on a foundation of experience, present-day action, and a relentless focus on the future.

SAGD EXPERTISE THAT DRIVES INNOVATION
Partnering with you to shape the future of SAGD.

Scovan has been at the forefront of SAGD development since 2010, supporting piloting, greenfield development, debottlenecking, and expansion projects across all heavy oil regions. As one of the few firms with recent design expertise on a new SAGD facility, our team brings unparalleled insights into modern thermal project execution. Our capabilities extend beyond process package integration and technology selection — we actively develop innovative solutions like our PadX Well Pad System and our HipVap Produced Water Steam Generation Technology to enhance efficiency, reduce costs, and unlock the full potential of existing and new SAGD operations.

We have a grand vision that
extends far beyond mere
production.

We specialize in embarking on challenging projects, fostering enduring partnerships, and crafting OEM product lines of exceptional quality. With over 50 years of specialized OEM experience, Nelson has mastered the art of delivering excellence on a grand scale. Our approach isn't about catering to everyone; it's about identifying our niche audience and making a significant impact.

We don't clinch contracts by undercutting our competitors on price; we win because we are unparalleled in our field. Our purpose, as articulated in Nelson's Statement, is to "Be a company that Customers want to buy from, Employees want to work for and Ownership want to invest in". This ethos drives us to continually innovate, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in manufacturing. Many of the products we manufacture are critical to the success of prominent brands while every project we undertake is a testament to our adaptability and expertise. Whether it's pioneering new product ideas or seamlessly executing complex fabrication processes, Nelson sets the benchmark for quality and reliability. Our state-of-the-art manufacturing facility, coupled with a highly skilled workforce, ensures that each product we deliver exceeds expectations.

01. Contract Manufacturing

We are among our primary customers, which sets us apart. Nelson operates with a distinctive business model. Our Contract Manufacturing (CM) Division sustains two exclusive product lines: ACUDOR  and AMD . While our CM division reinforces our proprietary brands, these brands, in turn, enhance our ability to cater to OEM customers. Our ownership of these products allows us to grasp and appreciate the intricacies of product development, market temperament, promotion, distribution, and beyond. Our expertise in sheet metal fabrication shines particularly bright in fields like Science, Medical, Construction, and Automotive Dealerships. At Nelson, we don't just fabricate products; we forge enduring relationships. Our success as an OEM producer stems from our unwavering dedication to client satisfaction. With Nelson by your side, you're not just getting a manufacturer; you're gaining a partner committed to your success.

The measure of intelligence is the ability to change - Einstein

The Continuous Bench – spanning the shop from wall-to-wall.
Lexus Dealership continuous bench
Porsche dealership certified shop furniture

AREAS of EXPERTISE

Before Nelson was involved in designing auto dealership shop furniture, mechanics would work from drawer cabinets on wheels in each bay where efficiency was lost. Nelson began their research into better auto bay structures by looking at kitchen cabinet systems and how they used small space work areas to reduce steps and time. From that research came the Continuous Bench design, a configuration that spans the shop from wall-to-wall, ensuring the shop is free of gaps where clutter might collect. Nelson's modularity means that no system need be exactly the same, and its flexibility gives technicians the ability to customize their own workspace, to maximize their productivity.

We have been an OEM manufacturer of Lab furniture for more than 30 years with our products found in many of the top Universities and Research Institutes in N. America. In recent years our multitasking Lab Benches have found success as a complete system when matched with our cabinet series.

Nelson is the primary OEM manufacturer for a leading innovator in the medical equipment industry. This customer specializes in the development and distribution of forward-thinking products where infection control and cross-contamination is a concern.

There’s a difference between busy and productive

The Beaty Biodiversity Museum

02.

Access Products

Establishing the ACUDOR brand in 1976 marked the inception of safer access solutions, with our first round corner door and one-piece frame. Since then, ACUDOR has risen to global prominence, offering an unrivaled selection of access doors and hatches, solidifying its leadership position in the industry.

ACUDOR WEBSITE

03.

Architectural Metals

Nelson's Architectural Metals Division (“AMD”) is known for providing innovative solutions for metal ceiling, wall, or decorative projects. Our team of engineers, designers, and fabricators are committed to providing turn-key supply solutions, often starting from just concept sketches.

Over the past thirty years, we have worked on major transportation, infrastructure, hotel, and commercial projects throughout North America. We believe that craftsmanship can coexist with technology, and this belief has brought about significant changes that we embrace. Our achievements make us proud of the contribution we have made to the architect's catalog of options available.

NELSONAMD WEBSITE

Have questions or eager to discuss your ideas? Head over to our Contact page and share what's on your mind. We believe that creativity stems from brilliant ideas, and we have the tools and expertise to transform those concepts into tangible outcomes.

Your Vision, Our Expertise
Remember, an idea remains just that until you take action. We believe in the power of consultation and collaboration to propel great ideas forward, whether they're yours or ours. Let's start a conversation and bring those ideas to life!

fischer group – competence in tubing
Sophisticated tubes and components for the automotive industry
Stainless steel tubing and components for the industries of the world
Mature processes for a high variety of shapes
Working at the forefront of development
fischer group profile:
Global leader and innovator

 

The fischer group is the world's leading supplier of longitudinally welded stainless steel tubes and components. The group of companies manufactures products beyond the standard. The entire process - from slit steel to the manufacture of complex components - is continuously refined for optimum performance of our products. In addition, the fischer group is involved in the development of high power battery storage systems.

The fischer group is characterized by a very family - style management structure and culture. Trust, fairness and respect are important to us - both internally and externally.

The group produces its products in eight countries, utilizing equipment, tools and production processes developed in Germany. Proximity to our global customer base allows for efficient and environmentally friendly service.

Our flexibility and pronounced customer focus allows us to optimally integrate our products and services into the processes of our customers.

fischer applications
Automotive

Sophisticated solutions for the automotive industry

From exhaust manifold components to tail pipes- stainless steel tubing components and subassemblies from fischer ensure reliable mobility.

Industry

Superior material grades for industrial applications

Increasingly machines, systems and products are manufactured from higher quality materials. The fischer group is the ideal partner for this.

Trade

Reliable partner for the trade

As the world's leading manufacturer of longitudinally welded stainless steel tubing, the fischer group is a preferred partner to the stainless steel industry.

Products

First class – not only in stainless steel

Sophisticated technology, in-depth know-how and constant innovation form the basis for the fischer group's comprehensive product range.

Create your future with the fischer group

Would you like to be involved in developing the latest manufacturing technology or in the production of sophisticated components made predominantly of stainless steel and, depending on requirements, other materials as well? In our company culture defined by our experience as a medium-sized business, everyone can contribute and develop their own strengths and skills. Join fischer at the forefront of development and help create the future.

We look forward to meeting you.

WELCOME TO TRUELINE

Trueline Valve Corporation is a leading manufacturer of industrial valves since 1981. Our exceptional growth is a result of our strategic plan which is driven by continuous customer feedback.
The message from our prestigious customers is clear "Provide us with superior and innovative quality valves and respect promised delivery dates". Trueline clearly understood the message. Each year Trueline invests in research and development, highly qualified personnel, and equipment, to ensure the supply of the highest quality valves with deliveries that are unmatched by the competition. Furthermore, our proprietary custom valves and technical expertise satisfy the most severe customer applications.

A continuous improvement system monitors and ensures that we never lose sight of what is important to our customers.

Our high standards extend beyond our product line. We have gained and maintained the respect of our customers by conducting our business in a forthright, open and honest manner. High quality products provided by an organization with a reputation for integrity is what our customers expect, deserve and receive from Trueline.

About Glueckler Metal Inc.

Customer Satisfaction Comes First




Welcome to Essex Weld Solutions – Where Quality Meets Performance




At Essex Weld Solutions, we offer a wide range of custom fabrication and automotive packaging design services to meet the unique needs of our customers. From laser cutting and welding, to tube and flat laser capabilities, our services are designed to provide innovative, reliable, and cost-effective solutions.




Our commitment to excellence ensures that your projects achieve unmatched precision and efficiency. Our state-of-the-art infrastructure guarantee the most precise cuts, piercing and holes, delivering products of uncompromising quality. Discover how our proven processes and successful track record can contribute to the success and growth of your business.




Client Testimonials




Volvo – EWS exceeded our expectations with their attention to detail and quick turnaround time.
Honda  – Their customized solutions perfectly fit our project needs, and the quality of their work is outstanding.




Check out how our services can revolutionize your manufacturing processes, or reach out to our team today to discuss how our advanced technology can help elevate your next project.




We are your one-stop-shop for automotive, agricultural, and aerospace packaging and fabrication needs. We specialize in producing high-quality, custom-designed racks and storage solutions for automotive parts, and we are proud to offer tube laser, flat laser, robotic welding, engineering, and design services to our customers.




Our laser cutting capabilities are designed to deliver precise and efficient cuts to meet the demands of the industry. Our machines are capable of handling a wide range of materials, including steel, aluminum, and stainless steel. This allows us to create complex shapes and designs for a variety of automotive components.




Our team of experienced professionals uses the latest software and equipment to ensure that your parts are cut to your exact specifications. We can produce high-quality cuts quickly and accurately, reducing lead times and ensuring that you get the parts you need on time.




We can handle a wide range of tube laser cutting projects, from small-scale prototypes to large-scale production runs. Our tube laser cutting capabilities can be used to create a variety of automotive components, including tubing, brackets, and frames.




At Essex Weld Solutions, we understand that every project is unique, which is why we offer customized solutions to meet your specific needs. Whether you need a single part or a large-scale production run, our team is here to help you achieve your goals.




We take pride in delivering high-quality products and services to our customers, and our laser cutting capabilities are no exception. Our commitment to quality, reliability, and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted partner for automotive manufacturers and suppliers across the industry for over 20 years.




Contact us today to learn more about our manufacturing capabilities and how we can help you meet your packaging and fabrication needs.

The Lifecycle of a Raindrop™

From the moment rain enters our drain until we safely return it back to its natural environment, we take the responsibility of managing the precious resource of water very seriously.

Capture
Stormwater enters our basins and filters work to remove sediment and debris.
Conveyance
Our pipe directs water away from parking lots, freeways and fields so areas stay dry and neighborhoods stay safe.
Storage
Chambers ensure water flow is managed appropriately, guarding against flooding.
Treatment
Finally, our water quality products clean water before returning it to lakes and streams.

QUALITY DRIVEN

Royal Laser Mfg Inc. has stringent quality control procedures to ensure all products are monitored throughout manufacturing process. By assessing products during production, defects are reduced and operations run in the most effective and efficient way.

SUPPLIERS

Having developed a lasting relationship with our suppliers, Royal Laser Mfg Inc. has a secured supply of raw materials for any project acquired. By maintaining our relationships and attaining cost-savings, we can provide our services at competitive prices to our customers as a result.

OUR TEAM

We believe that the products and services provided are only as good as the people providing them. Royal Laser Mfg Inc. is built on a solid foundation of knowledgable and hard-working people. Our team is firmly committed to providing the best service from head office all the way to the plant floor.

EQUIPMENT

In an industry that is consistently changing on the technological front, Royal Laser Mfg Inc. is always first in line to purchase the most state-of-the-art machinery on the market. Quality assurance is crucial to ensure timeliness, and to avoid the costly repercussions of defects. Our machinery is not only carefully maintained, but is also frequently updated to stay competitive and allow for top quality production.

VISION

Our vision is to continue to be a top quality, multi-faceted manufacturer in North America through stringent quality control processes and our inherent ability to adapt to technological change in the industry. We are committed to being transparent in our operations and will continue to explore a wide array of manufacturing avenues, to ensure our clients’ are fully satisfied.

GÉOSYNTHÉTIQUES
Système de captage durables et sur mesure

S’adaptant facilement aux conduites formant les réseaux existants, nos systèmes de captage sont durables. La résistance au soulèvement par le gel et aux sels de déglaçage et la performance face aux écarts extrêmes de température, combinées aux propriétés mécaniques du PEHD, en font des produits parfaitement adaptés à ces fonctions. Nos regards/puisards et nos conduites perforées sont des alternatives pratiques et économiques pour intercepter l’eau de ruissellement.
