TRANQUILLITÉ D'ESPRIT

En tant que professionnel, vous devez sécuriser vos approvisionnements afin de vous libérer du temps précieux pour réfléchir à vos objectifs à moyen et long terme.

Nous sommes conscients de votre réalité et on s’engage à mettre en œuvre notre savoir-faire pour vous offrir cette sécurité.

C'est simple, vous nous confiez votre projet, nous trouvons des solutions et nous livrons de la qualité… semaine après semaine, année après année!

Et vous? Votre gestion devient facile!

FOURNISSEUR MULTISERVICES (CLÉS EN MAIN)

Votre gestion des achats se simplifie parce que nous regroupons sous le même toit plusieurs procédés de fabrication : découpe, pliage, estampage, soudage, usinage, assemblage, fabrication d’outillage et la transformation d’extrusion. De plus, nous prenons en charge différentes étapes de finition comme la peinture, le placage et la passivation.

Imaginez le bonheur d’avoir un seul bon d’achat!

ENGAGEMENT ET TRANSPARENCE

Nous prenons soin de choisir nos clients. Nous cherchons à savoir si nous partageons les mêmes valeurs, les mêmes objectifs et la même vision. Nous cernons aussi la plus-value de Matritech qui ferait une vraie différence pour vous et vos projets.

Au moment où, d’un côté comme de l’autre, la relation gagnant-gagnant est confirmée, l’équipe dédiée de Matritech s’implique entièrement dans la réussite de vos projets ainsi que votre réussite personnelle.

L’avantage pour vous est notre volonté de toujours faire mieux!

PARTENAIRE À LONG TERME

Nous serons avec vous lors du développement de vos pièces, du prototypage et de la mise en production. Nous vous appuierons tout au long de votre croissance en vous offrant les procédés les mieux adaptés, et ce, à chacune des étapes du cycle de vie de vos produits. Notre soutien vous sera particulièrement bénéfique lorsque vous aurez besoin de très grandes capacités de production.

Notre but est de vous amener plus loin!

EXPERTISE ET SOUTIEN TECHNIQUE

Au même titre que vous êtes des experts dans votre domaine d’activité par l’excellence de vos produits, notre équipe est experte en fabrication de composantes métalliques.

Possédant de l'expérience provenant de différents secteurs d’activités, notre équipe d’ingénierie vous suggère des trucs maison pour réduire les coûts, simplifier la fabrication et améliorer la qualité de vos assemblages.

Venez en profiter!

ASSEMBLAGE COMPLEXE
Vos requis d’assemblage sont exigeants
Votre capacité d’assemblage plafonne
Votre assemblage comporte plusieurs types d’items à assembler
Vous cherchez un fournisseur capable de livrer des modules préassemblés ou des assemblages complets (clés en main)

C’est pour l’ensemble de ces affirmations que l'on se démarque chez nos clients pour qui nous sommes devenus maintenant des partenaires majeurs.

Matritech, un partenaire stratégique majeur!

INNOVATION

Faisant affaire dans des domaines d’activités variés, notre équipe est particulièrement reconnue pour son esprit créatif, sa force technique et son apport en solutions inédites et innovantes.

L’innovation… c’est l’ADN de Matritech!

LE TEMPS C'EST DE L'ARGENT

Matritech s'est doté d’une solide capacité de gestion de projets qui l’a propulsée, au fil des années, au premier rang des manufacturiers. À l’aide de programmes internes, d’échéanciers précis et de suivis serrés, l’avancement des activités est constamment contrôlé afin d'atteindre vos objectifs.

Nous respectons vos délais!

LA QUALITÉ MATRITECH

Choisir Matritech, c'est s'assurer de choisir la plus haute qualité!

Notre système de contrôle qualité rigoureux, méthodique et hautement efficace fait notre renommée auprès de grands donneurs d'ordres de classe mondiale pour qui nous devenons un fournisseur stratégique incontournable.

Selon vos exigences, nous pouvons fournir toute la documentation requise pour vos pièces d’acceptation :

PPAP niveau 1 à 3 
Plan de contrôle
FAI
Relevé dimensionnel sur CMM
Certificat de conformité
Procédure de soudage certifiée

 

Visionner la documentation ISO :  Certification ISO 2022-25 FR

 

CONSCIENCIEUX FACE À L'ENVIRONNEMENT

Dans un souci de bâtir une entreprise à développement durable, nous concentrons nos efforts afin de réduire nos déchets au minimum ainsi que de bien trier nos matériaux destinés au recyclage. Nos valeurs écologiques sont partagées à tous et nous soutenons toutes les initiatives de nos équipes. Les matières que nous recyclons sont, entre autres :

Acier au carbone
Acier inoxydable
Acier galvanisé
Aluminium
Piles (batteries)
Huiles (coupe, presse, moteur, etc.)
Contenants réutilisables

Nuclear power

COPPER NICKEL
Key properties
Highly resistant to seawater.
Key markets and industries for pipe fittings
Navy ships for piping, heat exchangers and condensers.
Key standards
To end users specifications.
Key grades
To end users specifications.
CARBON STEEL / HIGH-YIELD
Key properties
High resistance to deformation, which is essential for high pressure applications.
Low cost: useful for applications
that do not require materials with higher resistance to corrosion such as stainless steel, or nickel alloys, or titanium.
But corrodes and rusts easily if exposed to water.
Key markets and industries for pipe fittings
High pressure oil, gas, or steam transmission.
Fossil power plants
Nuclear power (mostly seamless), in core reactor or balance of plant.
Petrochemical plants.
Geothermal power (with low-corrosion steam or water).
Key standards for high-yield low temperature service
MSS-SP-75, CSA Z245.11,
ASME B16.9,
ASTM A-420,
ASME SA-420,
ASTM A-860, ASME SA-860
Key standards for moderate temperature service
ASTM A-234 and ASME SA-234
Key grades
WPB, WPC, WPL6,
WPHY 42,
WPHY 46,
WPHY 52,
WPHY 60,
WPHY 65,
WPHY 70,
WPHY 80,
WPHY 100
CHROME-MOLYBDENUM
Key properties
Stronger and harder than regular steel.
But not as resistant to corrosion as stainless steel.
Best for transportation of pressurized gases.
Key markets and industries for pipe fittings
Power plants, fossil & nuclear.
Key standards
ASTM A-234 and ASME SA-234;
ASME B16.9, ASME B16.25
Key grades
WP-5, WP-9, WP-11, WP-22, WP-91
W or S
CLAD / CLADDING
Key properties
Cladding combines different metals in a bonding process rather than as an alloy.
High strength and resistance to corrosion.
Lower cost than an alloy.
Key markets and industries for pipe fittings
Geothermal power.
Refineries.
Petrochemicals.

ABOUT FLUOROSEAL

FluoroSeal operations span across the world – from headquarters in Canada, to an international sales force and manufacturing. Comprised of over 500 employees worldwide, FluoroSeal is a leading provider of innovative solutions to the flow control industry.

For over 40 years FluoroSeal has been manufacturing and customizing a wide range of valves, parts, and accessories for various industries such as Oil & Gas, Chemical, Petrochemical, Power, Pharmaceutical, and Mining. Our client-oriented culture allows us to understand complex industry needs and meet the highest quality standards – that is why our manufacturing processes are ISO 9001:2015 and PED 2014/68/EU with TUV Rheinland of North America.

ROBAR – Coupling Manufacturer

Waterworks Manufacturing SINCE 1958

Industries That Robar Serves

As a leading coupling manufacturer, Robar Industries has been designing and producing a wide variety of cast and fabricated fittings for municipal distribution of water and wastewater for over 60 years. Robar’s foundry creates parts primarily for the waterworks and piping industries. Some of our key products and services include:

Couplings

Robar produces an extremely large selection of straight and transition couplings that can connect all sorts of pipes, which is exactly what you should expect from an industry leading coupling manufacturer. Whether you’re seeking bolt, cast, or fabricated couplings made from materials such as stainless steel, carbon steel, ductile iron, and rubber, Robar has you covered.

Not only that, but we also supply 2-Bolt couplings, compression couplings, and restrained couplings, as well as items that can be used in conjunction with couplings, such as coupling end caps and boots. Find a complete list of everything we offer on our coupling product catalogue page. If you have questions about coupling size or what gaskets to use with your pipes, consult our coupling selection chart page to find a list of dimensions on our spec sheet.

Repair Clamps

Robar Industries introduced the all stainless steel repair clamp to the waterworks industry in 1965. Repair Clamps are used to repair a variety of different pipe materials. If you are looking to repair a pinhole, large hole, horizontal or latitudinal crack, a Robar repair clamp is what you need. Check out our selection of repair clamps.

Tapping Sleeves

Our tapping sleeves catalogue allows you to choose from a variety of products that can be used to transition off of your mainline with either wet or dry tapping.

Service Saddles

If you’re looking for a reliable saddle to take any type of service outlet off a distribution line or transmission, Robar has plenty of great service saddles that can be used with many different pipes.

Expansion Joints

Whether you’re looking for an expansion joint with your steel pipeline or dismantling joints and flange coupling adapters for a piping system, we can provide advice and help you choose from a range of products.

Contact Robar Industries if you have any questions about our products. As expert coupling manufacturers, we’ll be happy to help.

Robar supplies products to:

Municipalities

Water & Wastewater Treatment Facilities

Logging

Hydro Electric

Industrial Hose & Fittings

Norwesco Industries has long standing relationships as a distributor for all types of industrial hose and fittings, including Parker Hannifin, Continental Contitech, Flexhaust, Dixon, and many more industry leading manufacturers. In house pressure testing and certification is also available. We can custom manufacture almost any hose assembly you may require.

Hydraulic Hose & Fittings

With hundreds of different types of fittings available, it can often be difficult to select the right product for your application. Norwesco carries a wide variety of fitting options to ensure you have the right fittings for almost every conceivable application. No matter what type of hydraulic fitting you may require, Norwesco Industries can help.

Visit
Gaskets & Sealing Products

Norwesco Industries is a full-service manufacturer and distributor for Triangle Fluid Controls Ltd®, Robco, American Biltrite, and many additional manufacturers. Any type of gasket you may require is either on the shelf, or can be custom manufactured on site, often within the same business day.

Visit
Conveyor Belting & Accessories

Norwesco Industries is one of Canada’s largest Fenner Dunlop distributors and carries everything you require for your conveying needs. Siegling, Ammeraal Beltech, Flexible Steel Lacing, Argonics, ASGCO, and many other manufacturers provides you with a full selection of product offerings to service your requirements. We have experienced conveyor belt technicians available 24 hours a day to ensure you’re up and running as quickly as possible, so you can avoid costly downtime.

Visit
Sheet Rubber & Matting

Whether it’s Viton, EPDM, Neoprene, Natural Gum, Nitrile, or dozens of other sheet rubber types, Norwesco Industries warehouses thousands of square feet of different rubber grades, thicknesses, and styles to keep your delivery lead times as low as possible for any rubber requirements. Stall mats, anti-fatigue mats, hall runner, sports floor mats and just about every other type of matting that you could require are all available.

Visit
Industrial Plastic

Norwesco Industries warehouses a great selection of industrial plastics. Teflon®, UHMW, Nylon, Polycarbonate, Acetal, Delrin, Nylatron® and almost any grade or type of plastic you can imagine is our specialty. Whether you require specialty extrusions, rod, or sheet, we do our best to ensure you get exactly what you need when you need it.

About PRI

In 1997, Progressive Rubber Industries Inc. (PRI) established itself in Kamloops creating abrasion and corrosion resistance components for the mining industry as well as original equipment manufacturers (OEM).

Since its inception, PRI has been committed to strengthening the local economy. We have increased our diverse work force tenfold and will continue to grow in pace with demand from the mining industry.

By working with Thompson River University and our in house training programs we have developed and retained some of the most experienced personnel in the industry.​ With our combined expertise in steel fabrication, rubber lining, rubber molding, ceramic lining, on-site lining, on-site measurements, wear dynamics analysis, application analysis, and design services; PRI is the solution for any job – from small and simple to large and complex.​

PRI has the manufacturing capability and select ability to expedite and deliver emergency orders and has the ability to provide on-site consignment stocking of critical custom fares.

Erik Lynum

Facility & Equipment
Full-Service Fabrication
D&R Custom Steel has 24,000 square feet of floor space and a full line of fabrication equipment to handle all aspects of the fabrication process. Our capabilities include plasma cutting, laser cutting, water-jet cutting, shearing, drilling, punching, rolling, forming, welding, fitting, sandblasting, glass bead blasting, painting, finishing, and complete test assembly. We work primarily with stainless steel, aluminum, and alloys to provide a clean shop environment for our fabrications.
Convenient Location
Located just outside the Greater Toronto Area (GTA) in Pickering, Ontario, D&R Custom Steel is within minutes of several major Canadian transportation routes and two hours of the Canada-US border, providing access to all major North American centres by road, rail, or sea. This location also provides easy access to material suppliers, strategic partners, and a highly skilled labour force for a full range of fast, efficient services.
State-of-the-Art Equipment
D&R Custom Steel is a full-service steel fabrication provider with a full range of professional fabrication equipment to create quality custom fabrications.  Our 24,000-square-foot shop includes the latest in fabrication technologies, from laser tables and welding robots to CNC press brakes and state-of-the-art welding machines—everything we need to take your project from design to reality.
D&R Custom Steel operates two shifts for 20 hours per day (90 hours per week) to better serve our customers and fulfill our promise of quality, value, and timely delivery. Our employees are highly skilled and fully trained to use our equipment safely and efficiently.
Quality Management
With a service-driven approach that focuses on the customer’s requirements and timelines, D&R Custom Steel offers quality, value, and timely delivery. To ensure each custom fabrication is exactly what the client ordered and meets all relevant specifications, D&R employs full-time CWB-certified weld inspectors and weld supervisors.  We also have our welders certified every two years by the Canadian Welding Board (CWB) in various materials and techniques.
D&R Custom Steel is certified by the Canadian Welding Board to meet Canadian Safety Association (CSA) standard W47.1 division 2 for carbon steel and stainless steel and CSA standard W47.2 for aluminum.
D&R Custom Steel has developed its quality assurance procedures and has full-time quality assurance inspectors on staff.  Our procedures follow the Canadian Safety Association’s CSA-Z-299.3-85 standards.
About Us
Quality, Value and Commitment to Excellence
D&R Custom Steel specializes in high-quality stainless steel equipment for water treatment, air treatment, mining, and material handling industries. With practical expertise in custom fabrications, we are a trusted provider.
 
Quality, value, and timely delivery—that’s what D&R Custom Steel is all about. Our goal will always be to provide our clients with superior fabrications made and finished exactly to their specifications and delivered on time and at a fair price.  Our skilled staff, network of suppliers, and wide inventory make for a reliable solution for your custom steel fabrications.
 
Our complete range of capabilities includes cutting, fabrication, assembly, finishing, detailing, and functional testing so that your equipment leaves fully operable and ready to use. Our 50-plus years of experience in custom fabrications spans several industries, including several customers who have been with us since the beginning—a testament to the quality of our products and customer service.
History
1971
D&R was established on May 1, 1971, by John DeWit (D) and Yke Reitsma (R).  John DeWit and Yke Reitsma were immigrants from the Netherlands and had gained valuable experience working for steel fabricators in Canada before setting up D&R.  John DeWit retired in...

Kompanija
NCMC  je jedan od vodećih globalnih pružatelja instalacije automatiziranih skladišta, pametnih rješenja za skladištenje i regala modularnog dizanja

Brzo je postala istaknuta kompanija prepoznata širom svijeta zbog svog profesionalnog pristupa i stručnosti u instalaciji visokoregalnih automatiziranih skladišta. Danas, NCMC je lider u instalaciji pametnih rješenja za skladištenje, što je učvrstilo njezin ugled kao cijenjenog partnera u industriji.

Saznajte više
2000
Osnovano
600
Uposlenih
40
Zemlje
Automatizovana visokoregalna skladišta

U svijetu automatiziranih sistema skladištenja i opskrbe, visokoregalna skladišta su jedno od najpopularnijih rješenja. Idealna su za bilo koju firmu koja treba skladištiti velike količine materijala i držati ih organiziranima


Vidi više
Proizvodnja

Specijalizovani smo u obradi metala te proizvodimo različite vrste metalnih proizvoda. Neprestano radimo na poboljšanju i razvoju naših proizvodnih kapaciteta i držimo korak sa novim tehnologijama u sektoru proizvodnje metalnih konstrukcija.


Vidi više
Izolacioni paneli

Kada je riječ o instalaciji izolacionih panela, možete se pouzdati u naš tim stručnjaka. Radili smo na mnogim projekata širom svijeta, te smo kvalificirani i iskusni za sve vrste poslova u vezi sa instalacijom panela. Naš tim je spreman da vam pomogne da posao uradite kako treba!


Vidi više
Montaža

Naš stručni tim nudi različite usluge montaže, kao što su unutarnja montaža skladišnih regala, vanjska montaža skladišnih regala, platforme, instalacija panela, upravljanje projektima i osobljem, transporteri, proizvodne hale...


Vidi više
Naši projekti širom svijeta
NCMC posluje na 6 kontinenata i u 10 vremenskih zona, u okviru 15 projekata godišnje. Instaliramo 27.300 paleta mjesečno koristeći 2000 tona čelika u procesu.
Razlozi za odabir NCMC-a
Kvalificirano osoblje

Visoko kvalificirano osoblje s iskustvom u montaži i metalnoj konstrukciji širom svijeta, bilo da se radi o instalaciji, proizvodnji ili elektromehanička rješenja.

Standardi

Poslovanje u skladu s uspostavljenimstandardima:

ISO 9001:2015 & ISO 45001:2018
DIN EN ISO 9001:2015 & DIN ISO 45001:2018,
ISO 3834,
EN 1090
Reference

Uspješnost i kvalitet našeg rada potvrđuju reference zadovoljnih klijenata.

Svjetsko iskustvo

Iskustvo rada u inozemstvu i ispunjavanje specifičnih zahtjeva klijenta.

Brzo i vješto

Kapacitet i kvalificirano osoblje za ispunjavanje kratkih rokova i specifičnih zahtjeva u proizvodnji.

Inovacije

Stalne inovacije i poboljšanja.

Logistic Support

ROBADAIR LTD. is a leading supplier of custom precision metal fabrication, and provides value added services such as chemfilm, painting, and mechanical assembly. For your convenience, we also maintain a close working relationship with subcontractors specializing in plating and silk screening .

Robadair Ltd. is a privately owned Canadian Corporation incorporated under Federal Statutes in March of 1974. Robadair Ltd. was purchased by the present owner in August of 1989 and in 1998 acquired and moved to its present location at 2400 Lancaster Road in Ottawa, Ontario.

Over the years, the company has grown from ten employees and 6500 sq. feet to 35000 sq. feet with as many as 100 plus employees.

In 2019 Robadair purchased Micron Precision to increase our machining capacity. The facility has been integrated in to our quality management program.

We supply products manufactured and controlled in accordance with the requirements of ISO 9001:2015 & AS9100D.

Robadair Ltd. has been a part of the Controlled Goods Program since May 2007.

All Robadair Ltd. welders are certified according to CWB standards CSA W47.1 and CSA W47.2

Iafrate Machine Works (IMW) is a Canadian company, family owned and operated that provides a full range of custom CNC machining, engineering and fabrication to the North American market. Our Goal is to provide each of our Customers excellent service and quality products every time with on time delivery.

We strive to keep costs down and to manufacture our customer’s part to their exact specifications. Our excellent partnerships with many outside service firms allow us to get every aspect of your part completed quickly and accurately.

We encourage you to send us your inquiries. Click on the menu options above for additional information.

Our Complimentary Application Engineering Process

When you engage with SPIROL as part of your team, we will utilize our 5-Step Process for Success to ensure that you receive the right solution in a timely manner. We will be an active participant of your team starting in the design stage - through the qualification stage – until the product is launched successfully to ensure that your quality, performance and assembly objectives are completely satisfied.

STEP 1/5
Define Objectives

We work with you to define your product performance, assembly and commercial objectives. This includes gathering sample components, the drawings of the individual components and the assembly-level drawings. At this stage, we also define commercial objectives such as target product costing, product packaging / labeling, and delivery requirements.

Request Engineering Support
Application Success Stories
Trigger Pin in Surgical Stapler
CUSTOMER CHALLENGE:

A leading medical device manufacturer approached SPIROL for assistance in designing a self-retaining trigger pin that eliminated cracking of the plastic yoke within the surgical stapler.

SPIROL SOLUTION:
SPIROL Engineers recommended a Light Duty Coiled Spring Pin which was designed specifically for plastic assemblies to ensure the perfect balance of strength and flexibility.
Coiled Pins are easy to install and exert low stress on the hole after installation, yet they provide exceptional retention.
In addition to recommending the most appropriate pin, SPIROL Engineers also recommended the hole sizes for each of the retaining locations to make sure that the assembly functioned properly over the life of the assembly.
SPIROL’s Coiled Spring Pin eliminated the cracking of the plastic yoke, enhanced the function of the trigger, and improved the overall quality of the surgical stapler.
Read More
Retention Pin in Plastic Electric Vehicle Charging Handle
CUSTOMER CHALLENGE:

A manufacturer of electric vehicle charging handles had been experiencing high scrap rates during assembly due to screws stripping the plastic host. They wanted to replace the screws with permanent, tamper resistant fasteners that also supported lean manufacturing.

SPIROL SOLUTION:
SPIROL Engineering recommended replacing the screws with Press-N-Lok™ Pins that were specifically designed as retention pins for plastic enclosures.
Press-N-Lok™ Pins have barbs that provide high retention in plastics. As the pins are pressed into the plastic, the barbs displace the plastic host material. After installation, the plastic backfills behind the barbs to lock the pins in place.
The assembly time for the Press-N-Lok™ Pins was much quicker and the assembly equipment costs was lower compared to the screws previously used.
SPIROL's Press-N-Lok™ Pins simplified the assembly process, and eliminated scrap events associated with the installation of the screws.
Read More
Mechanical Clutch in Heavy Duty Right Angle Drill
CUSTOMER CHALLENGE:

The lead engineer at a prominent hand and power tool company contacted SPIROL for help determining the best Disc Spring design for a new lightweight, compact, and portable Heavy Duty Right Angle Drill.

SPIROL SOLUTION:
SPIROL Engineering designed two special Disc Springs stacked in series to meet the specific force and deflection requirements.
Disc Springs offer a higher load capacity in less space as compared to conventional coil springs which enables the designer to make the tool more compact.
Unlike Belleville Washers that are mostly used in static applications, Disc Springs provide unparalleled predictability, reliability and fatigue life in highly dynamic applications.
By partnering with SPIROL and incorporating our recommendation, the customer minimized costly development time and confidently launched their new high-quality drill to the market.
Read More
Alignment Dowels in Lower Engine Block
CUSTOMER CHALLENGE:

A leading automotive manufacturer approached SPIROL for a cost-effective solution to precision align the lower engine block to the primary engine block.

SPIROL SOLUTION:
SPIROL's GD100 Ground Hollow Dowels are used where centerline tolerance and precision alignment are required as they maintain critical alignment within 20 µm.
GD100 Ground Hollow Dowel reduce weight by over 50% as compared to the same size Solid Dowel.
SPIROL's recommendation resulted in over $100,000 in annual cost savings as compared to other alignment options considered.
Read More
Conveyor Spacers
CUSTOMER CHALLENGE:

The lead engineer at an industrial conveyor manufacturing company approached SPIROL to help resolve an issue caused by low quality plastic tubing used to separate skate wheel rollers from each other and from the conveyor walls.

SPIROL SOLUTION:
SPIROL's Application Engineers recommended replacing low cost, low quality plastic tubing with SPIROL's CS100 Conveyor Spacers
CS100 Conveyor Spacers are stronger than plastic tubing and competitively priced.
SPIROL's proprietary roll forming process enables custom lengths produced with no tool charges and fast turnaround times.
By partnering with SPIROL, the conveyor manufacturer was able to improve the quality of the assembly while concurrently controlling costs and inventory.
Read More

OUR LATEST NEWS

Some of our thoughts and opinions about technology, the manufacturing industry and innovation.


Machining Services
As part of our ongoing effort to increase our range of services, we are proud to announce our expansion into machining! The addition of machining is complimentary to our existing fabrication services and will allow more precision and larger scale production of complex parts. Vertical integration has many benefits, including decreasing lead times and increasing control over the operations, but it also plays a crucial role in achieving our vision of succeeding in an Industry 4.0 environment.
September 10, 2019
ByBrad Carlin
Vertical Integration
Over the past few months, we have continued exploring the foundations of Industry 4.0, and implementing new systems to prepare for a digital future. One such project was focused on dramatically reducing lead time and costs by vertically integrating machining into our business. Beyond just lead time reductions, the addition of machining to our capabilities provides us with far more control over our supply chain than we’ve ever had.
September 10, 2019
ByBrad Carlin
Environmental Responsibility in Manufacturing: Conscious Consumers and Derived Demand
In a stereotypically net polluting industry, we’re looking at what it means to be environmentally conscious in manufacturing. This is the first of a series articles relating to this topic.
August 16, 2018
ByJeff Carlin

Cello Products Inc. is the premier copper solder fittings manufacturer in North America and is one of the only cast brass fittings producers.

Our products are used in plumbing, heating and related mechanical applications.

Cello produces fittings ranging in use from underground water and gas services to water distribution and air conditioning systems as well as drainage, waste and vent piping for use in residential, commercial, industrial and institutional applications.

Cello Products Inc. is committed to manufacturing quality products in accordance with customer requirements.

We strive for continuous improvement
in quality and efficiency in order to deliver the best possible product at a competitive price.

Our quality system is ISO 9001:2015 registered, our fittings are NSF 61 certified and we have CRN numbers for the Canadian market.


Company Profile

Cello Products was founded in 1946 in Cambridge, Ontario as a manufacturer of cast brass solder fittings.
Wrought copper solder fittings were added to the product line in the 1960's. Today, Cello produces an extensive line of wrought copper and cast brass solder fittings.

WELCOME TO AGORA MFG INC.

Agora Manufacturing has been a leading steel fabricator and manufacturer of quality electrical enclosures since 1982. We are proud to serve numerous industries including electrical and electronic, nuclear, marine, entertainment, and more. Our portfolio of past projects is vast. From control cabinets and large transformer housings, to racks, consoles, multi-door enclosures and switch gears, we have the skills and experience necessary to take on any project.

 

We work with a complete range of materials to meet all of your needs, and this includes carbon steel, galvanized steel, stainless steel and aluminum.

 

At Agora, our customers always come first. We have at our disposal the most experienced technical team who provide precision manufacturing and excellent service. We have the highest quality standards, and promise unlimited flexibility and long-term reliability.

 

We are driven by professionalism, the desire for challenge, and the need to produce our best quality work for each and every customer. We genuinely enjoy what we do.


MAKE AGORA YOUR PREFERRED SUPPLIER. YOU’LL FIND WE’RE A PERFECT FIT!
TESTIMONIALS

Agora is a great vendor to work with. Their customer service has always been excellent as well as their quality, reliability and ability to meet rush requirements. I would not hesitate to recommend Agora to anyone.

Sharon

I wanted to take a moment to commend Agora Manufacturing on the professionalism that they have always exhibited and technical support they have offered us over the years. We have been working with Agora for a long time and the support we have gotten from the team has enabled us to always meet out tight deadlines. Whether it is a standard delivery item or our recent order that required special rush attention, we have come to rely on Agora to come through for us. I can’t stress enough how important it is to associate our business with a company that delivers quality enclosures on time and at competitive prices. Agora is that company.

Chris

I have the pleasure of commenting on the exemplary level of service provided by the entire staff - in terms of promptness, efficiency, reliability and especially professionalism. In the last 2 years that AGORA has been providing transformed metal products to us, we have always been impressed with the proactive, solution-seeking attitude displayed by everyone within AGORA to ensure that our orders are taken care of within the time frame given. Compared to other metal transformation providers that we use, the AGORA system of operation is indeed self-sustaining, and any rare issue that does come up is handled completely by them, to the satisfaction of all involved - and without any need for action by us. We have made a point of becoming familiar with the product that is provided to our division, and what stands out is professionalism, the quality workmanship — ISO compliant process, quality of materials used, and attention to detail that this company takes to ensure that a high quality product is delivered to us. The whole team at AGORA work with passion to provide a high quality product, that we greatly appreciate! I would not hesitate to recommend in the future, their services.

BEGINNINGS
A vision of accessibility

The year is 1987. The world is changing. For some, the pace of life is accelerating. For others, the physical barriers of the world still stand tall. For fresh-faced engineering grad Richard Meunier, an opportunity is recognized. In his father’s garage, the first RAM lift is designed, setting in motion a legacy of creative passion, precision skill and an unyielding desire to improve human accessibility.

You’ll find these values built into every RAM elevator and lift to this day. With unparalleled advancements in product design, flexibility and simplicity, our products live at the nexus of function and aesthetic for barrier-free living.

SUR MESURE

Avec sa vaste gamme de coffres-forts, de dépôts, de voûtes et de dispositifs de sécurité sur mesure, Sécurifort vous aide à réduire les menaces et à prévenir les désastres.

À PROPOS

Depuis 1971, nous sommes spécialisés dans la conception et la fabrication de chambres fortes, portes et accessoires de chambre forte, coffres-forts, dépôts de nuits, coffrets de sûreté et casiers sur mesure répondant aux besoins spécifiques de nos clients.

Pour maintenir la qualité qui a bâti notre réputation, nous nous appuyons sur une équipe de production hautement qualifiée et expérimentée. En outre, notre programme avancé de recherche et développement nous permet de continuer à innover constamment. Grâce à nos efforts soutenus, nous avons développé des alliages à haute résistance qui rendent nos produits invulnérables à toutes les attaques simulées par les principaux tests du Laboratoire des assureurs du Canada (ULC) et de Underwriters’ Laboratories, Inc. (UL).

Chez Securifort, notre engagement envers l’excellence et la sécurité guide chaque aspect de notre entreprise, de la conception à la livraison, assurant ainsi la protection optimale des biens de nos clients.

  

Chez Sécurifort inc., nous nous engageons fermement à incarner les valeurs d’intégrité, de qualité et de respect dans tout ce que nous faisons. Ces principes fondamentaux ne sont pas seulement des mots sur papier, mais ils sont au cœur même de notre culture d’entreprise et guident chacune de nos décisions et actions.

Ensemble, ces valeurs forment le socle sur lequel nous construisons notre entreprise. Elles nous inspirent à nous améliorer continuellement, à innover et à nous adapter aux besoins changeants de nos clients et de notre monde. Chez [Nom de l’entreprise], nous ne nous contentons pas de respecter ces valeurs – nous les vivons chaque jour, assurant ainsi notre croissance durable et notre impact positif sur la communauté.

About the DB Piping Group of Companies

Our group is comprised of four businesses that are focused on serving customers in the stainless steel and specialty alloys for piping and fabrication industries. ABE, Douglas Barwick, Douglas Brothers and Formweld Fittings have come together to provide customers with more comprehensive stainless steel piping and fabricating products and improved levels of services and quality.

We are part of the Canerector Group of Companies

Quick Info

Our expertise extends far beyond standard products (304L and 316L). It also includes the fabrication of piping products that meet special needs in terms of sizes, thicknesses and special alloys, such as C276, 625, AL6XN, Duplex 2205 and Super Duplex 2507.

PIPE

I.D. 1 ½’’ thru 96’’, 14ga thru 3/8’’ wall

O.D. 3’’ thru 96’’, 14ga thru 3/8’’ wall

N.P.S. A312, A358 sch 10s / 40s

N.P.S. A778 3’’ thru 96’’, .078 thru 3/8’’ wall

BUTT-WELD FITTINGS

I.D. 1 ½’’ thru 24’’, 14ga thru 1/4’’ wall

O.D. 3’’ thru 96’’, 14ga thru 3/8’’ wall, smooth flow and mitered elbows

N.P.S. A774/ A403CR / A403WPW/ A403WPWX 3’’ thru 36”

SPOOLING/FABRICATION

We at DB Piping Group, also focus on projects and offer shop spooling of piping in accordance with your drawings and specifications. We offer our expertise in the following areas:
• Stainless Steel & Special Alloy Welded Pipe, A-778, A-409, A-312, A-358 and welded A-240
• Stainless Steel & Special Alloy Butt Weld Fittings, A-774, A-403
• Flanges, Stainless Steel, Plate, AWWA, Angle Rings
• Stainless Steel & Special Alloy Pipe Fabrication & Spooling
• Alloys include: 304L, 316L, 317L, Duplex 2205, Alloy 20 and others

We have facilities in Brockville, Ontario, Milton, Florida and Portland, Maine

 Pritchard Divisions

Pritchard's expertise includes 100 years of industrial solutions including power generation from Kohler Generators, compressed air systems, diesel engines, hydraulics, machining, welding, and metal fabrication.

Learn More...

Who is Pritchard?

Since 1923, clients have been depending on Pritchard as their top quality, one-stop industrial solutions provider for machine and equipment challenges – large and small, simple and complex.

Pritchard is committed to providing the very best in industrial products and services, manufacturing, sales, service and distribution. Operating on a foundation of honesty, integrity and respect, our expertise in six key divisions enables us to provide complete, informed, expert solutions in the areas of machining, welding, metal fabrication, compressor and power systems, diesel engines and hydraulic systems.

Whatever the challenge, Pritchard can deliver – with the experience, knowledge and resources to handle any job.

Pritchard & You

At Pritchard our goal is to always exceed your expectations using the highest standards.

As a Canadian company in a competitive market, Pritchard has spent nearly 100 years building a name you can trust. This is how we have grown a Century long tradition of the highest standards. We demand the same high standards from our suppliers and any brands we endorse. Pritchard only provides quality products and precise services which have proven themselves superior – so that we can always meet your expectations.

Custom Metal Fabrication

We provides quality contract and custom metal fabrication for clients in Western Canada, Northern Ontario and the US Midwest. Our experience includes a broad range of industrial sectors, including agriculture, mining, aerospace, construction and transportation.

Backed by an engineer and engineering technologist, our highly skilled team has expertise working within the most demanding design parameters, so we can take on just about any specialized manufacturing requirement you have.

» Learn More About Pritchard Metalfab...

We rebuild diesel engines, perform a professional engine installation, or retrofit just about every diesel engine. We also provide complete repower engine solutions for older equipment or can complete a full engine overhaul. Our extensive service experience, combined with our ongoing investment in training combined with the latest equipment to work with diesel components, are Pritchard Dieseltech’s assurance to you that the job will be done right.

We are the master distributor for Deutz and full service dealers for Perkins, Isuzu and Kubota.

» Learn More About Pritchard Diesltech...

We provide our clients in the Winnipeg and Toronto areas with only the best power system & generator solutions, which we have been doing for over half a century. We are a proud distributor of Kohler Generators for the provinces of Saskatchewan, Manitoba & Ontario. Our team of engineers & certified technicians are experienced in all areas of power generation to get the job done right with the least amount of disruption to your family or business. » Learn More...

Pritchard Power Systems offers a full line of generators ranging from 8kW to 2800kW in diesel, natural gas, and propane with the option of delivery and installation of our products to almost any location with 24 hour emergency service.

» Learn More About Pritchard Power Systems...





We are a full-service fluid power resource for a wide range of applications including hydraulics, hydraulic repairs, pneumatics, servo positioning, fluid purification and materials handling. Our service technicians and fluid power specialists possess a wide range of skills and experience in fluid power to ensure all hydraulic repairs to any hydraulic system is done properly.

Pritchard Hydra-motion supplies, services, installs and commissions equipment from such premium manufacturers as Danfoss, Argo-Hytos, and Donaldson

Pritchard Industrial specializes in evaluating each customer’s compressed air application and provides the most efficient and effective compressor and air system solutions. Kaeser products are designed for reliable performance, energy efficiency and easy maintenance. Kaeser has been producing compressors since 1937. Kaeser’s proprietary developments and equipment designs have helped many customers save thousands of dollars in energy costs every year. Kaeser products are designed to work together to achieve maximum efficiency, reliability, and optimum performance.

DV Systems Designs, Engineers & Manufactures Efficient, Performance-Driven Compressed Air Technology Solutions.

Pritchard Machine is a comprehensive machining & welding resource with capabilities and experience that allow us to provide our customers with the exact product they require. Our Core Values

With over 69 years of experience in the industry, David W. Wilson Manufacturing Ltd., has established a reputation for quality, dependability and service. We manufacture custom parts and assemblies for a diversified group of clients that cover a wide range of applications, including; material handling, mining equipment, transportation support, refrigeration components, prototypes and more.

High Quality

Whether it is a single custom part or a large quantity, David W Wilson Manufacturing Ltd. takes pride in delivering top quality products on time and within budget. Tight tolerances and demanding Quality requirements ensure that your needs are met every time.  Machines with quick acceleration and short tool changes, along with easy to use machine interfaces enable our Team Members to do great things for our Customers every day!

Excellent Service

We have over 50 skilled employees that are dedicated to producing top quality products, on time that meets or exceeds customer specifications. Our experienced and knowledgeable staff are always eager to assist you with any details of your order and can even lend a hand in the design stages with our CAD system.

Leading-Edge Technology

The current facility covers 65,000 square feet of manufacturing space. The plant houses the latest in technology in both fabricating and machining. We have the capabilities to handle a wide variety of materials, including steel, aluminum, copper, and even plastics.

Welcome to Camalor

"An integrated, safe, high quality manufacturing company providing a turn-key sourcing option: from DESIGN and ENGINEERING, through to PRODUCTION, PACKAGING and SHIPPING."

Fabrication in Metal, Injection Molding & Painting

Camalor Mfg. Inc.is all about your metal fabrication needs. In our 43,000 square foot plant, operations such as tube bending/fabrication, small stamping, welding, and finishing occur. Complementing our metal tube fabrication we have injection molding up to 750 Ton, E-Coat and Powder Coat painting, robotic welding and several assembly lines. Our emphasis on our customers ensures that jobs are completed and delivered on time, every time with a high standard of quality.

At Camalor Mfg. Inc., we have the ability to take your product/component ideas and make them real! Using our Solidworks CAD system we can design your product, then turn the design into production and deliver a quality product.

Fondée en 1997, Sofatec est née d'une association de quatre personnes ayant chacune plus de vingt ans d'expérience dans la fabrication de machinerie et de pièces mécanosoudées. Avec ses 80 employés, Sofatec est maintenant en mesure de répondre à une clientèle de plus en plus grande et de lui donner entière satisfaction.

Sofatec a la capacité de concevoir et fabriquer l'unique produit qui garantis le succès de l'opération tel que vous l'aviez planifié. L'équipe de SOFATEC peut travailler à partir de vos dessins ou à partir de vos feuilles de données. Les dessins de fabrication détaillés seront générés utilisant notre système CAD avancé. Les calculs de conception pour les vaisseaux sous pression seront effectués avec des programmes d'ordinateur tesl que Compress.

	

Founded in 1997, Sofatec was born from the association of four individuals, each with over 20 years experience in the manufacturing of machinery and mechanical welding of parts industry. With over 80 employees, Sofatec is able to respond to an increasingly large clientele and deliver total satisfaction. Sofatec has always believed that a commitment to quality and workmanship are the backbone to any successful manufacturing process. Sofatec has the ability to design, engineer and fabricate the unique custom product that ensure the successful operation as you have planned. Sofatec team can work from your drawings or from your data sheets.

Detailed fabrication drawings can be generated through our state of art CAD system. Calculation can be made on pressure vessels designs using our extensive set of computer programs such as Compress.

About Hillmar

Hillmar has been developing reliable and innovative storm brakes, thrusters, thruster disc brakes, cable reels and industrial disc brakes products since 1979. Today our focus remains on storm brakes, thrusters, thruster disc brakes, cable reels and industrial disc brakes products that provide reliable solutions for crane maker worldwide.

With each product group of storm brakes, thrusters, thruster disc brakes, cable reels and industrial disc brakes products, you will find solutions for any wind protection stopping protector or power supply problem you may have.

For details of our storm brakes, thrusters, thruster disc brakes, cable reels and industrial disc brakes products, please go to our product page.

DRAFTING, ESTIMATING, ENGINEERING & DESIGN

Garneau overseas a team of experienced professionals with design expertise in various aspects of structural steel fabrication and erection.

Garneau Manufacturing is an integrated upstream and midstream fabrication services provider to the energy and resource industry, covering the extent of the product life-cycle and all spectrums of its clients’ projects.

About Garneau Manufacturing Inc.

Located in Morinville, Alberta, Garneau Manufacturing offers structural metal fabrication services to a broad range of industries. With over 40 years of experience, our knowledgeable staff are uniquely qualified to take your project from design to finished product, providing turnkey fabrication services.

Our expertise in structural fabrication services provides us with the ability to understand your application and work with you to recommend the most effective fabrication and finishing services to ensure that the product we manufacture will meet all your application requirements. We’ll provide the solution so that your project is done right, on time and on budget.

We serve all industries, specializing in the oil and gas, power generation, offshore construction, railroad, petrochemical, mining and process equipment industries.

What's New at Our Morinville Shop!
We now have CNC Equipment Services!

Garneau Manufacturing has a dedicated team of CNC Equipment operators who can cut and drill plate, angle iron, steel beams, pipe.. Practically, anything upon request and to specifications.  Whether it be for a larger module or steel for an individual job, Garneau’s CNC equipment is ready to serve. We have three pieces of equipment:

BC-50 Robotic Plasma Cutting System
HSFDB 2500/C High Speed Plate Processor
PCD 1100 Beam Drill Line 
Learn more about our CNC Equipment

Garneau Manufacturing operates from a modern 37,500 square foot fabrication facility within a 6 acre laydown module yard located in Morinville, Alberta.

Unique Solutions
Custom Fabrication

Custom metalwork fabrication refers to the process of creating bespoke metal products or components to meet the specific needs of a particular customer or application. This type of fabrication typically involves the use of specialized equipment and machinery, as well as skilled workers, to produce high-quality metal products that are tailored to the unique requirements of the customer. The process of custom metalwork fabrication often involves several steps, including design and engineering, cutting and shaping, welding and assembly, and finishing and coating, to produce finished products that meet the exact specifications of the customer.

ALLIED GROUP
The Allied Group consists of two metal manufacturing companies that work closely together to carry out innovative projects. Using cutting-edge technologies, these companies combine their skills and resources to offer customized solutions.

Their synergy maximizes efficiency and innovation, ensuring exceptional results.

The Allied Group stands out for its commitment to innovation, collaboration, quality, and transforming ideas into concrete achievements through advanced expertise and an integrated approach.



For over 80 years, The Allied Entreprises has been the reference for sheet metal transformation in the greater Montreal area. In our modern facilities of over 40,000 square feet, located in Ville St-Laurent, we carry out projects of all sizes with state-of-the-art machinery that meets the high standards of precision and quality required by our clients.
Métal Sigma has been recognized for its expertise in sheet metal transformation and painting since 2004. With facilities of over 42,000 square feet, Métal Sigma offers a turnkey solution by handling all stages of your product’s manufacturing.

‍Métal Sigma uses cutting-edge technologies to serve your projects.
Contact
Services
Design
The products are designed by our technicians andengineers to ensure the feasibility of your concepts and reduce productioncosts through design improvement.
Laser Cutting
For unmatched precision and definition, regardless of the desired shape of the piece.
N/C Press Cutting
A precise and fast technique for perforation, cutting, and embossing.
Machining
Ready-to-use products for timely turnkey solutions.
Crimping
There is no limit to the available metal inserts, including studs and nuts (PEM nuts), to ensure stability.
Welding Service
Our various welding processes at your disposal. You can choose from different techniques: MIG (metal inert gas), TIG (tungsten inert gas), or spot welding. Our welding workshop is fully certified and compliant with all relevant industrial standards.

N/C Bending
From the simplest folds to the most complex ones, our state-of-the-art equipment will produce superior results, piece after piece.
Assembly Services
Métal Sigma offers a variety of assembly services: electrical harnesses, mechanical, and electromechanical.
Finishing
A five-stage continuous electrostatic coating line: Batch-type electrostatic coating – for small batches or large pieces.
Painting
Colorful Looks
Give your metal part a unique aesthetic appearance.

Available to you: electrostatic powder coating, liquid coating, e-coating process, etc.
Anodizing
Combining The Pleasant 
and The Useful
Prevent corrosion, wear, and heat from damaging your metal part. Anodizing is a surface treatment that is not only very effective but also durable and aesthetically pleasing.
Coating
Give a New Look
Thanks to our metal plating technique, your metal part can change appearance and withstand the test of time. It's a compelling option to consider for your sheet metal transformation needs.
Galvanization
You want to avoid products that are prone to corrosion. That's why The Allied Group meticulously galvanizes your metal parts by applying a layer of molten zinc to ensure long-lasting durability.
Heat
Treatment
Through heat treatment, we can shape and refineyour metal part to achieve the desired form and appearance.
Other On Demand Treatments
We invite you to share your metal manufacturing projects with us. Let us help bring your ideas to life with our expertise and precision.
Projects
Discover our approach and let’s collaborate to bring your metal transformation projects to life.
Certifications
Others

Officially approved by Hydro-Québec,
according to standard SN29.3i, for powder coatings.

Our Services
Mechanical Division
Mechanical

St. Clair boasts a 30,000 sq. ft. fabrication shop and 24,000 sq. ft. storage located on 47 acres, offering extensive pre/post-fabrication material accommodation.

Civil Division
Civil

St. Clair Civil’s experienced supervisors excel in safe, efficient construction, recently managing extensive soil removal, support construction, and cement pours for major projects.

Electrical Division
Electrical

St. Clair Electrical, with 35 years of experience, manages large-scale projects with a skilled workforce, ensuring safety and client satisfaction.

Pipeline Division
Pipeline

St. Clair serves top North American oil and gas clients, offering project management, inspection, fabrication, installation, maintenance, and testing of pipeline systems and equipment.

History

Established 24 years ago just outside of Sarnia, in Brigden, Ontario, St. Clair Mechanical Inc. started as a piping structural contractor and has now expanded to offer Civil and Electrical services. Our company works on mid to large scale construction of Piping, Mechanical, Civil, and Electrical installations. Our personnel have the experience and expertise to meet the technically challenging requirements for any size project, from design through to procurement and then the fabrication and installation leading to project construction completion and turnover. St. Clair Mechanical’s growing success is built on a combination of safety first, quality second and overall teamwork.

MANDATE

Our mandate is to provide competent and complete services to our Clients and to depend on repeat business and referrals for the bulk of our revenue.

SAFETY RECORD

Safety is our priority and the fact is impressed on our employees. The Sarnia Lambton Industrial Education Cooperative is our go to group for the majority of our employee Safety needs and training.

GOAL

To maintain our client base and to not lose any current customers. To increase our client base in a controlled and capable manner and to minimize our employee turnover.

QUALITY CONTROL

Our quality control group is composed of team members who hold C.W.B. I and II, T.S.S.A. G.P.I., A.P.I. 1169 and C.W.B. Welding Supervisor ticket. At times we do increase our staff members but always with the same minimum qualifications.

At Aggressive Tube Bending, we’re proud to provide a full range of personalized pipe, tube, and structural steel services.
Learn More
Big News!
Aggressive Tube Bending is pleased to share some big changes coming down the pipes. We are opening a boiler shop!
Why choose us?
Our 34+ years of forming pipe, tube, structural steel and aluminum has positioned us to step into a new role, to provide specialized support for our local BC-based forestry and refinery facilities.
Experience at your service ...
We are a full service facility
OUR PROCESS
We take your project from start to finish
The Aggressive Tube Bending team has seen countless projects to completion, offering unparalleled design and manufacturing expertise at every level. With focuses on fabrication, forming and manufacturing, we offer tube bending in Vancouver and a wide range of services, including:
Pipe welding
Light metal fab
Beam bending
Custom railings
Roll bending
CNC machining
Whether we’re working on structural steel, high-capacity pipes or light metal, our team aims for safety and precision in everything we do.
Contact Us
Our work is our passion ...
METAL FABRICATING
A name like Aggressive Tube Bending suggests that all we do is bend tubing. Not at all! In addition to our multifaceted forming capacities we offer a full metal fabrication department. With CWB (Canadian Welding Bureau) certification in both steel and aluminum, and a B.C. Boiler branch A contractor’s license for pressure welding, we can weld to the most demanding specifications.
Read More
FORMING
Aggressive Tube Bending provides precision pipe and tube bending, coiling, beam bending, angle, channel and other structural steel forming in steel, stainless steel, aluminum, brass, titanium, and other alloys. We have an extensive selection of bending equipment and dies with in-house machining capabilities to ensure rapid turnaround on dies for specialized sizes and profiles.
Read More
METAL MANUFACTURING
Aggressive Tube Bending’s manufacturing capabilities include a CNC bending machine, a CNC lathe, and a CNC milling machine which provide cost-effective production forming and machining capacity. From hydraulic power units and oil spill control equipment to bike racks, playground components, and store fixtures, our manufacturing expertise covers a wide range of products.
Read More
WELDING
We provide state-of-the-art pipe welding in Surrey and Vancouver for a wide range of projects. Our team specializes in pipe spooling services, welding pipes, flanges, and fittings for specific plumbing needs. We offer custom welding services to our clients as per their project’s specifications. You can count on us for cost-effective and dependable welding services.

Company Values

Customer-Focused

Canyon Rigging is a customer-focused company. We strive to exceed expectations with fast turnaround times and quality products. We employ local, hardworking Canadians with a solid work ethic and attention to detail.

Every product supplied to you by Canyon Rigging is made with pride. We’ve been serving the oil and gas, construction, and agriculture sectors for more than 20 years and we value our customer relationships above all else.

LEARN MORE
Quality Products

Quality is non-negotiable. We have a wide variety of truck straps, cargo securement, tire chains, wire rope, chain slings, round slings, polyester and nylon slings, levers, blocks, hoists, winch lines, crane lines, and more.

Every product is made to perfection and tested relentlessly to ensure its safety. Every piece of equipment is tagged with a working-load limit and tested on a pull tester – the most advanced in southern Alberta. Quality is paramount when it comes to Canyon Rigging equipment.

About MRS

Established in 1996, Maintenance Repair Service (MRS) is the retail industry's premier provider of real-time maintenance solutions for commercial properties in the Greater Ottawa and Toronto areas.

We offer a comprehensive range of services; Plumbing, electrical, general, and preventative maintenance, repairs and installation of food equipment, custom metalwork, plexiglass, and wood fabrication, repairs for refrigeration, flooring and tile, cart maintenance, and full store renovations. About REF Alabama

REF designs and manufactures electrical power components utilizing high-volume precision machining, as well as custom-fabricated structural products and assemblies for the OEM, industrial, automotive and renewables markets. REF is an industry-renowned leader in high-speed automated manufacturing of custom aluminum, copper, and steel shapes, known for exceptional quality.

What We Do

REF has the capability to supply bar-stock semi-finished or finished parts, and in-house vibratory finishing and tool grinding. REF's state-of-the-art in-line progressive machining centers, designed and built by REF engineers, allow REF to out produce and out price conventional machine shops. REF's facilities feature 52 in-line machining centers to handle large job needs.

DIVISIONS

INKAS® Group of Companies is a global conglomerate comprised of a group of industry-leading companies that specialize in the aid of civilian safety, environmental protection, financial aid, security, logistics, fabrication and manufacturing.

VEHICLE MODIFICATION
AND CONVERSION

INKAS® Armored Vehicle Manufacturing produces a variety of luxury, cash-in-transit and special purpose armored vehicles.

AEROSPACE &
DEFENSE

INKAS® Aerospace & Defense delivers comprehensive, cyber intelligence and training solutions for various industries.

SAFE
MANUFACTURING

INKAS® Safe Manufacturing specializes in a wide variety of custom-made and industry standard safes, vaults and depository boxes.

PROFESSIONAL
VEHICLES

INKAS® Professional Vehicle Manufacturing produces luxury limousines as well as customized fleet and livery vehicles.

PAYMENT
SOLUTIONS

INKAS® Payments Corp. provides point-of-sale, merchant services, gift and loyalty programs within various geographical markets.

ENVIRONMENTAL
PROTECTION

INKASTRANS Canada Inc., provides its clients with oil spill cleanup solutions and remediation services on a global scale.

METAL
FABRICATION

Premium metal fabrication services utilizing the latest state-of-the-art machinery serving both industrial and commercial sectors.

At INKAS® we strive for excellence and work towards

LONG TERM
RELATIONSHIPS
GOVERNMENTS

INKAS® has extensive experience working with federal and provincial governments, and numerous authorities worldwide. Among our clients are the UN, NATO, the Government of Canada, the Government of the United States as well as embassies of different countries. By delivering high-quality product and services for over 20 years, INKAS® was able to accumulate comprehensive knowledge working with various international requirements and regulations.

TRUSTED PARTNERSHIPS

INKAS® has provided a number of security products and services to financial institutions, corporations and private clients on a global scale. Through the implementation of best practices in innovation and design, very strict quality control procedures as well as third-party independent laboratory testing, INKAS® is proud to achieve industry-leading near 100% satisfaction rates throughout its network.

LAW ENFORCEMENT

The law enforcement work environment implies high risks and dangerous conditions for a number of reasons. In order to ensure maximum protection and create a safe work environment for those who are protecting our community, INKAS® designs products that meet the highest international standards as a result of their first-class assembly, implementation of the best technological practices and quality management system.

COMMUNITY

INKAS® is proud of its vital part in communities everywhere and realizes the commitment and dedication it requires to ensure its products are up to the task of protecting people in every home, town, city, and country INKAS® products are sold. Closer to home, INKAS® has become recognized for its success and impact on the local community, winning multiple awards and continuously giving back to the employees
and community.

KHAZANSKI
FOUNDATION

The Khazanski Foundation supports the advancement of medical research and innovation and contributes to great causes in our community through organizations such as those that provide support to youth and unprivileged families.

Our mission is to promote and support the well-being of individuals in Canada and around the world through raising awareness of critical issues, investing in innovation, and providing financial support.

INKAS® ARMORED VEHICLE MANUFACTURING ANNOUNCES 2024 “RISING STAR” SCHOLARSHIP RECIPIENTS

SERVICES
SERVICES
SERVICES



Water-jet Cutting

You can cut from 5/128" to 6’' thick material

IS THE WATERJET FOR YOU ?

The ideal waterjet cutting system for large steel & aluminum plate Waterjet is the most versatile process, able to cut almost any type of steel or aluminum.

Waterjet is a very precise cutting process. It has a narrow kerf width, allowing fine contours to be cut, and producing high tolerance parts from any metals, including mild steel, stainless steel, and aluminum.

LEARN MORE

Plasma cutting

you can cut from 5/128” to 2.5” thick material

NEED TO SAVE MONEY AND TIME?

Plasma can be used for cutting metals such as stainless steel, aluminium and copper, of varying thicknesses. It can cut both ferrous and nonferrous metals, but non-conductive materials such as wood or plastic cannot be cut with a plasma cutter. Plasma is faster than a water jet and a laser cutting systems for thickness over 3mm

LEARN MORE

Press Brake

Bend the thinnest material to 2”

BENDING TO SAVE TIME AND MONEY

Our array of state-of-the-art press brakes are capable of handling simple to complex and light gauge to heavy plate custom and production forming

LEARN MORE


Welding Services

For well over 35 years, our business has been focused on offering welding, complete custom metal fabrication from concept, design and drafting to fabrication and finishing. Located in Linden, we offer mobile and in-shop welding and custom fabrication services. Our knowledgeable and experienced certified welders can build, modify or repair to your specifications. We specialize in steel, aluminum, stainless materials.

LEARN MORE

Shot-blasting

Speed up the surface preparation by 75% ensuring you have your product quicker for the next step.

Shot blasting is the process in which metal is abrasively shot at another metal surface. This is not to be confused with sandblasting, which is a similar method. However, sand is used rather than shot. Blasting is used in a wide variety of industries including, steel, forging and the aerospace industry. This is because it is often regarded as one of the most effective tools, while maintain cost effective results.

LEARN MORE

Powder Coating

In addition to being durable, powder coating is an attractive choice due to environmental advantages.

Powder coating is a high-quality finish found on thousands of products you come in contact with each day. Powder coating protects the roughest, toughest machinery as well as the household items you depend on daily. It provides a more durable finish than liquid paints can offer, while still providing an attractive finish. Powder coated products are more resistant to diminished coating quality as a result of impact, moisture, chemicals, ultraviolet light, and other extreme weather conditions. In turn, this reduces the risk of scratches, chipping, abrasions, corrosion, fading, and other wear issues.

LEARN MORE


CNC Shop

Our Machine shop has high end mills and lathes that will hit the tolerances you need. CBI offers 3 vertical mills and 1 Horizontal mill. Paired with our mills we have 3 CNC lathes and 1 manual lathe.

LEARN MORE
Assembly

At CBI we have experienced mechanics installing and assembling final products so you can rest assured that your product has been properly put together and installed.

LEARN MORE
CAD Drawing

Here at CBI we have Engineer techs for designing projects, so you can get your products modeled in CAD software at a low price. CBI is also a part owner in an Engineering company (Sparta) that employs professional engineers that can run calculations and stamped drawings. We have the power and knowledge to get your idea modeled the way you want it

LEARN MORE

BRINGING BUILDINGS TO LIFE SINCE 1927

WHO WE ARE

In 1927, Trotter & Morton began its journey as a plumbing and heating company with a pioneering spirit. Today, the Trotter & Morton Group of Companies continue as a diverse group of building trades experts from Vancouver to Winnipeg and Seattle to San Antonio.

WE DELIVER RESULTS

Trotter & Morton Facility Services worked over 320,000 labour-hours in 2020 servicing more than 15 million square feet of facilities for over 10,000 customers across North America. They completed over 30,000 service calls, drove over 1 million miles and maintained over 1800 service agreements.

Asphalt is 100% recyclable and remains the most recycled product in north America

2020 was one of Trotter & Morton's most successful years, with even more projects on the way.

Trotter & Morton's construction on the new YYC Airport Terminal is one of the largest projects in Alberta's history. Trotter & Morton Mechanical installed a heating and cooling system utilizing 600 geothermal wells and 660 kilometers of in-floor radiant tubing as part of a project that featured multiple renewable technologies.

NEW LOOK, SAME GREAT COMPANY
TROTTER & MORTON GROUP OF COMPANIES
Bow River

Bow River Paving was founded in 1991 and has extensive experience with residential and commercial pavement installations and all types of pavement maintenance and resurfacing. From asphalt overlays, new asphalt for driveways, roadways, parking lots, or golf cart paths, to concrete services, including stamped and textured surfaces, our expertise is unparalleled.

Learn More
Building Technologies

Trotter & Morton Building Technologies offers comprehensive solutions for all of your construction needs. Specializing in Electrical, Data/Communications, Security, Mechanical, and Sheet Metal construction of projects of all sizes and scopes, our team has the knowledge and expertise to make your project vision a reality.

Learn More
Facility Services

Trotter & Morton Facility Service specializes in maintenance and repair of heating and air conditioning systems, building and system analysis, design/installation/upgrade, control systems, indoor air quality, energy benchmarking and assessments, and all other elements of commercial and industrial environmental systems.

Learn More
Industrial Contracting

Trotter & Morton Industrial Contracting specializes in general, mechanical, and electrical construction and maintenance services for the industrial, oil and gas, energy, municipal water and wastewater infrastructure and mining industries. Our professional team has a wealth of industrial construction management experience and knowledge that is integral to the success of our projects.

Learn More
Rambler

Rambler Fabrication is backed by over 90 years of construction expertise. Our people have built a reputation completing the most challenging projects safely, on time and on budget. We offer top quality workmanship in pipe fabrication and welding, as well as personalized customer service throughout the entire process, from estimate to delivery.

Learn More
Whaler

Whaler Industrial Contracting has serviced the Oil and Gas Industry as a General Contractor in Western Canada for the past 15 years. In this time, Whaler been able to tailor their construction and management services to meet and exceed the needs of the largest and most demanding oil and gas companies in Canada.

Learn More
Centec

Centec Electric & Controls offer complete Industrial Electrical Services, operating in the Brandon Manitoba area since 2000. We have spent 20 years dedicated to building our reputation as a dependable Industrial Electrical Contractor with an emphasis on Quality and Safety. In 2005, we became COR safety certified and have held an exceptional score every year since. In 2016, we reached the pinnacle standard of quality recognition by achieving our ISO 9001:2015 accreditation.While other companies “work to quality standards”, we went the extra step and realized that the proof is in the documentation.

VALUE-ADDED SERVICE FROM A CANADIAN-OWNED COMPANY
At National Hose & Equipment Ltd, we are committed to providing a value-added service that encompasses Safety, Quality, and Reliability. As an ISO 9001:2015 compliant company we look for continuous improvement in what we do and how we do it, we have been servicing Canada and markets overseas for over 40 years, bringing decades of knowledge, and experience which translates into savings for our customers and their specific needs and applications. We are very proud to have partnered with some of the most recognized manufacturers in the world today, whether it’s Industrial or Hydraulic hose, fittings, standard or made-to-order assemblies, or just accessories and equipment we have the inventory & customer service levels to find you solutions at competitive prices and delivered them on time!
INDUSTRIAL HOSE & ASSEMBLIES
Industrial Hose is a broad category of hoses that encompass a wide range of applications, from the everyday hoses used for air and water service in shops and plants, to specialized chemical hoses designed to safely transport some of the world's most hazardous chemicals. Each of these hoses are engineered with safety, durability, and performance in mind.
HYDRAULIC HOSE
We offer Hydraulic Hose products for every application from Industrial to marine and everything in between, with high-pressure and high-temperature hydraulic hose products available in a wide range of pressure ratings, materials, and styles.
HYDRAULIC COUPLINGS, ADAPTERS & QUICK DISCONNECTS
We offer an extensive range of hydraulic hose Couplings, Adapters, and Quick Disconnects for a wide range of industries and applications. Used for decades by some of America’s major manufacturers.
HOSE PROTECTION & ACCESSORIES
Our extensive range of Hose Protection products adds safety and helps ensure they last longer, we also offer related accessories.
FLEXCOMP COMPOSITE HOSES, FITTINGS & ASSEMBLIES
When it's critical for the safe transfer of Chemical, Petroleum, High Temperature, or Cryogenic fluids, Our Flexcomp Hose products have a solution that will work for you.
SANITARY HOSE, FITTINGS & ACCESSORIES
We are your leading source for Rubber, PVC, Silicone, Teflon & Metal hose assemblies for the food and beverage and cosmetic and pharmaceutical Industries, We offer a complete line of 3A hoses & assemblies, as well as hoses for wash-down service and plant clean-up, with fittings, adapters, nozzles and more.
CORRUGATED & STRIPWOUND FLEXIBLE METAL HOSE & ASSEMBLIES
We supply flexible braided convoluted hose, metal hose assemblies and expansion joints. Our products meet all compliance requirements from the oil, pulp and paper, steel industries and many more. CRN's, UL & CSA approvals are just a few of the approvals we can delivery on these hoses.
TEFLON LINED HOSE, FITTINGS & ACCESSORIES
Hose, fittings, and custom-made hose assemblies designed for high & low temperatures and pressures transferring corrosive products in harsh environments.
INDUSTRIAL FITTINGS & CLAMPS
When you need hose connections, we’ve got them. We carry a complete line of Industrial Fittings and Brand Names from Campbell Fittings, Dixon Valve, and PT Coupling, We can help you select the right fittings that will give you the reliable connections you need to keep your business moving.

SANITARY HOSE, FITTINGS & ACCESSORIES
We are your leading source for Rubber, PVC, Silicone, Teflon & Metal hose assemblies for the food and beverage and cosmetic and pharmaceutical Industries, We offer a complete line of 3A hoses & assemblies, as well as hoses for wash-down service and plant clean-up, with fittings, adapters, nozzles and more.
CORRUGATED & STRIPWOUND FLEXIBLE METAL HOSE & ASSEMBLIES
We supply flexible braided convoluted hose, metal hose assemblies and expansion joints. Our products meet all compliance requirements from the oil, pulp and paper, steel industries and many more. CRN's, UL & CSA approvals are just a few of the approvals we can delivery on these hoses.
TEFLON LINED HOSE, FITTINGS & ACCESSORIES
Hose, fittings, and custom-made hose assemblies designed for high & low temperatures and pressures transferring corrosive products in harsh environments.
INDUSTRIAL FITTINGS & CLAMPS
When you need hose connections, we’ve got them. We carry a complete line of Industrial Fittings and Brand Names from Campbell Fittings, Dixon Valve, and PT Coupling, We can help you select the right fittings that will give you the reliable connections you need to keep your business moving.
INDUSTRIAL HOSE & ASSEMBLIES
Industrial Hose is a broad category of hoses that encompass a wide range of applications, from the everyday hoses used for air and water service in shops and plants, to specialized chemical hoses designed to safely transport some of the world's most hazardous chemicals. Each of these hoses are engineered with safety, durability, and performance in mind.
HYDRAULIC HOSE
We offer Hydraulic Hose products for every application from Industrial to marine and everything in between, with high-pressure and high-temperature hydraulic hose products available in a wide range of pressure ratings, materials, and styles.
HYDRAULIC COUPLINGS, ADAPTERS & QUICK DISCONNECTS
We offer an extensive range of hydraulic hose Couplings, Adapters, and Quick Disconnects for a wide range of industries and applications. Used for decades by some of America’s major manufacturers.
HOSE PROTECTION & ACCESSORIES

A Full-Service Experience For Custom Metal Fabrication

Your project deserves quality work throughout the entire manufacturing process; we have the expertise and equipment required to fabricate your finished product with precision.

Waycon goes beyond the standard fabrication practices to provide our clients with a complete, end-to-end manufacturing experience covering every stage of an industrial project. From short production runs to large-scale custom metal fabrication equipment, we have all the capabilities required for metal manufacturing in-house, allowing us to deliver flexible and fast turnaround times.

Raymond Jodoin, Quanta Services

Waycon’s commitment to quality, reliability, and on-time delivery, along with their advanced engineering support and expertise in design for manufacturing, has played a key role in our success. We highly recommend Waycon as a reliable turnkey solution provider.

Why Choose Waycon for Turnkey Manufacturing Solutions
Full-Service Support

Waycon offers comprehensive support from the initial design phase to project completion for any of our services including design, engineering, and manufacturing. Clients can rely on a single point of contact for all their project needs, ensuring an integrated process throughout the product lifecycle.

Advanced Tools and Equipment

We utilize a wide range of modern tools and machinery, including cranes, heavy fabrication and welding equipment, brake presses, CNC cutting, and CNC machining equipment. Additionally, we use software such as SolidWorks and Mastercam to enhance our manufacturing capabilities.

Experience and Expertise

Our skilled technical team has extensive knowledge across various industries, including mining, automation, forestry, and waste-to-energy. We focus on practical problem-solving to adapt to specific project needs.

Reliable & Quick Deliverables

By maintaining full control over the manufacturing process, we can adapt quickly when necessary. This flexibility ensures that we meet deadlines and deliver products reliably.

Quality and Precision

At Waycon, we adhere to strict industry standards and are CWB-certified. Our engineering team possesses extensive knowledge and hands-on experience, enabling us to meet high-quality requirements while creating products designed for manufacturability.

Design for Manufacturability

We take designs from concept to finished product, managing projects throughout their entire lifecycle. Our team focuses on integrating systems and providing manufacturing expertise, allowing for modifications during manufacturing to enhance both the process and the product.
