Our Products
Proprietary Equipment

Over the years, we have created our own line of proprietary equipment by collaborating with industry partners and incorporating feedback and needs from our customers.

Forestry Cabs

We manufacture purpose-built, heavy-duty forestry cabs and excavator conversions for various operations. Available in Standard Cab, Side Entry, and Rear Entry options.

In-Motion Weigh Conveyor

Accurately captures the weight of products as they are introduced onto the packing line. Its smaller footprint captures accurate weight data at a high throughput.

Bin Drencher

Removes heat from fruit placed in drencher bins, slowing their respiration. This allows the fruit to be staged effectively for processing.

Hydro Cooling System

Rapidly cools produce in order to arrest natural respiration and maximize shelf life. Generally integrated as a step into a larger process in a packing plant.

5th Wheel Slide

Built to withstand heavy loads in any weather condition. Self-cleaning outside rail tooth design and UMHW inserts enable smooth sliding even with extreme weights.

Bin Dumper

Waycon’s cherry bin dumper is a robust and cost-effective solution for introducing bulk cherries to your packing line.

We’ve developed an interactive virtual tour so you can explore our 40,000-square-foot facility in Penticton, BC. This feature allows you to discover where we complete everything from engineering and production to assembly and shipping.

FABRIQUÉS AU CANADA

À votre service partout dans le monde

Flex-Pression est le seul fabricant de boyaux flexibles en acier inoxydable au Canada. Nous sommes déterminés à offrir des solutions sur mesure à tous nos clients, peu importe leur secteur d’activités et leurs besoins. Nous nous distinguons par notre service à la clientèle hors pair et un contrôle de la qualité de nos produits et services incomparable. Nous offrons entre autres des services d’ingénierie, l’inspection et la certification de vos installations, de la résolution de problèmes sur place, de même que de la formation sur place. En tant que manufacturiers de produits d’acier depuis 1973, nous sommes toujours à l’avant-garde de la technologie dans le domaine de la tuyauterie flexible. Nous nous adaptons à tous vos besoins en matière d’assemblage de boyaux flexibles et nous offrons un service clé en main. Vous n’avez qu’à nous donner vos dessins signés ainsi que toute information pertinente et nous réaliserons le travail pour vous. N’hésitez pas à communiquer avec nous pour obtenir davantage d’information sur tous nos services.

En tant qu’uniques fabricants de boyaux flexibles en acier inoxydable au pays, nous sommes une référence dans l’industrie. Grâce à notre expertise, nous sommes en mesure de fabriquer des produits de haute qualité. Nous réalisons des assemblages flexibles certifiés CSA en acier inoxydable pour le transfert du chlore, de l’ammoniac anhydre, d’oxygène ou encore pour le transfert cryogénique. Nous offrons un vaste éventail de produits spécialisés tels que les boyaux ondulés annulaires, de boyaux ondulés hélicoïdaux, et des accessoires servant à la conception des assemblages sur mesure. Que ce soit des joints d’expansion, tous types de tuyaux en acier inoxydable, de tuyauterie flexible, de boyaux flexibles, de raccords en métal, ou de tuyaux en polymère, nous avons de nombreuses solutions pour répondre à tous vos besoins. Nous vous invitons à communiquer avec nous pour obtenir plus d’information sur nos produits.

Perfecting the Science of Sound

Specializing in custom-engineered noise, vibration, and thermal reduction solutions, Blachford Acoustics Group has the facilities, equipment, and technical experience to enhance the performance of your products.

VIEW OUR PRODUCTS

MATERIAL RESEARCH
& DEVELOPMENT

Our experts determine the source and path of noise, then apply an optimized treatment to lower manufacturing costs and reduce product weight and complexity.

CUSTOM DESIGN &
MANUFACTURING

By predicting much of the acoustical environment early in the design phase, we help you achieve noise control and sound quality requirements.

ACOUSTIC, VIBRATION
& THERMAL TESTING

Intensive product and material tests dramatically improve product sound quality and noise material packages while reducing cost and weight.

 PROUDLY SERVING CUSTOMERS AROUND THE GLOBE
Are noise, vibration or heat issues delaying your production schedule?

Acoustical, vibrational and thermal challenges can create product quality concerns and delay your production schedule, directly contributing to lower revenue, missed shipments, and customer & client dissatisfaction.

Does your team struggle with…

Lowering or eliminating excess noise, vibrations or thermal emissions?

The high cost, or lack of, product testing capabilities?

Production delays waiting on acoustic, vibration or thermal solutions?

Our Quality Program

Crown West steel is certified to ISO 9001:2015, the globally recognized standard that all larger scale manufacturers must meet.

Crown West’s Quality Program was developed to maintain a high level of customer satisfaction. Our staff and management team are committed and encouraged to work toward continual improvement of our products, services and manufacturing processes. Dedicated personnel, and teams work together to maintain our system and implement quality process and improvements. Our quality policy, which we have posted throughout our facilities, is QUALITY IS OUR COMMITMENT.

Our facility is certified by the Canadian Welding Bureau to level W47.1 in Division 2 and our welding procedures are certified to the American Petroleum Institute’s API 650.

Welcome to Windsor Industral Services

Windsor Industrial Services has been providing domestic and international customers with first-rate contract-manufacturing services since 1989.

As a recognized ISO-Certified facility, we routinely manufacture conveyor and material handling equipment which include custom and production applications for various markets.

Our manufacturing facility has more than 70,000 square feet which is home to our laser cutting operations, saw cutting, bending, welding, fitting and fabrication, machining, painting, and assembly operations. In addition, our facility is air-conditioned and under an umbrella of overhead cranes for the convenience and comfort of the best manufacturing employees available who are skilled and capable of producing large and complex metal fabrications held to tight tolerances and exacting specifications in large or small quantities.

We are a full-service organization that takes pride in offering our customers complete processing capabilities within one corporation.

We are an ISO 9001:2015 certified registered company with a dedicated skilled staff that continuously provides excellent service. Windsor Industrial Services invites you to visit its facilities.

Meet Windsor Industrial Services, Inc.
The People and the Their Work
We build and assemble parts and equipment based on customer designs

 

Roller equipment.
End of arm tooling, custom fabricated.
Production component manufacturing.
Material.
Platforms for industrial facilities.
What We Offer

Our production facilities consist of a new, state-of-the-art 71,000 square foot building in the Windsor, Ontario metropolitan area. Throughput in our shop takes jobs from prints to production through the process of laser and saw cutting, machining, bending, forming, welding, painting and final assembly. A representative listing of out fabrication equipment appears below.

Saw Cutting: (3) Hyd-Mech H-12 and (1) S-20 for mitre cutting
Laser Cutting: (1) Bystronic ByStar Fiber 3015 Fiber 10000 (10K)
Bending: Ermak Power Bend Falcon Press Brakes (2) 110 ton (1) 200 ton (1) 350 ton
Machining: (3) Hurco VMC’s VMX 42 (1) Kuraki VMC K24902 (1) FTP Boring Mill (1) Mazak Quick Turn 250 CNC 3-Axial Lathe
Fabrication: (12) Miller DELTAWELD 500 MIG welders in a variety of work cells with layout tables (3) Hydraulic Shop presses
Rolling: (1) PullMax Structural Rolling machine
Stress Relief: Bonal Technologies Meta-Lax 2700-CC
Paint: Custom designed wet-spray booth 12’ wide 10’ tall 29’ long with dedicated heated fresh air supply and exhaust
Assembly: 15,000 sq/ft of assembly space spread over 3 bays with 6 overhead cranes – all tools and equipment to support both production and custom assembly jobs
Electrical: After mechanical assembly is complete, WIS can offer additional installation of electrical hardware, wiring, and labels so that equipment is fully dressed out and ready to run when its loaded on a truck.
Testing: We do a run-off of the vast majority of our material handling equipment to ensure that all aspects of the build are functioning properly to our standards and that of our customers.
Quality: We are ISO 9001 certified with a robust quality program. Workstations with measurement equipment along with skilled technicians are spread throughout our manufacturing process to allow for frequent physical inspections.
TRUSTED SUPPLIER

As a Tier 1 supplier, we ship approximately 200,000 component parts annually averaging about 4,000 productions parts each week.

LASTING RELATIONSHIPS

Manufacturer of Hydraulic Cylinders and Accessories

Sealum Industries Ltd. offers experience in design and manufacturing of our products. From hydraulic cylinders and manifolds to 4-bolt flanges and pump motor adapters, our designs are rugged, economical, dependable and guaranteed by our engineering department. We design and manufacture all our products in house to control quality and accuracy, and with our wide range of CNC machining centres, we can ensure a large supply of stocked items. View our online catalog by selecting the type of product you are looking for. If you don't find exactly what you are looking for, we can most likely build it for you, the way you want it.

 Check out our latest DRUM CRUSHER video...

Click one of our four main product areas below for more information.

Cylinders

All styles of cylinders including bolt-on, temposonic, heavy duty, miniature, telescopic. Also accessories like mounting kits and seal kits.

Manifolds

All control manifolds such as single and multi-valve, bar manifolds, subplates and more. Also various manifold accessories.

Connectors & Fittings

Code 61 & 62 flanges, elbows, tees and adapters. Also couplings, weld-o-lets and suctions fittings.

Hydraulic Components

Check and ball valves, header and junction blocks, pump-motor adapters, clean-out covers and air breathers.

Video Collection

Elias Custom Metal Fabrication Ltd.
Industry Leader in Custom Metal Fabrication

Elias Custom Metal Fabrication Ltd. (ECM) is a precision sheet metal fabricating company with additional specialized laser tube-cutting services committed to fulfilling all your custom metal requirements. Operating since 1994, our company offers a full range of end-to-end services ranging from engineering design assistance, fabrication cost analysis, prototyping, production and logistics provision. Our operation is carried out in an 80,000 sq. ft. facility encompassing a 14,000 sq. ft. polishing department along with bending, welding, laser and tube-laser cutting, assembling and shipping stations that are fully equipped with the most advanced manufacturing equipment on the market and are available on-site. As a fully ISO certified company with over 25 years of expertise providing precision metal fabrication services to our clients at home and abroad, ECM has established itself as an industry leader specializing in custom made high-end store fixtures and displays, stainless steel conveyors, electrical enclosures and a range of industrial and commercial component parts. We are centrally located in the Greater Toronto Area (GTA) to conveniently serve our satisfied clients with exceptional quality products and service excellence.

C&W Industrial Fabrication and Marine Equipment Ltd.
Specializes in the design and fabrication of seafood processing equipment.

If you work in the Seafood Processing industry, having the right equipment is imperative. Since our company started in 1972, C & W Industrial Fabrication & Marine Equipment Ltd.  has offered seafood processing equipment to Canadian and international clients. We understand the needs of each of our clients are different, so whether you need equipment for seafood, including crab, lobster and shrimp or the offshore oil industry we can help. Our fabrication facility can provide you with offshore contracted services, as well as aluminum work and the production and repairs of pleasure crafts. To learn more about the services offered at C & W Industrial, contact us today.

INTERNATIONALLY RECOGNIZED

Located just metres from the harbour and shipping port, C & W Industrial is ideally situated to serve customers from around the globe. Our Bay Bulls fabrication facility contains 25,000 square feet of production space and is located on a three acre site. We have an additional 24 acre lay-down site a short distance from the main facility.

Who the “H” is “Humphrey”?


A “H”istory of Excellence
Humphrey is a Winnipeg based window and door manufacturer that has been satisfying customers in Western Canada for more than 50 years. We got our start when a group of window dealers combined in their search for higher quality windows and doors that could match the quality of their installations. The rest is a long history of excellence in designing, developing, manufacturing and supplying quality window and door products, built for the ever changing climate of the prairies.

Humphrey is focused on serving window and door professionals; renovators, contractors, glass shops, exterior specialists and discerning builders, looking for a product that will stand up and a manufacturer that will stand behind its products. Our warranties speak for themselves. We stand behind what we build. Tell me more…

“NXT Generation” Window and Door Systems

Humphrey “NXT Generation” window and door systems means a dedication to continual improvement in window and door design, quality and performance.

Humphrey windows and doors incorporate:

• The highest quality materials
• Tested and proven hardware
• The latest in energy efficient low-e glass and glass packages.
• Over fifty years of manufacturing experience
• Dedicated and accountable quality control process
• The latest technologies to enhance the performance of the glass, hardware, and operation of the window
Tell me more…

Made-to-Measure Precision

Every window is made to fit your exact specifications, can be fully customized to fit the design of your home or business, tested to exceed industry standards and based on precise measurements taken on-site by a Preferred Humphrey Dealer.

Quality Guarantee

Humphrey has developed its own unique and comprehensive quality control system, where through the use of state-of-the-art equipment, heavily researched and individually selected components, and favorable warranties has earned a reputation of providing outstanding value to our dealers and their customers. With thousands of windows and doors being shipped across Western Canada each year, Humphrey stands behind what we sell! Should something be found wrong in our product due to manufacturing error, or product defect, contact your “Preferred Humphrey Dealer” and they’ll take care of you. Tell me more…

Announcement
Metal Fabricators and Welding Ltd. has gone through expropriation with the City of Edmonton.

This, however, does not mean the end of Metal Fabricators. We have moved our operations to Midwest Fabricators Ltd. (16310 121A Avenue NW, Edmonton, AB T5V 1J9). Our staff has also moved to Midwest Fabricators allowing us to seamlessly serve our customers.

Calls and emails to Metal Fabricators will be routed to Midwest Fabricators. You can reach us at 780-447-0747.

I want to take this moment and say thank you to our customers, for giving us the opportunity to serve you for the last 70 years and look forward to working with you in the future.

Mark Gagnier,
President
Metal Fabricators and Welding Ltd.



Welding & Fabrication

Metal Fabricators and Welding has a diverse and agile shop capable of completing both large and small scale industrial projects. We complete top quality welding and fabrication projects for oil and gas, construction, utilities and other heavy industries.



What We Do

We are a custom capable metal design and fabrication shop that offers a large variety of material processing services. With two locations hosting an impressive assortment of technology and tools, we can participate in almost any project.



Products

Along with custom fabrication, materials processing and welding, we’ve built a reputation as leading producers for tube shields, industrial trench and bulk handling equipment. Metal Fabricators and Welding will customize these products to the specific requirements of each customer.



Alberta Steel Fabrication & Custom Designs
Metal Fabricators & Welding is celebrating over 60 years in business serving the Western Canadian market. From our humble roots as a roofing and sheet metal shop, we’ve grown into one of Alberta’s leading custom fabricators by providing our clients with a high level of service and unparalleled quality.

Our extensive team of estimators, coordinators, and drafting specialists have experience working in situations of all kinds, from highly engineered applications to working with new product design. Let our qualified team work with your organization to provide the highest of quality and most cost effective solution.

Our specialized fabrication shops in Edmonton can provide complete cutting, forming, and welding services to meet your exact technical and manufacturing specifications. We can also coordinate value added services such as painting, galvanizing, and machine shop services as needed.
Metal Fabricators and Welding is a built to order specialist, focusing on unique jobs and industrial projects that require a diverse skill set throughout Western Canada.

Structural Thermal Break Canada

Structural thermal breaks prevent condensation and mold, reduce heat transmission loss through envelope penetrations, increase energy efficiency, lower carbon emissions, and reduce owner liability. 

Reducing energy usage in buildings has become a focal point of the architectural, engineering, and construction (AEC) industry to meet national energy goals and reduce costs to building owners.

Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) contribute significantly to total building energy use, leading designers to pursue strategies for achieving better thermal performance.

Vibration Control / Damping

Vibration damping dissipates vibration energy. It absorbs or changes vibration energy, reducing the amount of energy transmitted through the equipment or structure. Understanding these processes — and when to use them — also requires understanding two concepts: transmissibility and natural frequency.

Vibration isolation prevents vibration transmission. It keeps vibration energy from entering an object, such as a structure or piece of equipment.

We are a professional team dedicated to our customers. At Rimac we would like to share our passion for curving with you!
  
At Rimac personal service is what we are about
  
This is Rimac. Your Metal Curving Specialists.
  
"Throw us a curve. The team at Rimac can handle it."
 
Rimac now offers Press Brake Forming and Shearing
Your one stop shop for Custom Brake Shapes and Curving
Who Are We?

Rimac has decades of experience specializing in the curving of metal extrusions and brake shapes for a variety of industries. Rimac's state of the art equipment and technology provides our clients with the ability to push the design envelope to a new dimension.

From curtain walls and window frames to track systems and more, Rimac does it all. Whether you're looking to curve the facade of your building, or add a gothic arch to your window, we have solutions for you.

Rimac takes service seriously. From the initial comprehensive quotation prepared by our highly skilled and experienced team, to the finished shipment packed in a custom built crate. Every detail of the job is carefully and professionally executed.

Rimac is able to curve extruded and brake-formed profiles in Aluminum, Steel, Stainless Steel, Brass, Bronze, and other exotic metals. We even curve some plastics such as PVC. Don't hesitate to Contact Us today for your comprehensive quotation.

Learn More



Latest News
Rimac celebrates their 40th Anniversary

Posted on 06.28.2024.

Rimac wishes Tina success in her Retirement

Posted on 08.31.2018.

Ruby Gill joins Rimac's Sales and Marketing team

Posted on 07.31.2017.












"This is Rimac! Your trusted source for metal curving for over 40 years"

Shaping the Future

The shape of the future is unlimited. Using Rimac's ability to curve metal into the boundless creations of today's architects and designers. Harsh angles and straight edges are delicately bowed into gentle arcs and curves. Rimac offers unrivaled service in the metal curving industry.

In the Beginning

Rimac was started in 1984 by the Father and Son team of Richard MacCallum Sr., and Rick MacCallum. Their idea was to enter into the metal curving industry and be able to provide the highest quality product compared to what was currently being produced in North America at the time. Read More

Contact Us

Rimac takes service seriously. From the initial quotation to the finished product. Rimac is able to provide our customers with the ability to push the design envelope to a new dimension. Feel free to ask us a question using our Contact Form.

Canada Stampings is a full-service, tier-2 automotive supplier specializing in precision metal stamping, welding, and tooling. We proudly manufacture built-to-print steel components for vehicles in North America.

A Cut Above the Rest

FULL-SERVICE SOLUTIONS

Canada Stampings is with you every step of the way. Our fully integrated processes allow us to provide products with improved quality and reduced cost than our competitors. Let us help you with:

• Concepts
• Tool Builds
• Product Launch
• Mass Production
• Service Parts
• Prototyping

OUR PORTFOLIO
The Foundation of Tomorrow's Innovations​

Our vision is simple: to shape the future of manufacturing by providing parts that not only meet the highest standards of precision and quality, but also propel our partners and customers to new heights of success. Our products lay the groundwork for the future, becoming the building blocks of progress and expanding the capabilities of Tier 1s and OEMs. Manufacturing components that are reliable, durable, and ready to perform— together, we make what drives the world forward.

OUR CAPABILITIES AT A GLANCE

Short-run, high-volume production is our speciality.
We produce the highest-quality stainless steel parts and are experts in deep-draw stamping.

Metal Stamping

We have a variety of presses to suit your needs, including a large-bed press.

Quality Control

Strong quality control systems and the latest equipment to ensure every part is the same.

Robotic Assembly

Our robots can custom weld and assemble parts with superior precision.

Tooling

Our skilled tool and die team ensures your equipment works perfectly in our facility.

ABOUT
SINCE 1985 ABATEMENT TECHNOLOGIES®


HAS BEEN PASSIONATE
ABOUT CREATING CLEAN AIR.



Our roots began in the asbestos abatement industry and since then we have grown and evolved to meet the demands of our customers and the people they protect. Since our inception we have helped innumerable contractors, property managers, and infection control specialists create safer environments by clearing the air of hazardous particles, organic compounds, and pathogens. As we move forward we continue to work with a variety of organizations helping them effectively control the air quality in applications from construction zones in critical environments like hospitals and clean rooms, to outbreak response centers and hospitals that need to expand their patient isolation capacity. Our skilled team is standing by to help you create the right solutions for your project or facility.

Trust the Experts at IWL Steel
IWL Steel Fabricators is a well-established custom steel fabricator with shops in both Saskatoon and Martensville, Saskatchewan. IWL Steel is well-positioned to offer a full range of products and services throughout Saskatchewan, Western Canada and the northern United States.

With audited Quality Management, leading edge technology and the latest in fabrication equipment, IWL Steel is committed to providing our customers with the highest quality product.

Fabrication Advantages

Our key advantages include: 5-AXIS CNC Robotic Beam Line, Machitech CNC Plasma Cutting System with Pipe Fabrication Module, 3D Modelling, Solidworks, FTP Site, Bar Coding.

MORE INFO
Facilities and Equipment

Between our two shops, we have thirty thousand square feet of enclosed fabrication and processing area as well as 4.5 acres of laydown area.

MORE INFO
Featured Project

The largest project completed to date by IWL Steel Fabricators is the Conveyor Gallery segments for the Agrium Vault Project at Vanscoy, SK.

MORE INFO

At IWL Steel Fabricators, our mission statement is to provide all clients with a quality product; delivered on time, at a competitive price and in a safe and efficient manner.

ABOUT US

Shear Fabrication Ltd (Shearfab) is based in Saskatoon and has developed a solid reputation for manufacturing high quality products to their customers across Saskatchewan, Alberta and Western Canada.

From our 16,000 square foot facility, we can satisfy your custom shearing, bending and fabricating requirements. Our well-equipped fabrication shop and skilled craftsmen can produce the products you need, to your specifications. Shearfab's experienced fabrication department is ready for your project! We are CWB certified to W47.1 div 2 quality control program in house.

Shearfab also supplies a wide range of materials including sheet and plate in carbon, stainless steel and aluminum; angle iron, pipe, HSS tubing, I-beams, channels, expanded metal and flat bar.

SERVICES
CMM & QUALITY

CMM stands for the coordinate measuring machine. It is manufacturing equipment used to measure the geometrical shape of physical objects. It probes discrete points on the object's surface and detects the object's geometry based on those points. Primarily, CMM is used to ensure the quality of a part. It tests the machine part and determines whether it fulfills the intent of the original design. That is why CMMs are included in quality control to assure the quality of each component produced by the design and manufacturing company.

WIRED EDM

Wired EDM (Electrical Discharge Machining) is an advanced machining process where a single strand of wire is used as an electrode. This wire gives out electrical sparks, which aids erode material in the desired piece. It works with great precision and high accuracy. Wired EDM is mainly used to cut all the way through the material because it creates a linear line. It is often used to form dies, tools, cut hard plates, and give them a finished look.

METAL STAMPING

As the name suggests, metal stamping is the process of pressing flat metal pieces to shape them up. It converts flat metal sheets into specific and complex shapes. The manufacturing process consists of many metal forming techniques, such as punching, blanking, embossing, bending, piercing, etc. Metal stamping is a budget-friendly and speedy method to produce large quantities to fulfill manufacturing needs. Various companies look for metal parts for their projects and require material manufactured with high precision.

PROJECT MANAGEMENT

Project management is the process of planning, organizing, and implementing project activities and fulfilling their requirements. It involves employing resources to control the management, meet deadlines, and enhance profitability. From an idea till its execution, all the activities related to work are part of it. Projects are divided into milestones, and each milestone is achieved according to the schedule. It helps companies complete their projects on time and at a low cost.

TUBE BENDING & ASSEMBLY

Tube bending allows the bending of tubes and pipes according to the specified requirements. Many projects required bent pipes for the maintenance of the structure. So, the tube bending services provide tubes in all shapes (curved, square, rectangle) and sizes. Tube bending and assembly are required for industrial, commercial, architectural, structural, and recreational usage. Tubes of different metals are bent to form various shapes as per the specifications.

METAL STAMPING PARTS

Metal stamping leads to the manufacturing of metal stamped parts. It involves pressing flat metal sheets into a stamping press, which eventually forms the desired shape with the tool and dies. Metal stamping services include blanking, coining, embossing, bending, and punching to shape the material. Customized metal stamping parts are also available for different industries. Industries require parts as per their needs and application. So, the metal stamping process ensures all components meet exact specifications and produce in bulk.

CUSTOM DIE MAKING

A die could be anything that transforms the material into a customized shape or product. Dies are pre-shaped tools that press onto the materials such as metal or plastic. The press applies force on the material and cuts hard through it. As a result, the material takes shape and size of the die. Every project has a different requirement of the dies. So, customized dies are produced to match the specification and capabilities of the project. Custom dies are manufactured according to their application and industry needs.

CNC MACHINING

Computer Numerical Control (CNC) machining is a process of manufacturing through pre-programmed software. The computerized software controls the movements of the tools and machines. Many industries have incorporated CNC machining in their manufacturing. A CNC machine is capable of performing complex tasks and cuts through the material in three dimensions. It doesn’t require the aid of human operators as the machine functions on its own.

TESTING

Testing procedures and solutions are employed to ensure the quality of the product. Testing helps in assuring that the product is as per the standards for consumer use. It verifies that the manufacturing design is correct and the product is of high quality. Testing solutions aid in maximizing a company's profitability. Integrating reliable testing in the manufacturing process ensures the product's safety and facilitates the manufacturing process.

OUR STORY
About us

Olympic Tool & Die Inc. has been serving many industries since 1976 as a design and manufacturing company. We have built our reputation by providing high-quality products and efficient functions. We are ISO registered with the no. ISO 9001:2015, to provide design, refurbishing, and manufacturing of tools, dies, and fixtures.

Our Mission:
Olympic Tool & Die Inc. is committed to providing quality work and innovative manufacturing solutions to our customers. We have employed the best team with tremendous skills and vast experience for tool and die designs and manufacturing. We aim to provide completed projects on time.

Our Vision:
We strive to be the best tool and dies maker and supplier for various industries while bringing innovations in our technology.





What We Do?

Olympic Tool & Die Inc. covers all aspects of manufacturing and designing as a tool and dies maker. We offer the following:

Progressive Dies

Progressive dies consist of a series of operations in which one stroke follows the other. The workpiece stays attached to the base while different strokes perform the functions. With each stroke, the piece moves towards completion. Progressive dies increase the punching productivity and work efficiently. 

Transfer Dies 

Transfer die is similar to progressive die except that an individual unit works on each part. The parts have to be transported to multiple stations designated for all the operations; one station performs one stroke. 

Draw Dies

Draw dies punch into the metal sheet to form a shape. It takes control of the boundary and holds it firmly with a blank holder. 

Forming Dies 

Forming dies are similar to stencils but in industrial size. It is a manufacturing tool that presses hard into the metal and gives it specific shapes. 

Roll Form

Roll forming is another approach used for metal shaping. This process involves the continuous bending of long metal strips with a set of rollers. 

Prototypes

Prototypes are referred to as early models of a product built for testing. It demonstrates the process and purpose of that product before its launch. 

Blanking Dies

Blanking dies are used for cutting the metal piece. It produces a flat piece of material in the desired shape by cutting it in one operation. It only cuts the edges and is not used for parts with internal features. 

Swage Dies Compound

It is another technique for metal formation. The edges or dimensions of the metal are deformed to fit around another part by pressing it.

Dies Secondary Operation

Dies secondary operations include those processes that are done after the initial manufacturing operations. It improves the quality and gives a finishing look to the products.

Brand History:

Olympic Tool and Die has built its reputation, over the past 50 years, by putting each individual piece, part, component and completed project, through rigorous quality procedures.

Quality:

All of our customers rely on the experience, skill and efficiency of our Olympic Tool & Die team to oversee the design, engineering, scheduling, production and on- time delivery of their entire projects. Such projects range from air and hydraulic presses to custom machinery, tools and dies, and jigs and fixtures. To meet your unique production specifications, we employ a variety of processes, such as drilling, welding, and assembly.

About Us
Providing superior metal fabrication and welding solutions since 1978. We can handle all your requirements in all types of materials, but mainly focus on materials up to and including ½” thick carbon steel, stainless steel and aluminum; sheet sizes up to 6ft wide by 18ft long. Haas Enterprises is a single source supplier for; product design and development; fabrication and welding; powder painting and assembly; along with partnering with other services such as silk-screening, plating, hot dip galvanizing, and electro-polishing for stainless steel parts. Whether your product requires a single process or multiple manufacturing processes, from a single piece to large production runs, we can accommodate your needs.
Manufacturing Philosophy
Our manufacturing philosophy is based on flexibility and providing superior customer service. We recognize that short lead times, continuous improvement, on-time delivery and cost effective solutions are the critical attributes of a successful customer-supplier relationship. Strong commitments to our employees, our customers and our community, along with a modern manufacturing facility have defined us as leaders in our business community. Our management team is committed to building strong business relationships, defining effective manufacturing processes along with an integrated quality management system. We understand that our success is based on your success.
Our Locations
 We are strategically located on the Highway 401/403 corridors in Woodstock, Ontario and offer 30,000 sq. ft. of manufacturing space, combining design, fabrication, welding, powder painting and assembly under one roof. We have been providing metal fabrication solutions for over three decades and take great pride in our accomplishments.
In April of 2023, Haas took possession of a second location in Woodstock to support the needs of our customers

Custom Precision Laser Cutting and Metal Fabrication

Heart-Fab is skilled at custom and precision laser cutting and metal fabrication for commercial businesses looking for custom made high-end metal components and products with quick turn-around. Unlike other metal fabricators, Heart-Fab has a large on-site store of metal materials that allows us to quickly perform Sheet Laser cutting, tube laser cutting, Plasma Oxy-Fuel cutting, CNC Forming, CNC Machining, Painting and Powder Coating, Welding and Drafting Services that allows us to meet common and uncommon needs for metal fabrication at an unsurpassed quality and speed that allows us to keep our prices competitive - helping you keep your projects within your budget.

A Standard of Metal Fabrication you won't find anywhere else

 

 

Heart-Fab uses state-of-the-art metal forming equipment that provides quality and cost efficient metal fabrications. Our in-house inventory of different grades of steel, ranging from abrasive resistant, hot rolled to hot-rolled pickled and oiled, will help ensure your product specifications can be met; whether you're looking for simple masonry support angles and lintels, intricate canopies, and anything else you can imagine.

Designed. Manufactured. Installed.

Complete engineered solutions for critical corrosion protection and heat transfer environments.

TALK TO A SALES ENGINEER

Leverage the Power of Three Companies
LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR COMPANIES

Solutions for the most challenging corrosion issues found in the chemical processing, sulfuric acid, hydrometallurgy, regenerative thermal oxidizer and chlor alkali industries. Together, the three companies of Knight Material Technologies design, manufacture and install complete solutions for the harshest environments.

Key Products and Services
Acid-Resistant Construction

Acid-resistant bricks, mortars and other linings for corrosion resistance in high-temperature and harsh acidic environments.

Tower Internals

Structures to facilitate mass and heat transfer in distillation and absorption towers, including distributors, packing, multi-beam and bar supports.

Heat Transfer Media

Structured packing and random media proven to offer maximum energy efficiency, fouling resistance and lower pressure drop.

Mass Transfer Packing

Structured packing and random media for increased gas flow, fouling resistance and lower pressure drop in harsh, acidic environments.

Dual Laminate FRP

Fiberglass reinforced plastic for pipe spools, headers and vessels offering superior corrosion protection, light-weight installation and long service life.

Engineering Service

Design and engineering solutions for complete lining and support materials, backed by over 120 years in the acid-resistant industry.

Installation Systems

Installation and construction services for all KMT family equipment from complete tower installations to spot and lining repairs.

Discover how we can add value to your operations
CONTACT US
No Margin for Error

When you need acid-resistant and corrosion-resistant solutions for your industrial operations, it needs to be done right the first time. Knight Material Technologies is a proven leader in tailoring and installing non-metallic linings, tower packing and other anti-corrosive materials for a diverse range of businesses.

We employ a dedicated team of industry professionals ready to serve you. With global capabilities, our work is completed on site and driven by your schedule and needs. After committing to any project, we stand by our word that “We do what we say we can do.”

About Us
History

 

Peerless Building Products was established in 1980 in Medicine Hat, Alberta. Originally starting as an eaves-trough installation company, Peerless has expanded into a number of niche markets serving both residential and commercial clients.   

With over 35 years of experience, whether it be Shingle Roofing, Standing Seam Roofing, Flat Roofing, Vinyl Siding, Eaves-troughs, Soffit, Fascia, Metal Cladding, Well-Head Fencing or Spray Foam Insulation, Peerless has a wealth of experience and expertise providing high quality workmanship and durable materials and products.

LOOKING FOR A QUALIFIED METAL FABRICATOR?

Mulgrave Machine Works is a full-service custom metal fabricator and machine shop with a reputation of delivering custom metal fabricated projects on-time and on-budget. Trust our more than 50 years of experience satisfying customer demands with the team who go the extra mile for you.

WE'RE FOCUSED ON QUALITY

We offer quality fabrication of all types of plate and structural steel, tanks, pressure vessels, piping and downhole tubular/connector welding. Over the years the company has diversified in the types of products offered, including low carbon and HSLA steels, stainless steels, Hastelloy®, alloy 625, Titanium, aluminum, and more. We've got international export experience, and have been serving the oil and gas, heavy industrial, and marine industries successfully since 1969.

Cattle Handling Packages

Have you ever thought about renovating your ranch? Or maybe you’re starting fresh on a new cattle ranching operation?

Lakeland’s Cattle Handling Packages can help new ranchers start right or generational ranchers upgrade their farm. If you ask any rancher, and they’ll tell you: cattle ranching ain’t a joke. It’s tough work, and things can get messy. Things can get dangerous.

LEARN MORE
Sheep and Goat Packages

For the well-established sheep or goat operations or the hobby farms just starting up, Lakeland has fully equipped handling packages that can handle any number of animals, any number of tasks, whether it’s vaccinating, shearing, hoof trimming, trenching, etc.

We offer handling systems, crowding tubs, and even fencing, all of which can help you build that versatile farm that’s safe and efficient.

LEARN MORE
Horse Stalls

Lakeland’s premium Horse Stall Fronts offer the perfect blend of durability, functionality, and aesthetic appeal, designed to meet the diverse needs of equine enthusiasts. With easy installation and customizable options available, our Horse Stall Fronts ensure a seamless integration into your barn or stable. All fronts come standard with a 4-Foot Roll Door, but you can further modify Lakeland’s Horse Stall Fronts to your liking.

North Star Technical Est. 1986

With more than 35 years of industry experience, you can rely on us to complete complex rush jobs, even under challenging conditions. Whether a part needs to be urgently replaced or repaired, or a custom manufactured mechanical component is required, our customers depend on us to get the work done. North Star Technical Inc. is a certified industrial machine facility offering 24/7 emergency support services across Canada and the US. On-site services available.

Our capabilities include CNC horizontal bore milling, drilling, cutting, turning and arc, TIG, and MIG welding. As an ISO and CWB certified facility, our services include gear cutting, vibration analysis, heat treating, chrome plating along with custom fabrication, machining and millwrighting, dynamic balancing, non-destructive testing, CAD design, and engineering.

LEARN MORE
24/7 quality assurance
UNMATCHED QUALITY
Renowned for meticulous attention to detail and stringent quality control measures. We are ISO certified and hold a CWB facility certification.
EMERGENCY RESPONSE

Available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, speak with a live Service Agent now. We are here to help!

CALL US

RELIABLE & TRUSTWORTHY
You can count on us to keep you operational. Whether you need a part urgently replaced or repaired, or a fully custom manufactured mechanical component, our team of experts are ready to get the work done.
Cross Border Convenience
North Star’s facility is located in the industrial heart of Hamilton, Ontario. Our commitment is to offer a hassle-free, full service experience from Canada to the US. Our team of experienced machinists, millwrights, and welders will coordinate the pick-up and delivery of parts, or travel on site to perform the work needed across North America. Since 1986, North Star has established a tradition of quality workmanship. Our employees undergo ongoing education, training, and development, and we continue to thrive, as we expand our facilities and add more specialized equipment to service our Canadian and American clients.
Featured Services
North Star Technical Inc. offers 4 main services – machining, fabricating, balancing, and millwrighting. This blend of technical trades is exclusive to North Star. Our combination of highly specialized services work well for many projects – we offer all this under ONE roof, which allows us to control all aspects of the job.
MACHINING

High-quality custom metal and mechanical components with a quick turnaround time. We are equipped with multiple CNC machines capable of automated and complex production runs.

LEARN MORE

FABRICATION

Custom fabrication of simple parts and complex structures. Reverse engineering services to manufacture a new part from a broken or worn one. Custom CAD design and engineering services available.

LEARN MORE

MILLWRIGHTING

Disciplined approach to identifying problems, assessing options, and offering detailed solutions. Whether it is a full rebuild or a repair project, we are experienced and fully equipped to service a wide range of industries.

LEARN MORE

DYNAMIC BALANCING

In-house and on-site balancing services. Identification of looseness, misalignment, unbalance, bearing deterioration, gear wear, electrical motor faults, hydraulic issues, and more.

LEARN MORE

We Are Certified

North Star Technical Inc.’s management team and staff are 100 percent committed to quality and safety.

Our team is dedicated to providing customers with the highest quality products and services, while ensuring that all work is completed safely.

North Star has received ISO 9001:2015 certification, as well as CWB certifications for fusion welding of steel (CSA W47.1) and aluminum (CSA W47.2) 

Our non-destructive testing services are performed by an experienced CGSB Level II certified inspector.

Providing a safe and healthy working environment is of utmost importance to our company. We work closely with the Ontario Ministry of Labour and the Workplace Safety and Insurance Board to ensure the safety and well-being of our team members on the job.

We take precautions to ensure our staff work safely on customer sites and in the field.

Our employees are fully trained and certified to work in various conditions and strictly adhere to individual health and safety procedures and other customer specific practices. 

North Star’s team of millwrights are all licensed to operate forklifts, overhead cranes, and man lifts, and are up to date with Fall Arrest and Confined Space certifications.

We are ISO 9001 registered. Dedicated to Maintaining our Quality Management System.

We believe in a safe and sustainable workplace for everyone, which is why we are proud members of ISNetworld.

About Us

Roman Tool & Fabricating Inc. embarked on its journey in 1991 in Windsor, Ontario, initially specializing as a premier Fabricator and Machine Shop. As we grew and diversified our capabilities, we expanded our offerings to include Conveyors and light Automation solutions, catering to the evolving needs of our customers.

Driven by a commitment to excellence and fueled by the trust of our customers, our business grew. Our dedication to quality craftsmanship and innovative solutions propelled us forward, paving the way for our continued success.

In response to our expanding operations and the increasing demand for our services, we made the strategic decision to establish ourselves in a spacious 24,000 square foot facility. This state-of-the-art space serves as our operational hub, equipped to accommodate projects of varying sizes and complexities.

Within our organized facility, we possess the capacity and versatility to undertake a diverse range of projects, from small-scale custom fabrications to large-scale industrial endeavors. Our facility not only reflects our growth and progress but also underscores our unwavering commitment to delivering exceptional results to our valued clients.

As an ISO9001-2015 certified company, we are committed to continuous improvement. Click here to see our certificate

Services
Engineering
Our engineers craft precision components and machinery to meet your needs, innovating solutions for manufacturing challenges and optimizing processes for quality and efficiency. From intricate parts to large-scale equipment, they ensure meticulous craftsmanship and functionality. Their expertise spans material selection, structural analysis, and integrating advanced technologies, driving innovation in every project.
Fabricating
We have certified welders and top of the line equipment in our Fabricating Department. You are guaranteed that the pieces fit at first try. We can cut, fit, and weld steel, aluminum and stainless steel products, using MIG, TIG and stick welding as needed. Custom shapes are no problem. Our CNC cutting machine can cut irregular shapes as big as 8′ X 24′ and as thick as 10 inches.
Machining
In our Machining Department, we excel in pin-point precision, achieving tolerances of +/- 0.0015. With 6 boring mills and 2 jig bores at our disposal, we ensure impeccable finishes for every project. Equipped with a diverse range of cutting tools and guided by our skilled machinists, we are confident that your parts meet exact specifications outlined in the drawings.
Have a new project?
Precision crafted solutions tailored to your fabricating needs await. Let’s turn your vision into into a reality.

3D LASER REDEFINES CUTTING EDGE

Committed to offering the latest in fabrication technology, MSP is proud to add two new laser tube cutters to our portfolio of tools.

LT360: The LT360 is a uniquely powerful 3D laser cutting system, featuring a cutting head mounted on a six-axis robot that works in tandem with a handling robot. The LT360 can cut all kinds of three-dimensional sections; bent, hydro formed, extruded, drawn, flat or stamped tubes and sheets in mild steel, stainless steel, aluminum, titanium, copper and brass.

LT8.20: Featuring a 3D tilt cutting head, this cutter can perform high precision angular cuts in round, square, rectangular, l-beam and other special (open) shapes. It can handle complex cutting patterns, reach hard to access locations and is well suited for thick-walled tubes.

Who We Are
Compass Bending Ltd. was started in early 2004 but is still growing. As one of the largest bending companies serving western Canada’s Oil & Gas industry, we supply pipe bending and coating services for pipeline and facility construction projects but we also supply custom and production bending and rolling services to many other diverse industries.
Colin Maskey, General Manager, has been in the bending business since 1987 and has years of shop and field experience in steel fabrication and construction. Compass Bending’s shop and office staff members also have a great breadth of industry experience which they bring to every project, small and large.
Our two shops are in the Calgary Foothills Industrial Park with easy access to major routes and local suppliers. New and efficient machines, some purchased and some designed and built to our specifications will ensure quick deliveries and consistently high quality. Our large range of equipment grants us the flexibility and diversity needed to supply the widely varying needs of our customers and we are always developing more ways of forming to expand our custom bending services.
MORE INFO
What We Do
We offer bending up to 16″ø seamless and welded (ERW) line pipe in-house, available with a variety of coating options, as well as many other forms of bending, rolling and fabrication. On the off chance we don’t have the equipment or capacity for what you need done, we have a large network of subcontractors for forming, tube and pipe bending (pipe up to 60″ø), fabrication and coating so we can take on almost any project. 
We have a lot of experience in this business and we’re proud of our record in R&D and successfully developing prototypes. Please call us if we can help you with your design ideas. Let’s make something great!
OUR WORK

Our two shops are in the Calgary Foothills Industrial Park with easy access to major routes and local suppliers. New and efficient equipment, designed and built to our specifications, will ensure quick deliveries and consistently high quality.

Razor Contract Manufacturing, Ltd.

Razor Contract Manufacturing, Ltd. (RCM) was established in 2010 in Saint John, New Brunswick. We specialize in metal fabrication, including carbon steel, stainless steel, and aluminum. We operate out of a 35,000 square foot facility with the capability of laser cutting, bending and welding primarily for the aerospace industry. We also have an extensive line of subcontractors that can service our customer’s needs as well.

We pride ourselves at providing high quality products to our customers on time and at a competitive price. We promote a safe work environment that allows our team to produce your product efficiently.

Razor is ISO 9001:2015 registered and is certified CWB W47.1 standard. We have a proven process that allows us to produce products for our customers. We strive to achieve the highest quality while ensuring we maintain a safe work environment for our employees.

Seaforth Geosurveys Inc.

Seaforth Geosurveys turned to C-Therm for effective thermal conductivity characterization in our exploration vessel’s on-board lab. The portability and ease of use of the instrument allowed our technicians to rapidly measure thermal conductivity of our geological core samples accurately and consistently in a 24-7 operation. As a Nova Scotia based company working worldwide, we were pleased to have a local, made in Atlantic Canada solution for our project requirements. We would recommend the Trident for any research or screening with a focus on geological and/or in-situ applications, and we will continue to utilize it on new exploration missions.

David Lombardi,

President (Sector: Geology / Oil & Gas)

Intel Corporation

C-Therm’s Trident system allows us to not only test a relatively broader range of materials with various sensor techniques, but with the Slab utility we are able to easily test the thermal conductivity of our thin aluminum alloys – which have high value in today’s electronic and computing hardware

Hardeep Singh,

Sr. Thermal Engineer

Haydale Composites Solutions Ltd.

C-Therm MTPS has been a key piece of testing equipment at Haydale, providing fast and accurate thermal conductivity measurements for our product development of nanocomposites. Having this capability has allowed a better understanding of the dispersion of nanomaterials in polymer matrices through thermal mapping sample surfaces. The support and customer service from C-Therm has been excellent over the years, we look forward to dealing with them again in the near future.”

Stuart Sykes

Hussmann (A Panasonic Company)

The C-Therm MTPS Sensor is working very well and definitely has lots of use for product development, it allows us to test materials (i.e. food) that we have not been able to test in the past allowing us to optimize product performance.

Steven Korda,

Engineer, R&D Lab

Covestro

The C-Therm Thermal Conductivity Analyzer has provided our group a fast, accurate capability to test the thermal conductivity of our polymers with C-Therm’s patented high-precision MTPS sensor. The instrument has become very popular within our group for its quick easy reliable measurement and the support from C-Therm has exceeded our expectations. We recently upgraded the unit with the new robust TLS module for work on polymer melts.

Jose Fonseca,

Expert Thermodynamics (Sector: Polymers)

Kimberly Clark

C-Therm’s MTPS sensor is a fast and accurate instrument which has been an invaluable addition to our lab. The MTPS sensor allows us to quickly understand the thermal properties of our non-woven textile materials, diapers, and wipes. The thermal properties of these materials were previously unknown. Patrick and his colleagues at C-Therm are quick to answer our questions and provide helpful resources. I would definitely recommend C-Therm thermal conductivity instruments to those looking to know the thermal properties for their materials.

Fang Wang,

Lead Material Scientist

NASA

We purchased [from C-Therm] after seeing a demonstration of how fast and easy it is to operate. The instrument provides unequivocal results and provides the flexibility to test powders and liquids. In terms of our satisfaction with the purchase, I’d give it a 10 out of 10 - extremely satisfied.

OUR LEGACY

As one of the largest privately held gasket, fastener, and hose manufacturers and distributors in the world, Lamons is the partner you can trust to deliver quality products whenever you need them — at consistently fair pricing. Since 1947, we’ve been providing industry-leading safety sealing and attachment solutions that help keep communities safe and drive progress across the world.

YOUR INNOVATION PARTNER

We believe progress is built on partnership. That’s why we’re available 24/7 with the fastest response time in the industry. We seamlessly handle high-volume and quick-turn needs for both standard components and one-of-a-kind engineered solutions. Learn how we’re setting the standard for quality and ingenuity.

LEARN ABOUT US
HYDROGEN INDUSTRY SOLUTIONS

Lamons provides robust safety solutions tailored for every stage of the hydrogen process, from production to distribution. With 75+ years of experience in manufacturing and engineering, our diverse product lineup ensures safety compliance across varying temperatures and pressures throughout the hydrogen value chain.

DISCOVER WHAT’S NEXT
ACCELERATING RENEWABLE ENERGY

We’re committed to being the manufacturer of choice for the renewable energy industry, by engineering custom sealing and attachment solutions for wind energy, hydro energy, geothermal energy, and alternative fuels sectors. Regardless of industry, we help every customer increase efficiency and pursue lower emissions.

COMMITTED TO SAFETY AND SUSTAINABILITY

Through constant improvement of our products, processes, and services, we support the safe operations of essential industries and partner with forward-thinking customers on innovations that protect the environment for future generations.

We pride ourselves in managing all aspects of the supply process from beginning to end to ensure that our customers are thoroughly satisfied at each step.

UN GROUPE, TROIS EXPERTISES

Découvrez nos divisions Support Plus, LabMétal ainsi que notre dernière acquisition, notre département Découpe de profilés.

GROUPE SPL
FABRICATION INDUSTRIELLE

Entreprise établie à Trois-Rivières depuis 2017, Groupe SPL regroupe une équipe qualifiée et dévouée qui se divise en trois départements : Support Plus qui se spécialise dans la fabrication de supports de tuyauterie industrielle ; LabMétal produisant des pièces mécanosoudées d’acier, d’aluminium et d’acier inoxydable ; et notre département de découpe de profilés structuraux.

Détenant une vaste usine de 22 000 pi2 et un entrepôt fermé de 4 000 pi2, Groupe SPL profite d’une situation géographique avantageuse, soit aux abords des autoroutes 55 et 40 à Trois-Rivières, lui permettant de desservir facilement ses nombreux clients.

Groupe SPL s’engage à fournir à ses clients des produits et des services qui rencontrent et dépassent leurs attentes en termes de qualité, de respect des exigences et de délais de livraison. Dans cette optique Groupe SPL s’est affiliée PRO-MEC Élite en 2023 afin d’accroître sa capacité de production.

Notre équipe expérimentée et certifiée est à votre disposition, n’hésitez pas à nous contacter!

Laser Cutting!

From prototypes, to large production runs, Bass Metal CNC laser cutting capabilities allows for quick turnaround of any and all shapes and cuts.

Finishing & Buffing

A critical aspect in metal manufacturing, this is the underlying step that makes your product look good!

Bending

Our highly trained press brake operators use their knowledge and expertise, along with our precise tooling and equipment, to deliver the highest quality product possible.

Welding

A vital organ to the manufacturing process, our vast line of welding machines and processes provide multiple alternatives to achieve your desired end result.

Lean Manufacturing & Value Engineering

An aspect of our establishment: 40 years in the making!

CNC Punching

An efficient solution to a repetitive problem: CNC punching allows a cost- effective approach to large quantities of hole and slot patterns.

Stamping

With the aid of a tool and die, metal stamping and forming provide the highest efficiency of cost and rapidity.

Shear Cutting & Automated Saw

Contributing to our lean manufacturing process, our automated saw and shearing department cuts our production time, by efficiently cutting and shearing various types of metal in house.

Conception and Design

Where it all begins. Our talented and experienced drafters will build your idea into a virtual reality. We will let our manufacturing take care of the rest!

Founded in 1973, Kam-Press is a privately owned and operated Canadian organization, specializing in design and manufacture of metal products for a wide range of industries. We operate from a modern 43,500 square foot facility, located minutes away from downtown Toronto and the airport, near major highways 401 and 410 in Mississauga, Ontario.

Our production department includes an extensive line of production equipment, coupled with our experienced and highly trained staff. With over 35 years of service, Kam-Press continually strives to meet the changing needs of our customers. We are committed to maintaining a consistent approach to parts quality. This is achieved by utilizing our skilled production workers, modern machinery, and dedication to teamwork. We constantly search for innovative solutions to increase the quality of our products.

SIMPLICITÉ

Industries bofab est une entreprise spécialisée dans la fabrication de produit mécano-soudés, d’équipement complète de sciages, de structure d’acier, d’usinage, de peinture industriels standard et de réfection de vis sur mesure.

EFFICACITÉ

Spécialisé dans la production de diverses machineries pour différentes entreprises forestières. Système de production qui nous permet de suivre en temps réel la fabrication en atelier. Possédant une équipe multidisciplinaire, nous permettant d’avancer dans nos échéanciers.

RAPIDITÉ

Avec un système de production en flux tiré, Industries Bofab est en mesure d’offrir un meilleur délai de fabrication. De plus chaque pièce produite doit subir un contrôle de qualité systématique, avant la livraison au client.

​
	
Spécialisé dans la fabrication métallique sur mesure, dont le cintrage de précision et  l'assemblage de pièces mécanos-soudées.
Notre expertise combinée aux technologies de pointe donne forme à vos projets!
Depuis 1993, nous sommes un manufacturier spécialisé dans la fabrication métallique sur mesure, dont le cintrage de précision et l'assemblage de pièces mécano-soudées et ce, exclusivement en sous-traitance pour de courtes et moyennes séries.
	
Pourquoi nous faire confiance?
L'expertise de Tuba
Cintrage de précision 
de tubes ronds, carrés, rectangulaires, de profilés et d'extrusion d'aluminium.

Assemblage mécano-soudé
Soudure robotisée et conventionnelle.
	
Nous sommes intégrateur de procédés
Ayant accès à un réseau de partenaires qualifiés, cela nous permet de livrer un produit clé en main.

	
Le respect des échéanciers

Nous ne prenons pas un engagement à la légère, car un retard c’est coûteux.


	
Notre souci de la qualité

Système de management qualité certifié ISO 9001:2015

Procédés de soudure certifié CSA W47.1


On vous assiste de la conception à la production.
	
Ce que nos clients disent:
 
 


	
	
	
	
''Plutôt que d'envoyer les plans et attendre un prix, nous avons eu des rencontres et une visite de l'usine pour mieux cerner les objectifs de notre défi''. TUBA c’est la force du contact et de l’esprit de collaboration. 
Tony Coeurderoi 
Directeur service technique

This custom build underwater tank is manufactured by our client Jetsam Technology. High pressure compressed gas SCUBA cylinders need to be designed with tight specifications with respect to Pressure, Dimension, and Capacity.
Custom electrical panels and enclosures engineered with a smooth functioning door, and to accurately accept a wide range of electronics, through the use of inserted pem hardware.
Our focus is to accurately produce panels that will suite the customer’s needs, and fit with any integrating components.
This electric vehicle battery case is a good example of the Stollco customization philosophy, where the enclosure was designed to suite various precise tolerances.
We developed a corner fastener that was advertised as the "perfect corner fastener, creates tape in corners with one action".
Since every digital file is kept safely within the customer’s own directory, this security pad faceplate can easily be revised in the future, if need be.
Stollco Business Philosophy
LISTEN – ADVISE – FABRICATE – SERVICE
LISTEN - We listen to our clients, and document all their needs.
ADVISE - We provide knowledge and decades of experience, to ensure a smooth manufacturing process for all of our partners.
FABRICATE - Our 40 000 square foot facility is equipped with a full line of automated CNC machines.
SERVICE - 90% of our business consists of long term clients. We have built a solid reputation on “getting the job done right,” and this has contributed to our longevity.

Produits Métalliques Bussières

Tous ensemble pour cultiver et libérer le potentiel humain.

Parce que pour nous, la croissance n’est pas une affaire d’argent, mais d’humains!

Qui sommes-nous?

Depuis 1991, Produits Métalliques Bussières offre des services de sous-traitance industrielle spécialisés dans la transformation des métaux en feuille. L’accompagnement de nos clients se fait par l’entremise de divers services tels que la conception, la découpe au laser, le pliage, l’assemblage, la soudure, l’usinage, la peinture et l’expédition. Donc, derrière chaque projet se cache une équipe de professionnels qui s’assurent de concevoir et de fabriquer des produits de qualité supérieure dont nous sommes fiers!

Nous travaillons en mode « entreprise libérée ». Nous partons donc du principe que nos employés sont responsables, qu’ils sont dignes de confiance et que ce sont eux les mieux placés pour amener des solutions créatives et novatrices en lien avec leur travail.

Pour avoir usé d’audace, mais surtout pour avoir été fidèles à nos valeurs dont nous sommes si fiers, ce mode managérial « libéré » fait notre succès depuis 2017!

PEPCO PIPE SERVICES, SINCE 1981

Pepco Pipe Services is an Alberta Driven Pipe Coating, Fabrication, as well as Sandblasting company that was started in Edmonton Alberta in 1981.  For 37 Years Pepco has been servicing customers in varying fields across western Canada. The name Pepco Stands for Pipe-End-Preparation-Company.

The company has grown the product line to offer solutions to Oil & Gas, Water Treatment, Heavy Oil, as well as Mechanical Packaging.

MORE ABOUT PEPCO
WE CAN HELP YOU WITH
WELDING
Piping Fabrication for CSA Pipelines, ASME Pressure Piping systems, as well as ABSA equipment.
Offering fabrication, spool fabrication, internal coatings, external painting.
Pepco has a qualified Quality program Registered with Alberta Boiler Association qualified.
MANUFACTURING
Custom Manufacturing per Client Requirements
Pepco Pipe Services Provides Engineered Design
Pepco Manufactures Pipe Stands and Supports
SAND BLASTING
Pepco offers both internal and external sandblasting services.
COATING
Tnemic 142 Pepco Pipe specializes in hydrotesting and pneumatic testing.
Devoe 268 & 253 ideal for industrial storage and process chemical tanks & high pressure crude oil pipes
Highland 74 a thin film 2-K Hybrid Epoxy Novolac Liner Coating that offers exceptional temperature and chemical protection.
Tnemec 141-Modified Polyamine Epoxy High solids coating which offers high-build edge protection.
3M™ Scotchkote™ Fusion-Bonded Epoxy Coating 134 Applied to preheated steel as a dry powder which melts and cures to a uniform coating thickness.
HYDROTESTING
Hydrotesting allows our customers to validate the safe
operation of their piping system..
Pepco Pipe specializes in hydrotesting and pneumatic testing.
Field hydrotesting is a service offered by Pepco Pipe Services.
Failure rates from 0 to only 0.01 over 7 years.
All hydrotesting complies with ASME B 31.3 standards.
FIELD CUTTING AND BEVELING
Prepare Bevel Ends for fabrication with specified bevel details.
Removal of Damaged Sections (Dents, Gouges, Discontinuities)
Cutting to length for Fabrication and installation.

WELCOME TO BANTRY METAL PRODUCTS LTD.
QUALITY METAL PRODUCTS & SERVICES FOR OVER 40 YEARS

Bantry Metal Products is a full service steel and metal fabrication company catering to industrial, governmental, and residential projects within north america. We offer extraordinary talent, craftsmanship, and state of the art equipment to complete any project or task requested, on time with quality, accuracy, and professionalism. Bantry Metal Products proactively seeks, researches, and acquires equipment to fulfill industry demands such that we can continue to improve and offer quality product to our clients with precision and competitive prices as we have since 1976.

FEATURED SERVICES
FLOW JET

Because there is absolutely no mechanical stress, heat distortion or heat-affected zone (HAZ), secondary processing can usually be eliminated. Get a satin smooth edge directly off the waterjet table.


Learn More

METAL FORMING

Forming, or metal forming, is the metalworking process of fashioning metal parts and objects through mechanical deformation; the workpiece is reshaped without adding or removing material, and its mass remains unchanged.

Learn More

METAL PUNCHING

Punching is a metal forming process that uses a punch press to force a tool, called a punch, through the workpiece to create a hole via shearing. The punch often passes through the work into a die.



Learn More

METAL SHEARING

Shearing is a process which cuts stock without the formation of chips, burning or melting. In technical terms, the process of "shearing" involves the use of straight cutting bladesorm of sheet metal or plates.


Learn More

METAL ROLLING

Rolling is a metal forming process in which metal stock is passed through 2 rolls to reduce the thickness and to ultimately make the thickness uniform. Rolling is classified according to the temperature of the metal rolled.


Learn More

WELDING

Welding is a fabrication or sculptural process that joins materials, usually metals by causing fusion, which is distinct from lower temperature metal-joining techniques such as brazing and soldering, which do not melt the base metal.


Learn More

MINI GALLERY
FLOW MACH 2 WATERJET

Bantry Metal Products is pleased to announce the introduction of the state of the art flow mach 2 waterjet to our customer metal fabrication line up. The Flow Mach allows for precision cutting with tolerances near 0.005, resulting in a product with clean smooth edges. The need for secondary finishing becomes obsolete.

Who We Are

For more than 25 years, Apogee Steel Fabrication has been providing customers quality service in metal fabrication across Ontario and the USA.

To meet the demands of our customers, we continually upgrade our equipment to improve productivity, lead times and quality standards.

Apogee’s skilled and knowledgeable people deliver the quality and performance our customers have come to expect. We provide innovative solutions to all your metal fabrication requirements, from the simplest sketch, to the most complicated assembles. We look forward to serving you!

Montréal, le 21 juin 2024

Fugesco Inc. a complété l’acquisition de tous les actifs stratégiques reliés aux activités de joints mécaniques pour centrales hydroélectriques de Fematics Canada Inc.

« En joignant ces entreprises dont l’expertise remonte au début des années 1900, Fugesco Inc. se positionne comme un expert de premier plan dans le domaine des joints mécaniques pour centrales hydroélectriques », commente Paolo Zenone, chef de la direction de Fugesco.

Fugesco Inc. est le centre d’excellence pour les applications d’étanchéité hydroélectrique de Meccanotecnica Umbra S.p.A., une société italienne dont le cœur de métier est les joints mécaniques destinés aux segments de marché de l’automobile, de l’électroménager, de l’industrie et de l’aérospatiale.

Pour en savoir plus, veuillez nous rendre visite à l’adresse suivante:

www.meccanotecnicaumbra.com

www.mtu-group.com

Professional Design, Fabrication & Installation

Contact Ritchie’s Welding Inc. for any welding need! Big or small, we take it all!

Contact & Directions
Call Ritchie’s Welding Inc. for the Welding Ottawa Depends On

For over 35 years, Ritchie’s Welding Inc. has provided structural and miscellaneous steel construction services and specialty metal fabrications for government, business & commercial, private homes, and various other industry sectors. We take pride in our business and strive to provide the quality welding Ottawa, and surrounding areas need, from 1-hour walk-in jobs to multimillion-dollar production. Please contact us to arrange for an estimator to come to your home or job site so we can provide you with an exact quote.

Our services include:

FREE ON-SITE ESTIMATES

TEKLA 3D & AUTOCAD MODELLING

FABRICATION & INSTALLATION SERVICES

STEEL MOBILE WELDING

ERECTOR, GIRDER, CROSSBEAM INSTALL

Sandblasting

STRUCTURAL CONNECTIONS DESIGN

ALUMINUM MOBILE WELDING

PYTHONX BEAMLINE PLASMA CUTTING

What Our Clients Have to Say:

 

Innovative Designs

“Awesome service, very innovative in the designs that they can come up with. They are our first call when we need custom work done.”

 

​

-Moe S.

Certified Welders & Erectors

Ritchie's employs numerous certified welders and erectors, both at our modern facility and at various construction sites. We offer in-house design and engineering services using the most powerful 3D structural software available – TEKLA Structures. We provide conceptual design and 3D modelling, fabrication and erection crews for structural and miscellaneous steel(s), as well as repairs on existing structures and buildings.

Many Welding Disciplines

Ritchie’s Welding Inc. and its welders are duly certified in various welding disciplines, including stainless steel, aluminum as well as stud welding using both manual and automated processes. We specialize in miscellaneous metals such as stairs and railings, working with but not limited to different grades of:

Aluminum

Stainless steel

T1 steel(s)

Hardened steel(s)

Mild steel(s)

Dissimilar metals

Solid Reputation

We strongly believe in client satisfaction, so we strive to go above and beyond our duties to provide any service a client or a project may require to reach completion. Ritchie’s Welding Inc. maintains outstanding relationships with a number of respected general contractors in the greater Ottawa region, as well as different bodies within the Government of Canada. We love taking on new challenges and always do our best to stand out as one of the pioneers of Ottawa's welding industry. Please contact us for more information or request a free online quote.

Free Quote

Ritchie’s Welding Inc. provides free online quotes to help you plan your next project.

BUY/SELL OCTG WITH US
How It Works
Our Process

At AK Casing & Tubing, we provide top-quality new & refurbished OCTG (Oil Country Tubular Goods) to meet API Specifications to efficiently and reliably service all your project needs.

01.
Procuring Premium OCTG

We buy new and used surplus piping, including from decommissioned/abandoned wells, ensuring a steady supply of quality materials for refurbishment.

02.
Certification and Grading

We inspect to API standards, certify, and grade each pipe for resale, storing them in our facility to ensure availability when you need them.

03.
Reliable Delivery

We ensure prompt delivery within days, with some orders fulfilled as quickly as the next day, no matter the location.

BUY/SELL OCTG WITH US
Keeping Your Projects on Track
Our Product Range

AK Casing & Tubing sells a variety of new and refurbished tubular goods specializing in the needs of oil and gas projects.

New API Pipe

We supply new API-certified pipe that meet the highest industry standards, ensuring reliability and longevity for your projects.

Used and Inspected Pipe

Our used OCTG goes through a stationary EMI (transverse/longitudinal/latitudinal) and a visual thread full-length drift and is color coded and identified with API bands to offer a cost-effective solution without compromising quality.

White Band

White band pipe are high-quality, lightly used, inspected, and tested for reliable, affordable projects.

Yellow Band

Yellow band pipe are mid-range quality, inspected, and graded to meet industry standards, offering a balance between cost and performance.

Blue Band

Blue band pipe are good-quality used pipe that have passed stringent inspections, making them a reliable choice.

Green Band

Green band pipe are premium refurbished pipe, carefully inspected and certified, ideal for projects requiring high reliability and performance.

Red Band

Red band pipe are our most budget-friendly option. Though heavily used, they are inspected to meet basic operational standards.

Our Services

AK Casing & Tubing offers threading, trucking, asset market valuations, sales of new and refurbished OCTG (Oil Country Tubular Goods), inspection services, purchasing, and recycling services. We also handle the logistics of transportation and recycling.
