Brands You Trust
ALOYCO®

For more than 70 years, Aloyco® has been a world leader in the supply of corrosion-resistant gate, globe, swing check and ball valves for applications ranging from refining and chemical processing, to pulp and paper.

AVID®

AVID® provides innovative solutions for networking, monitoring, and controlling process valves. Its portfolio includes position indicators, position and control monitors, and positioners for oil gas, refining, chemical, power and pharmaceutical applications.

CENTER LINE®

For over 40 years Center Line® has been a market leader in resilient seated butterfly valves, providing customers with unmatched reliability. Typical applications include HVAC, chemical/petrochemical processing, food and beverage, power and utilities, pulp and paper. Center Line RS product line is ideal for severe abrasive and corrosive environments.

COMPAC-NOZ®

Compac-Noz® offers check valves with a shorter face-to-face design as an economic alternative to full-body check valves. Typical applications include gas transmission, power generation, petro-chemical / chemical processing, hydrocarbon processing, and water transmission.

CRANE®

Crane® supplies bronze, cast iron and cast steel, resilient seated butterfly valves, ball valves and gate, globe and check valves for numerous industries, including refining, oil and gas, pulp and paper, and chemical process.

CRANE® CRYOGENICS

CRANE® CRYOGENICS – Solutions for production, transportation, transfer, and storage of Hydrogen, backed by decades of field experience in severe service applications.

CRONING LIVARNA®

CRONING LIVARNA® is known for its 400 years traditional steelmaking and casting. Throughout its development, shifts have been seen from a simple geometry of castings made of unalloyed steels into more demanding and complex product constructions using low & high-alloyed cast steel. CRONING LIVARNA® custom manufacturing capabilities include: Die Casting, Fabrication, Investment Casting, Machining, Sand Mold Casting and are ISO 9001 certified.

CRYOWORKS®

CryoWorks offers cutting-edge cryogenic solutions: Vacuum Insulated Pipe and Transfer Hose, Vent Devices, Adjustable Pressure Phase Separators, and Cryogenic Bayonets.

DEPA®

For over 50 years DEPA® Air Operated Diaphragm Pumps have maintained a reputation of enabling high quality positive displacement solutions in diverse industries. Industries served include food processing, medical and pharmaceutical, chemical, paint, automotive, shipyards & construction, and water & wastewater.

DOPAK®

DOPAK® is a global manufacturer of sampling systems and related accessories for liquids, gases and liquefied gases. Dopak’s closed vent samplers allow you to safely take samples of toxic, dangerous and volatile substances, without danger to your operators or the environment. We serve the chemical and petrochemical industries.

DUO-CHEK®

Duo-Chek® high performance check valves have long been the standard for low-pressure drop flow reversal protection, available in cast iron, cast steel, stainless steel and a variety of exotic materials. Typical applications include petroleum refining, oil and gas production, chemical and petrochemical, power generation, steel/primary metals, marine, water and wastewater, and pulp and paper.

ELRO®

ELRO® mobile and stationary peristaltic pumps are considered indispensable solutions in the positive displacement pump market and are available in the widest material selection of any manufacturer. Typical applications include chemical, building, environmental and power industries.

FLOWSEAL®

FLOWSEAL® is a leading brand of soft seated, metal seated and fire-safe high performance butterfly valves for industries like power, oil & gas, hydrocarbon processing and critical process applications.

GO REGULATOR®

GO REGULATOR® ’s and Valves are designed to facilitate a diverse range of applications, controlling pressure while accommodating low to moderate flow rates of many gases and liquids.

HOKE®

HOKE® valves and tube fittings are recognized as the best in class for reliability and global distribution. In the early 1960’s, HOKE introduced the GYROLOK® tube fitting with a design that offers innovative advantages and benefits that are unmatched in the industry.

JENKINS®

Jenkins® supplies bronze, cast iron and cast steel, resilient seated butterfly valves, ball valves and gate, globe and check valves to the North American Marketplace. Typical applications include HVAC, chemical/petrochemical processing, food and beverage, power and utilities, and pulp and paper.

KROMBACH®

Krombach® is best known for its unique ability to manufacture large quarter turn valves, including fabricated butterfly valves up to 136”, triple offset valves, metal-seated ball valves, and check valves. Typical applications include severe-service conditions in corrosive, abrasive, high temperature, gases, chemical, mining, and pharmaceutical processes, among others.

NOZ-CHEK®

Noz-Chek® high performance, non-slam check valves are specifically designed for fast reversing systems where backflow is a constant concern.  Typical applications include gas transmission, power generation, petro-chemical / chemical processing, hydrocarbon processing, and water transmission.

PACIFIC® VALVES

Pacific® Valves manufactures and sells bolted bonnet, pressure seal and HF acid gate, globe and check valves, as well as wedgeplug valves for pressure steam applications associated with power generation and refining.

RESISTOFLEX®

Having invented the PTFE lined hose technology in 1953, Resistoflex® has grown to be the largest plastic-lined piping products supplier in the world. Today, it offers plastic-lined pipe, fittings, complex shapes, vessels, tanks and hoses in HDPE (high-density polyethylene), PP (propylene), PVDF (polyvinylidene fluoride), ETFE (ethylene tetrafluoroethylene) and PTFE (polytetrafluoroethylene). Resistoflex® offers solutions for resolving permeation issues in severe service applications. Resistoflex® corrosion-resistant plastic lined pipe, fittings, and TEFLON® chemical hoses are used in corrosive fluid services as an economical alternative to expensive alloys.

RESISTOPURE®

ResistoPure™ is a brand of products offered by Resistoflex® for the biotech, pharmaceutical, food & beverage, and cosmetics industries. It offers a comprehensive line of silicone, Teflon® convoluted, and smooth bore hoses specifically for the sanitary and aseptic markets.

REVO®

The REVO® brand is the standard for excellence and performance in actuator technology and is widely recognized in the process industries as a leader in quality and innovation.

ROTOMAX™

ROTOmax ™ by RESISTOFLEX ® (Formerly known as RESISTOFLEX® Large Diameter Pipe) stands at the forefront of roto-lining solutions, boasting a comprehensive array of lined pipe, fittings, tanks, vessels, and intricate shapes. With its liners crafted from ETFE, PP, and HDPE, ROTOmax seamlessly integrates corrosion resistance into metallic piping systems. Its cutting-edge technology not only ensures unparalleled protection against corrosive elements but also guarantees durability and reliability in diverse industrial applications. From chemical processing to wastewater treatment, ROTOmax epitomizes excellence, offering a solution that exceeds expectations and sets the standard for corrosion mitigation in piping infrastructure globally.

SAUNDERS® HC4

SAUNDERS®HC4 is a leading global supplier of aseptic diaphragm valve flow solutions to the Life Science industries. A comprehensive platform of innovative forged and machined block solutions, unique in-house polymer competence and class leading automation and sensing technologies enable our customers to handle critical process applications with maximum security and efficiency.

SAUNDERS®IDV

SAUNDERS®IDV- Since P K Saunders invented the original diaphragm valve in 1928, Saunders® has led the way in providing class-leading fluid handling solutions to a diverse range of critical industries. Saunders® Industrial Diaphragm Valve range encompasses a complete line of manual and linear actuated diaphragm valves, both weir and straight through styles, playing a vital role in flow control applications in many diverse industries including Chemical, Mining and Water Treatment.

STOCKHAM®

Stockham® provides a wide variety of bronze, cast iron gate, globe, angle, check, ball and butterfly valves, as well as cast steel ball and butterfly valves. Stockham® valves are specified for service in chemical plants, petroleum refineries, pulp and paper mills, and in commercial and industrial construction projects.

TECHNIFAB

Technifab Products is a leading cryogenic equipment manufacturer specializing in designing, manufacturing, and installing cryogenic equipment. We develop complete cryogenic solutions and vacuum jacketed piping for any industry because We Know Cryo®

TEXAS SAMPLING®

TEXAS SAMPLING® is focused on the application, design, support and supply of custom-engineered grab sample systems in industrial environments.

WESTLOCK CONTROLS®

Westlock is a global market leader in innovative and emerging technologies in the valve position monitoring, digital control & monitoring and smart positioning serving the global oil & gas, chemical, petro-chemical and general industry markets.

WTA®

Founded in 1978, WTA® designs and manufactures a comprehensive range of high quality bellows sealed globe valves, chlorine valves, changeover valves, relief valves and special valves designed to meet the stringent specifications required by the global chemical and petrochemical industries.

XOMOX®

Established in 1956, XOMOX® offers the broadest range of process valves and actuators in the industry, including quarter-turn sleeved plug valves, ball valves, high performance butterfly valves and lined plug and ball valves. Xomox® products are intended for corrosive and toxic chemical processing applications and feature superior fugitive emissions control.

In the scrap and recycling industry, durable attachments like scrap grapples are essential for efficiently handling large material quantities. SCRAP GRAPPLES

In the scrap industry, scrap grapples are indispensable for swiftly handling large material quantities. With non-stop operations, durability is paramount. Scrap enthusiasts are notorious for pushing scrap grapples to their limits. Be it recycling vehicles, appliances, or demolishing structures, dependable scrap attachments are essential. Rest assured, BATEMAN's got you covered with reliable material handling solutions for scrap handling.

SCRAP MAGNET GENERATORS

Bateman Hydraulic & Diesel Scrap Magnet Generator kits are expertly crafted for optimal performance, specifically tailored to streamline excavator conversions and various material handling tasks in scrap and recycling applications. Bateman remains at the forefront of the industry, providing the most dependable hydraulic & diesel-powered magnet generators available. Each kit comes complete with cables and controls, ensuring seamless integration excavator generator conversion. Enhance efficiency further by pairing our generators with Bateman's renowned Magnet Grapple (Mag-Grab), Demo-Mag, and Magnet Bucket attachments.

ABOUT US

HOW WE STARTED

Established in 1989 in Barrie, Ontario, BATEMAN moved to Orillia, Ontario in 2002 due to an increase in demand & product.


In 2011, BATEMAN once again moved to a 35,000 sq. ft. facility in Oro-Medonte, Ontario in response to another increase in demand. In 2019, BATEMAN was purchased by GRYB, a material handling attachments manufacturer based in Victoriaville, Quebec.


Today, BATEMAN is proud to be a leading supplier of products both domestically and internationally.

Established in 1967 by Peter Meirik, Progress Steel has become an instrumental partner among major players in the steel industry. Areas of Practice
CNC PLASMA CUTTING

Our 130 amp, high definition CNC plasma table has a working area of 72” x 240”, with the capacity to cut material from 26 GA (0.018”) up to 1 ½”. We are able to cut mild steel, stainless steel and aluminum. High definition plasma tables offer an excellent mix of capabilities that provide a great cut capability/cost proposition compared to laser and water jet tables.

ROLLING

Our three plate rollers allow us to handle a wide variety of materials and sizes to form cylinders, rings and cones/transitions from 18 GA (0.048”) up to 3/8”. Our plasma table’s software allows us to layout complex ducting to suit many applications.

CNC PUNCH

Equipped with a CNC punch and an ironworker, we have the ability to handle thin sheet and thick plate. Our CNC punch can handle material from 18 GA (0.048”) to ¼” plate and is furnished with a vast assortment of standard and custom dies to punch round, square, rectangular and hexagonal holes, in addition to slots and louvers. Our ironworker can punch flat bar and angle, as well as plate up to 1” thick.

FORMING

With three hydraulic brake presses, including a 250t CNC brake with a 12ft bed, we can bend and form material to suit many applications. In addition to standard 90 degree bends, we can also do complex bends, safety lips, and bumping of large cones/transitions that would be beyond the capability of our plate rollers. Brake forming allows us to form custom angles and channels, as well as trays, panels, enclosures etc.

SHEARING

Our 10ft shear can cut material from 18 GA (0.048”) to 3/8” plate for mild steel and aluminum, and stainless steel up to 3/16”.

MIG AND TIG WELDING

CWB certified to weld steel and stainless steel, with capabilities to also weld aluminum, we have a group of very knowledgeable and experienced workers with decades of experience in fitting and welding. We have equipment to do arc, MIG and TIG welding, as well as resistance spot welding and stainless steel fusing.

Efficiency, Precision and Creativity

Brokel Stainless Ltd is synonymous with efficiency, precision and creativity. If you’re looking for a company that can deliver excellent results within your prescribed deadline, look no further. We offer our services at fair and competitive pricing with guaranteed customer satisfaction. Whether you need a custom kitchen piece fabricated and installed or simply want an accent architectural piece to make a statement in your space, our stainless steel experts will get the job done.

We cater to projects of all scales in hospitality, commercial, residential, industrial, and institutional sectors. We never compromise quality or safety in our efforts to provide speedy service, and you can trust our stainless steel products to be of the highest quality possible.

VIEW SERVICES

Industry Experts for Tailored Solutions

In any industry, we provide custom designed solutions that cater to your requests and requirements. There are a variety of steel options to choose from as well as a variety of finishes and design elements that can be incorporated into your ordered products. Speak to us to get more information and know about your options. Whether you are looking for a clean, traditional aesthetic for a hospital or want a sleek, modern structure, we look forward to serving your industry niche.

INDUSTRIES WE SERVE
	
WHY CHOOSE BROKEL STAINLESS FOR YOUR STAINLESS STEEL PROJECTS?

We are Versatile & Adaptable

We cater to every industry—hospitality, work force housing & camps, commercial, industrial, institutional, and residential. Our hospitality industry experts can handle any type and scale of project, from a full-scale restaurant fit out with prep lines, bar fit outs, heating and cooling tables and range hoods to securing singular pieces like sinks tables and shelves. Our commercial products like wall protection, custom trims, enclosures, fire rate panels or building safety systems like handrails, balustrades and barriers are made with precision and great quality. No matter what your stainless steel use is, we have got you covered with expert designed solutions.

High-Quality is Our Bread and Butter

Our top priority, aside from customer care and service, is quality. At Brokel, we believe in high quality products created by high quality people. Our team is incredibly skilled and dedicated to always performing their best. We have the skills & experience necessary to design highly complex systems that are functional, safe and durable. We do not take shortcuts and we never settle for less than impressive results for every client we serve.

Customized Service

We understand that even within specific industry niches, not all requirements are the same. We will partner with you every step of the way to ensure that our results match your needs to a tee. Even if you want something that has never been created or done before, we can do it better than you imagine. We enjoy pushing the envelope and being creative, and we eagerly look forward to any challenge you throw our way.

Customer Service

Customer satisfaction is our philosophy. From design to install, we make certain you have a pleasant experience with us, and we do everything in our power to deliver 100% satisfaction guarantee. If an issue arises at any stage of design, manufacturing, or installation process, we address it quickly and effectively. We are highly communicative and make certain that our customers are regularly informed and updated about their projects, be it discussing setbacks or highlighting successes.

The Finest Custom Stainless Steel Fabricators in Western Canada

For the design, fabrication, or installation of stainless steel products, you have chosen the best people for the job. We take pride in creating pieces that are not only functional, but also aesthetically beautiful. We create the stainless steel appeal with our years of experience, skills, and an excellent team. We are happy to offer ongoing support to all our clients. If you need mechanical or technical support at any time for any of our products, just let us know.

Products
Aerospace

Cesaroni Technology Inc. is a leader in the development and manufacture of rocket propellant and rocket airframes.

Sport Rocketry

CTI has developed and manufactures a line of single use and reloadable rocket motors for use in both model and high-power sport rocketry.

The products range from small 29 mm motors to 150 mm reloadable motors. These include the largest certified sport motors on the planet.

Choose from 12 different propellant formulations.

For technical specifications, dealers and more information visit Pro38.com.

CTI also manufactures a line of hybrid rocket motors for the sport market.

See HyperTekHybrids.com for more information.

Commercial Rocketry

Cesaroni Technology Inc. is a professional partner, working with a variety of customers on a wide variety of projects.

We can take projects from concept to testing, build and commercial production, including obtaining the various regulatory approvals.

CTI has experience with both solid fuel and hybrid propulsion systems.

Past projects include:

pyrotechnic pin actuators
Igniter and ignition systems
gas generator systems
weather rocket motors
rockets and effects for television and film
currency destruction systems
parachute extraction systems
boosters for UAV's
rocket sled boosters
motors for missile target systems
missile boost motors
sounding rockets
sub-orbital space capable launch vehicles
Ammunition

Cesaroni Technology Inc. has been providing lead-free frangible bullets to all major ammunition manufacturers worldwide for over 20 years. Since the market introduction of CTI's bullets in the mid 90's, the company has provided over 1 billion bullets to defence and law enforcement users around the globe including the DND and the US DoD for both CQB training and tactical operations.

Cesaroni Technology Incorporated (CTI) is expanding its line-up of lead-free frangible bullets to include a number of 300AAC Blackout, 9 mm and 5.56x45 variants as well as a variety of shot gun projectiles. The product line ranges from .22LR to .50BMG and includes all popular pistol and rifle calibres in both copper-jacketed and unjacketed styles including 4.6mm, 5.56x45, 9mm, .40S&W, 7.62x39 and 7.62x51 calibres. Shot gun projectiles include both spherical buckshot and slug designs for 12 gauge applications.

When combined with lead-free primers, Cesaroni's bullets offer a true 100% lead-free alternative to reduced lead and encapsulated lead ammunition. The bullets also offer a number of advantages over other lead-free designs including reduced ricochet, reduced splashback, improved accuracy, improved robustness and increased lethality all at a very competitive price.

Current CTI Ammunition Product List (.pdf)

PolyCoil Heat Exchangers

Cesaroni Technology Inc. manufactures a range of all plastic heat exchangers for a variety of industries.

Cesaroni Technology Inc. has developed and manufactures a range of high performance polymer heat exchangers under the brand name PolyCoil.

These heat transfer systems have been developed for a variety of applications, including:

HVAC equipment
small pleasure craft
geothermal
evaporative fluid coolers
military vehicles
automotive
thermal ice storage systems
and more.

The all-polymeric construction makes them corrosion resistant and much less susceptible to damage when compared to current systems with fragile metal fins. The light weight of the systems makes installation simple. This makes them ideal for harsh environments.

For more detailed information, visit the PolyCoil Heat Exchanger website.

Test Equipment

Cesaroni Technology Inc. manufactures turnkey test cells for everything from large engines to smaller benchtop equipment.

CTI is an authorized integrator for Taylor Dynamometer.

Past projects include:

Breakout boxes for missile defence systems
Alternator Test Bench
Rocket Motor Thrust Stands
Calorimeter Wind Tunnels
Engine Dynamometer Cells for the TTC
Engine Dynamometer Cells for heavy military vehicles

The Fike Difference

We here at Fike have the awesome responsibility of knowing what we do matters. Every day we come to work with the understanding that the products we manufacture and the services we provide make a real difference in the world and in the individual lives of whom we serve. 

That’s why our dedication to research and testing, new manufacturing technologies, unmatched system design and on-site technical assistance all contribute to one important promise: when a Fike product is called upon, it works.

Because So Much Is At Stake™.

Trusted Partner

Regardless of your challenge, your local Fike experts are available to guide you throughout your entire journey of protection and compliance and answer any of your questions regarding industrial safety.

Global Manufacturing

Fike products are manufactured across the globe with facilities in the US, Wales, Belgium and Canada, and fire suppression fill stations in Dubai, UAE and Malaysia help minimize global lead times.

Research & Testing

Industry-recognized product and application testing verifies Fike solutions perform exactly as intended in real-world settings and comply with regional standards.

Support & Service

Disasters don’t wait. That’s why if you call us, we answer 24/7. Our global technicians can walk you through any issue or be on site to solve your problem.

Eric Krall, Facility Manager, First Quality

Titus Steel Products: Your Industrial Steel Supply Leader

TITUS STEEL began business in 1957 working from a small warehouse and office in Toronto Canada. The industrial steel supply company provided Wear Steel Castings to the construction and mining industry. Shortly thereafter, arrangements were made with a local steel mill to roll a variety of Grouser Bars which were sold to the construction industry to rebuild crawler tractor pads.

Decades of Experience Supplying Industrial Steel

Over the years, a number of exceptional wear and impact resistant products were added to the company’ collection including Manganese and ENDURA wear plate and bars, sourced from specialty steel mills in Europe. Armor plate is sourced from northern Europe and several exclusive mold and die steels are sourced from Japan.

In the early 1970’s, the company designed, developed and tested a heavy duty high performance Rock Injector Pile Point used to protect and seat steel piles being driven into sloping rock in the Precambrian shield. This innovated pile point continues to be specified by governments and geotechnical engineers across North America.

In the decades since, our industrial steel supply the company has grown, moving to ever-larger industrial steel supply facilities. We have offices and warehouses in Toronto, Ontario and Cartersville, Georgia.

We work hard to build lasting relationships with our suppliers and our customers. We are experts in the field of wear and impact resistant products. Titus Steel products and solutions enable our customers to reduce downtime, increase payload and protect their employees. We are driven by quality and innovation solutions.

We are – “The Abrasion and Impact Wear Steel Specialists”

Welcome to Superior Air Systems – Your Trusted HVAC Partner for Commercial and Industrial Solutions







		



DESIGN / BUILD  •  HEATING  •  AIR CONDITIONING  •  VENTILATION




At Superior Air Systems, we take pride in being the premier provider of top-notch heating, air conditioning, and ventilation solutions for commercial and industrial clients. With a legacy of excellence spanning over 35 years, our dedicated team of experts has been committed to delivering superior comfort, efficiency, and indoor air quality to businesses across the region.


		






Experience the difference of working with the HVAC experts at Superior Air Systems. To discuss your HVAC needs or schedule a consultation, get in touch with us today.





 


		




Our Services




Service:
At Superior Air Systems, we take pride in offering comprehensive HVAC service solutions tailored to meet your specific needs. Our skilled technicians are well-equipped to diagnose and troubleshoot a wide range of HVAC issues, ensuring your systems run optimally and efficiently.



Repair:
When your HVAC systems encounter problems, our team of experts is here to provide prompt and reliable repair services. We understand the urgency of getting your systems back up and running, and we work diligently to minimize downtime and disruptions to your operations.



Construction:
For new construction projects or HVAC system upgrades, Superior Air Systems has the experience and expertise to handle the design, installation, and commissioning of HVAC systems. Our construction services are backed by meticulous planning and seamless execution to ensure maximum performance and energy efficiency.



Metal Fabrication:
With our in-house metal fabrication shop, we have the ability to create custom metal components for HVAC systems, tailoring solutions to your specific requirements. This capability allows us to offer unique, efficient, and cost-effective HVAC solutions that perfectly fit your space.







Why Choose Us







Expert Technicians: Our team consists of highly skilled and certified technicians with extensive knowledge of HVAC systems. You can trust us to deliver superior craftsmanship and professional service.


24/7 Emergency Support: HVAC emergencies can happen at any time. That's why we offer 24/7 emergency support, ensuring that you have access to assistance whenever you need it.

Tailored Solutions: We understand that each business has unique requirements. Our solutions are customized to fit your specific needs, ensuring maximum efficiency and cost-effectiveness.

Quality Materials: Superior Air Systems uses only high-quality materials and equipment from reputable manufacturers to ensure long-lasting and reliable HVAC solutions.

Energy Efficiency: At Superior Air Systems, we prioritize green and energy-efficient solutions to help you reduce your carbon footprint while saving on utility bills.

Comprehensive Maintenance: We offer comprehensive maintenance plans to keep your HVAC systems running smoothly, preventing unexpected breakdowns and costly repairs.


Competitive Pricing: We believe that top-quality HVAC services should be accessible to all businesses. Our competitive pricing and transparent billing ensure you get the best service without breaking the bank.







Industries We Serve




Our expertise in HVAC systems extends across various industries, including but not limited to:

Critical Emergency Buildings
Community Recreation Centres
Laboratory Testing & Storage Facilites 
Solid Waste & Water Treatment Plants
Commercial Office Spaces
Retail Stores and Shopping Centres
Industrial Warehouses and Factories
Hospitals and Healthcare Facilities
Educational Institutions
Hospitality and Restaurants




 


		




  

We look forward to serving you and ensuring your business enjoys the comfort and efficiency it deserves. Let Superior Air Systems be your go-to HVAC partner for all your commercial and industrial needs.





 


	
	

416-742-7447info@superiorairsystems.ca50 Baywood Rd. Etobicoke, ON, M9V 3Z3

YOUR PRODUCT DEMANDS SPS QUALITY
We are dedicated to providing the goods and services that our customers have come to expect – with the care and precision that each job deserves
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
DESIGN
FABRICATION
INSTALLATION
Innovative Engineering

Stainless Piping Systems has a dedicated team of experienced professional engineers and CanBIM affiliated mechanical designers committed to the successful completion of every project, no matter the size. The engineering team is the first of three pillars that compose the backbone of our company, responsible for the interpretation of our customer needs and realization via design.

SPS engineers take pride in ensuring an open line of communication with all our clients and provide support and assistance from product conception, through to fabrication and on field installation. Our customers have come to expect exactly what we can deliver: Accuracy and cost-effective product delivery. Equipped with cutting edge graphic design software and project management tools, our engineering team will carry through the different stages of a project from start to finish ensuring efficient and timely problem solving to any project challenges.

True Prefabrication

Serving as the second pillar, the SPS manufacturing team has perfected the art of piping system fabrication over its thirty plus years of industry experience. Equipped with cutting edge equipment and a knowledgeable crew, the quality of workmanship we have provided to the pharmaceutical, as well as various other industries, has given us a reputation of being the best in the business. Capable of expanding to twice its size to accommodate large projects, the production floor consists of a skid fabrication shop, pipe fabrication shop, passivation shop as well as offsite warehousing availabilities.

Utilizing years of experience along with current and expanding computer aided techniques, our high degree of pre-fabrication ensures a consistent and high-quality product, delivered in the most cost-effective manner possible. At Stainless Piping Systems, we are dedicated to excellence. Our customers expect that and we expect it from ourselves. Our thorough and comprehensive attention to detail insures each and every job ends with a satisfied customer.

Efficient Installation

The third and final pillar is represented by our skilled field team, which is accomplished in executing high profile jobs in high profile applications. Accompanied by field engineers and the full support of the United Association Local 46 Union, we are capable of executing large construction jobs running 60+ personnel at on site locations.

Thanks to our “True Prefabrication” approach we bring the highest cost savings with fastest installation completion times in the industry. Stainless Piping Systems believes the timely execution of field installation is crucial to project success and client satisfaction.

To ensure this belief is always met, SPS will assemble up to 75% of a piping system in house, minimizing on field square footage required for installation and site shutdown time.

STAINLESS PIPING SYSTEMS
IN BUSINESS SINCE 1989

TRICENTRIC® DESIGN

The TRICENTRIC® triple offset valve is a brand leader in shutoff performance and dependability. As the first North American design, with over 50 years of global install base experience, the proven non-rubbing closure performance exceeds end-user demands across a wide range of applications.

Learn More

HIGHSEAL® DESIGN

With over 40 years of global install base experience, HIGHSEAL® double offset and concentric butterfly valves provide a variety of design configurations, styles, and materials for cost-effective solutions to suit every application across today’s process industries.

Learn More

COMPLIMENTARY PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

SCORE VALVES also provides gear operators; actuators with accessories; pipe spools; spacers; tees; extensions; testing for ambient, cryogenic, high temperature, and emissions; and engineering support for application design, material selection, and sizing.

Learn More

PARTS, MAINTENANCE, AND LEGACY PRODUCTS

SCORE VALVES supplies original equipment replacement parts and replacement legacy valves, at expedited lead times for all TRICENTRIC® valves manufactured since the mid-1970s,  along with customer-focused aftermarket maintenance service at our 30,000 sq ft facility or on-site, as required.

Learn More

APPLICATIONS

SCORE VALVES’ extensive 35 years of application experience, with over 30,000 valves installed across all industries, has firmly established SCORE VALVES as a leading butterfly valve solution provider.

Learn More

OIL & GAS / REFINING 

SCORE VALVES’ standard and custom solutions for oil & gas and refining are found in all industry sectors—upstream, midstream, and downstream. Worldwide installation by all major end-users is supported by our comprehensive butterfly valve product line from the rugged, non-rubbing TRICENTRIC® triple offset design, to the economical HIGHSEAL® designs.

TESTIMONIALS
Amazing service and high quality hats made with outstanding craftsmanship! Recommend to anyone who is looking for Canadian Uniform needs.
Jonah Carlson
OH MY GOODNESS! Their court mounting is absolutely amazing. I sent my medals all the way from BC and got them back within a week. They look wonderful and they were so nice ! 10/10 definitely would recommend to everyone !
Sarah Miller
William Scully Ltd is Canada's premier uniform cap maker. I am a collector and they have made several historic replica caps for me that could not be found or made anywhere else. They have been government and MOD contractors since their inception in 1877, that's amazing! Their experience and knowledge is unmatched and Josee, their caps Manager is wonderful to work with. Just send an e-mail and photo of what you may want and it gets done correctly. I ordered a Canadian Grenadier Guards Officer's No.1 Cap from them and it is perfect. It was also about half the cost of what I may have paid from a UK maker. Don't buy a reproduction from anywhere else! they're all wrong.
Kirk Manning
Ordered three forage caps for my wedding, they were completed and delivered in the shortest delay possible. Although there was a slight mistake, the gang at Scully's quickly rectified it and went beyond what I had expected. I would strongly recommend them.
Rich Law
In this day and age, to have such top notch, personalized service was SO refreshing. The family history of service to our country and the fast, professional service made buying from Scully an obvious choice. The sword I received was exactly as described and was to Regimental Standards. Only shop here if you want the best; and are interesred in professional and knowledgeable staff.
Gavin Duffy
Hello I have received my service medals today. I would like to Thank you so much for the very professional workmanship of my service medals. You can be sure that I will spread the word to everyone in my surrounding.
Edouard Boisjoly
My Grandfather was a fighter pilot in the R.C.A.F during WWII. I was entrusted with his war medals, and needed a way to showcase them proudly in my home office. William Scully Ltd did an impeccable job at restoring these medals, and because of their meticulous care, the medals are now safeguarded within a glass case, perfectly restored. I highly recommend the services of Will Scully Ltd, as not only did they perfectly restore prized family heirlooms, they did so with outstanding service!
Gordon Watkin
I prefer to have my medals mounted by Scully Ltd because they have incredible knowledge and expertise, as well as, the work ethic to provide you with a superior product. I had my Afghan Campaign Star mounted by someone else and required Scully to fix them. I also enjoy the fact that this is probably one of the last, long standing Canadian family businesses who have supported the Canadian military with corporate knowledge of ceremonial uniform accoutrements and the likes for over 100 years!
Robin Thibault
William Scully Ltd exceeded my expectations. I was in search of a very specific military patch and was amazed by the sheer volume of their inventory. The website is user friendly and I received my quote within the hour. What prompted me to write a review was their excellent customer service. This company comes highly recommended and I will be sharing this experience with my RCAF colleagues out here in Cold Lake, AB!
Steven Pollard

WHO WE ARE

Pro Laser Plus Ltd. is a custom metal fabricator located in Concord, Ontario. With more than 15 years of experience, we provide a full range of services ranging from individual components to complete assemblies.

	
WHAT WE DO

We provide a wide range of in-house services including laser cutting and water jet cutting for various materials. Furthermore, we provide our customers with numerous value added service such as forming, rolling, welding and fabrication, finishing and assembly and various engineering services.

	
HOW TO GET A QUOTE

Getting in touch with us is easy! Email us at info@prolaserplus.com with your request and drawings.

Read our guide to RFQs here!

Let us introduce ourselves

OUR STORY

Founded in 2003, Pro Laser Plus Ltd. is an ISO 9001 registered company that provides high-quality custom manufacturing services. We have the expertise and resources to assist your business with its outsourcing production ranging from individual components to complete assemblies.

We service a variety of industries such as conveyor manufacturers, flight simulators, automotive, armored vehicles, heavy and speciality machinery, store fixtures, construction, and food industries. We also manufacture custom-made artwork products.

PLPL is a ‘one-stop’ shop for all of your metal fabricating needs. With us, you can only expect superior customer service, quick turnaround times and the reliability of a trusted business partner.

OUR SERVICES

We provide a wide range of in-house services…

WATERJET CUTTING

Waterjet cutting provides exceptionally quick, precise and accurate cuts into virtually any material. Due to its versatility, the waterjet can be used in almost every industry.The waterjet is an accurate and powerful machine that can cut up to eight inches. Waterjet cutting has the ability to vary tolerances in different locations on a single part…

Learn More
	
LASER CUTTING

Our state of the art laser cutting machines have revolutionized everyday production in sheet metal fabrication. We produce higher quality edges and superior overall quality….

Learn More
	
FORMING/ROLLING

Pro Laser Plus possesses two CNC press brakes and a bending roll that is used to form and bend parts to customer specifications…

Learn More
MACHINING

Our custom metal fabrication division serves many industries by providing parts, subassemblies and fully assembled products in a wide variety of metals and finishes…

Learn more
	
WELDING/FABRICATION

Simple or complex, our certified welding services are fully supported with all pre and post weld processes to deliver complete welding solutions….

Learn more
	
FINISHING/ASSEMBLY

We offer a full finishing and assembly service. Metal component finishing and assembly is an efficient after-service that saves our clients time and money through the provision of a single point of purchase..

About us

Pioneer in the industry since 1966, Pultrusion Technique is a major player in the development of fiber-reinforced polymer (FRP) composites. Our products are protected by numerous patents, and some exceed international standards. They are the most efficient, robust, resistant, durable and cost-efficient in the market, and serve diverse industries (mining, petroleum, transportation, construction and electricity).

LEARN MORE
SOME OF OUR MANY SATISFIED CLIENTS
What is pultrusion?

Pultrusion is a continuous process for manufacturing
high-strength light-weight structural parts of continuous length composite profiles, with uniform cross-sections.

During the process, fiberglass reinforcement is aligned lengthwise and impregnated with resin, pulled through a heated die and moulded to desired shape.

Special Features
Countless possibilities
Complex geometries
Superior mechanical properties
High strength
Endurance
Unmatched performance
Resistance to corrosion
Very accurate fiber orientation and a high rate of reinforcement
Lightweight
Durability
Impermeability
Minimal maintenance
Versatility
Low conductivity
Electromagnetic neutrality
Easy installation

Many industries have found Pultruded Products to be the best option that assures them of little or no maintenance, and more economic even considering the extra upfront cost.

PowerMate Stair Climber

Stair Climbing Hand Trucks and LiftGates

Welcome to PowerMate®
Home of the world's most successful stair climbing hand trucks.

Check out our INDUSTRIES pages to learn which PowerMate Solution is right for you!

Features
The PowerMate motor provides 100% of the lift
Fingertip, push button controls
Leak proof, non-memory forming rechargeable battery
Automatic braking system
Variable position strap bars
Full line of accessories available for different applications
Full range of models available up to a capacity of 1500 pounds
Solid state circuitry
Load bearing strong outer frame (steel models) resists twisting under extreme conditions
Benefits

The PowerMate Motorized Stairclimbing HandTruck does 100% of the lifting, virtually eliminating risk of back injury while reducing the effort to move heavy, awkward loads by more than 87%!

PowerMate Hand Trucks safely power products up & down stairs, on & off delivery vehicles, loading docks, and in & out of buildings.

PowerMate stairclimbers are used to safely move items like hot water tanks, boilers, furnaces, gas cylinders, major appliances, office furniture, plumbing & heating supplies, restaurant equipment, vending machines and much more.

 

A PowerMate is four machines in one: a well-balanced dolly; a powered stair climber; a loading dock leveler; a powered tailgate lift!

The PowerMate Motorized Stairclimbers will save you money, save back injuries, and save valuable time. PowerMate Safety Moving Systems - the smart, cost effective way to move your products safely.

Training Available!

Items which require 2 or 3 man crews to move conventionally can be done by one man using a PowerMate HandTruck.

Meet the "New Employee"!

Dear PowerMate.

I would like to personally thank everyone at PowerMate for the great service. We purchased our PowerMate probably around 4 years ago, and it has been a blessing. Within a week it was actually nicknamed "the new employee," and is still known as that today. I couldn't begin to count how many times it has helped us. Having a 24 hour emergency service department, we never know when the need to lift, carry, load or move a piece of equipment will come up.

Also it is wonderful because we don't have the room for a forklift or any larger type of equipment. I myself have been in situations where I had an emergency call on a weekend, and instead of calling someone in to help load a unit, I use "the new employee." I've actually showed up on job sites with large pieces of equipment, whether it a furnace, A/C, hot water heater, etc, and the customers are amazed at how a "little guy" like myself managed to load it into the truck.

Our PowerMate never ceases to amaze everyone. I could go on and on about how much we like it and everything it's capable of. The customer service department at PowerMate is also great. We receive several friendly calls every year reminding us of maintenance and asking how our PowerMate is working out. Instead of hundreds of annoying sales calls that take up time, they are short and sweet and very respectful. Although we have had no problems at all with our PowerMate, I have no doubt that they will help and take care of it quickly and the best they can.

I wouldn't hesitate to recommend PowerMate to anyone. It's a wonderful low-maintenance piece of equipment that we use on a day-to-day basis. We love "our new employee."

Thanks

Dustin Hess
Manager and HVAC Technician
Webb Electrical Heating and Cooling
Fairmont, WV

Experience the Perfect Fit

CASE STUDY 1 - Integrating special processes

Shimco has been a full-service manufacturer for over 30 years. However, special processes were always outsourced to qualified third parties and although we received quality service from those third parties, the timing to have those services completed was out of our control, adding valuable lead time to customers’ orders.  
How did Shimco Respond?

Shimco received a large industrial order for tapered metal shims with a short lead time.  Machining the shims one-by-one in a conventional work holding process would have taken 6 weeks or would have tied up most machines and machinists for a few days, negatively impacting other customers’ orders.

WELCOME TO RIPCO
Exceeding Customer Requirements Will Continue To Grow Our Business

A provider of precision sheet metal fabrication services since 1954, RIPCO offers customers quality, cost effective fabrication solutions by combining experience and advanced technologies.

With over 38,000 square feet of production area, no project is too big or too small. Our sheet metal fabrication engineering consultants work very closely with our clients as we engineer and manufacture their ideas in metal. We are continually striving to provide our customers with the highest quality product for the most reasonable price and deliver on-time every time.

We are certified to ISO 9001:2015 and all welders are certified under CWB Standard W59.1 and AWS D1.1, D1.3 and D1.6.

Our Accessibility Plan Commitment

Our commitment to our customers, both existing and new, is extended to all customers with or without disabilities requiring a need to access our goods and services. For further information or comments regarding our Accessibility Plan please call us.

About Us

Welcome to Telstar Hydraulics Ltd. Here you will find the finest standard and custom made hydraulic adapters in both carbon steel and stainless steel. Our extensive stock of adapters includes, Inch, Metric, BSPP/BSPT, Komatsu, JIS and French Gaz, to name a few. We stock sizes from 1/8″ to 2″ in most configurations. If we can not buy these adapters at reasonable prices, we will manufacture them.

We specialize in short run custom manufactured adapters in carbon steel, stainless steel or brass, made to your specifications. A few adapters that we manufacture are Test Port Adapters, Grease Block Adapters, 13″ hose menders for Raise climber hoses and Banjo to JIC adapters for fuel systems and hydraulic lines where space is limited. If you have a special requirement, send us a drawing and we will send you a quote.

Read More

Our Services

Telstar Hydraulics Ltd is a Master Distributor of Gates Hydraulic & Industrial Hoses and fittings. Due to our extensive inventory and highly experienced staff, we can assemble your hose while you wait. If needed, we can have custom adapters manufactured by our local machine shop within a couple days for delivery. Our partnered machine shop also specializes in short or long run CNC machining. Telstar manufactures custom hydraulic tubing ranging from 1/4” to 1-1/2” diameter. We also offer an On Call emergency number if your machine is down and requires immediate repairs.

ACCU-PULSE
Pulsation Dampeners

 

Accu-Pulse pulsation dampeners increase system efficiency and pump life, protect pipes, meters, valves and instrumentation from pulsation and vibration, ensure meter accuracy, longevity and repeatability. Accu-Pulse pulsation dampeners reduce pressure fluctuations and diaphragm wear, prevent foaming and splashing while decreasing maintenance costs.

  

	

 

 TOP VALVE
Back Pressure/Pressure Relief Valves

 

Top Valve is a new line of Back Pressure/Pressure Relief diaphragm style valves, introduced by Primary Fluid Systems Inc.. New features include a completely adjustable pressure range of 0-150 PSIG and a built-in air release to reduce priming difficulties with metering pumps. Available in seven sizes, 1/4" through 2" NPT and eight (8) materials of wetted construction.

Pleased to Meet You

Providing excellent service since 1965, Valley Metal Ltd. makes its home in Calgary Alberta as a proud and capable locally owned and operated family business. Valley Metal Ltd. provides a Custom Metal Work service, specializing in Welding, Metal Fabrication, Powder Coating, Electroplating and Polishing.  

At Valley Metal Ltd. we guarantee firm handshakes, and fair estimates and promise that your orders will be expertly handled by experienced hands and delivered on time and on budget. 

Services

“

Valley Metal always says what they do and do exactly what they said they would. We take pride in all we create and do. We are honest. We are a fun company to deal with and treat everyone as a special customer

”

— Larry Loeb 

What We Do

Valley Metal Ltd. business production is rooted in four main branches: Architectural, Residential, Custom work and Hospitality/ Restaurant. Whether ordering new guard rails or kitchen island supports, chroming car parts, or hiring us to help you create your dream home Valley Metal can do it all.   

Valley Metal Ltd. still creates custom work for those with small requests. Our large projects for franchised hospitality and luxury architectural projects are treated with the same respect and eagerness as those small projects brought to us by our friends and neighbors. ABOUT OUR COMPANY

Diversified Metal Fabrication Inc. is a privately owned company operating in London, Ontario, Canada working in Stainless Steel, Mild Steel, and Aluminum Metals. Our friendly staff works hard to satisfy your needs. We are a service company and operate our business with integrity and an impeccable safety record. Diversified is proud of our no cost quoting, affordable solutions with superior quality, service and value.

We offer custom design, engineering services, fabrication, CWB certified welding and laser cutting services.


Diversified Metal Fabrication understands the challenges of business today, from the smallest part, to the largest assembly. We can help with your need for immediate service and repair, and fast turn around on parts to satisfy your schedule. We work for you� Ask about our lease to own solutions on systems�

EXPERT PIPE FABRICATION

Fuller Industrial provides custom process pipe fabrication and pipe spooling solutions, ensuring precision and durability in every project.

CORROSION AND ABRASION CONTROL

Protect your equipment with our rubber lining, ceramic lining, and industrial coatings designed to prevent corrosion and wear.

PIPE, VALVE, AND FITTINGS (PVF) SUPPLY

We offer a wide range of pipes, valves, and fittings for industrial applications, including HDPE and steel pipe and fittings.

EXPERT PRODUCT & SERVICES

COMPREHENSIVE PIPE, VALVE, AND FITTINGS (PVF) SUPPLY

We offer a complete range of pipes, valves, and fittings for industrial projects, meeting ASTM standards for durability and reliability.

ABRASION AND CORROSION CONTROL SOLUTIONS

Protect your equipment with our abrasion and corrosion control services, including rubber and ceramic linings and industrial coatings.

ADVANCED 3D PIPE DESIGN SERVICES

Our 3D pipe design services ensure precision and efficiency for complex industrial piping systems.

CUSTOM PIPE SPOOL FABRICATION

We provide custom pipe spool fabrication for various materials, ensuring precision and quality in every project.

INDUSTRIAL RUBBER LINING SERVICES

Our rubber lining protects pipes and tanks from abrasion and corrosion, ensuring long-lasting durability.

DURABLE MATERIAL HANDLING HOSES

We provide material handling hoses for industrial use, designed for strength and durability in tough applications.

CERAMIC LINING FOR ABRASION RESISTANCE

We offer ceramic lining solutions that provide superior abrasion protection for high-wear applications.

FIELD LINING AND COATING SERVICES

Our on-site field lining and coatings offer protection against corrosion and abrasion for industrial projects.

ABOUT FULLER

At Fuller Industrial, we offer process piping fabrication, corrosion and abrasion control, and pipe, valve, and fittings supply for industrial applications. Our services include rubber lining, ceramic lining, industrial coatings, and 3D pipe design to meet your project needs.

Why choose Fuller Industrial:

Custom pipe fabrication for industrial applications.
Comprehensive pipe, valve, and fittings supply.
Advanced 3D AutoCAD pipe design for complex systems.

H.E Armstrong Mechanical Ltd. has been a family owned and operated business since 1958. Offering plumbing and HVAC services to both residential and commercial customers across the Annapolis Valley and beyond. With a specialized focus on commercial plumbing and ventilation projects; from the ground up, or extensive renovation, our team has the knowledge and experience to see any project through in a professional and timely manner.

Valley Burner Service is a division of H.E Armstrong Mechanical, proudly providing the Annapolis Valley with home comfort since 1996. Specializing in the installation and maintenance of oil-fired burner equipment, we also offer year-round home comfort solutions with the installation of heat pumps, HRV and ERV systems, new installations, or modifications to ductwork, and much more!

High Volume Production Services

Integrated Metal Products has become a trusted supplier in both batch and high volume manufacturing of complex, high-precision fabricated components from light to heavy gauge in a variety of specified metals.

	
We’re in the Business of Forming Partnerships

Our partnership with you is built on service. If you need quick delivery, we will respond. If your schedule changes, we will change ours. We understand that our success is solely based on the success of our customers.

	
Industries Served

We have extensive experience in serving a diverse range of industries, including: Specialized industrial, electrical, electronics, tier 2 & 3 automotive, medical, aerospace, food, commercial truck, military, heavy equipment, and off-road vehicles.

	
Quality Assurance

Integrated Metal Products takes quality assurance very seriously. We are ISO 9001:2015 certified, qualified with the Canadian Welding Bureau, and certified under the Canadian Controlled Goods Program for national defence and security applications.

INDUSTRY LEADERS

Integrated Metal Products is an industry leader providing full service contract manufacturing of precision fabricated metal components. We have the proven expertise to make your product from initial design, through prototyping, and onto full production. Our state-of-the-art, purpose-built facility is equipped with some of the most up-to-date manufacturing equipment of any plant in North America. IMP has a professional management structure to ensure that we continue to be a leader in our industry, employ best business practices, provide long-term stability, meet our community and environmental responsibilities and provide outstanding customer service.

Learn more
AN INTEGRATIVE APPROACH

Integrated Metal Products offers a single source manufacturing solution. Our advanced manufacturing technologies, state-of-the-art CNC equipment and automated systems enable us to provide flexible and responsive manufacturing for a diverse range of industries. We take pride in our ability to become an extension of our client’s operations and integrating with their production. Our world-class facilities are located in Guelph, Ontario, serving markets not only throughout North America but globally as well. Experience the integrative approach with Integrated Metal Products.

STATE-OF-THE-ART FACILITY

From design and engineering to prototyping, fabrication, finishing, final assembly, quality control, logistics and delivery.

Integrated Metal Products combines administration, engineering, prototyping, fabrication, production, finishing, assembly, quality control and logistics all under one roof. Our state-of-the-art purpose built facility is equipped with some of the most up-to-date manufacturing equipment of any plant in North America. This allows us to provide a seamless customer experience by controlling costs, maximizing production capacity, maintaining quality and insuring on-time delivery.  IMP is located in the Eastern Time Zone and the heart of Canada’s world-renowned technology and manufacturing region.

Metalok360 MFG Corp. is a Canadian-owned and operated OEM of M-LOK® clamp connectors.

Tested and proven all M-LOK® clamp connectors are compliant with the following and are fully interchangeable with other well-known brands available.

Metalok360 MFG Corp. implements, for all its design, production and marketing cycles, procedures and is compliant with the requirements of the international ISO standard.

The quality assurance system for the manufacture of pressure vessels is compliant with the requirements of the European Directive 2014/68

M-LOK® High Integrity Metal-To-Metal Seal Clamp Connector Benefits

Only 4 bolts to install, compared with 8-24 bolts ANSI and ASME flanges

Lower bolt torque

Lower torque requirements, no requirement for special hydraulic tensioning.

Smaller & Lighter

The efficient design results in an M-LOK® connector that is substantially smaller in size and much lighter in weight when compared to an equivalent ANSI and ASME flanges.

Decrease Downtime

Quick assembly & disassembly with fewer bolts and parts overall, no bolt holes to align.

Metalok360 MFG Corp. “Quikspool”
Fully interchangeable with *Grayloc® connectors

Metalok360 MFG Corp. “Quikspool” is a modular pipe system which allows you to build a permanent pipework system without the costs and hassle associated with onsite welding. Metalok360 MFG Corp. have designed a flexible module system which consists of either cold drawn mandrel bent pipes with green ends or pre welded spools with green ends or the option with buttweld fittings, with pipe extensions and welded to ASME B31.

Metalok360 MFG Corp. Coatings

Metalok360 MFG Corp. coatings offer versatile solutions for protecting and reinforcing various structures, particularly in challenging environments like marine settings. Here are the key benefits and applications of Metalok360 MFG Corp. coatings:

 
 
 
M-Wrap System

M-Wrap is a versatile and robust solution designed for structural repair and protection. Here are the key features and benefits of the M-Wrap system:

1.Self-Contained Wrapping System:
Resin-Impregnated and Water-Activated: M-Wrap is easy to apply, as it comes pre-impregnated with resin and activates with water.
Wet Lay-Up: This application method ensures a strong bond to the surface being treated.
2.High-Strength Dielectric Insulation Composite Material:
Abrasion Protection: M-Wrap provides a durable layer that protects surfaces from physical wear and tear.
Corrosion Prevention: It effectively shields against environmental factors that cause corrosion, extending the lifespan of the underlying materials.
3.Wide Range of Applications:
Material Compatibility: M-Wrap can be used on a variety of materials, including steel, concrete, HDPE, and PVC, to mention a few, making it a versatile choice for many structural repairs and reinforcements.
4.Long-Term Performance:
Extensive Creep Testing: M-Wrap has undergone rigorous testing to ensure its reliability over time.
25-Year Load-Carrying Capacity: The system maintains more than 50% of its static strength even after 25 years, demonstrating its long-term durability and effectiveness in load-bearing applications.

Overall, M-Wrap offers a comprehensive solution for protecting and reinforcing a wide range of materials, ensuring structural integrity and longevity.

 
 
 
Metalok360 MFG Corp. Carbon Fibre Repair System (MCFR)
Tank and Corrosion

Corrosion is one of the major issues faced by industrial tanks. As tanks age, they are prone to both external and internal corrosion. To combat this, various repair and reinforcement methods have been developed:

1.Metalok360 MFG Corp. Coatings and Fiber-Reinforced Composite Systems:

These have been effectively used for tank bottom repair and reinforcement for years.

2.Current Technologies:

Innovations such as carbon fiber-based composites have expanded the range of available repairs. These include:

Full Composite Tank Reinforcement: Providing comprehensive structural support.
Sectional Reinforcement: Targeting specific areas of the tank for added strength.
Composite Patch Repairs: Addressing cracks and pinholes efficiently with durable composite materials.

These advancements in technology help prolong the lifespan of industrial tanks by addressing corrosion issues more effectively.

 
 
 
Concrete Deterioration
1.Protection and Strengthening:
Concrete Protection: Effective in safeguarding concrete surfaces from damage and degradation.
Pile and Structural Repair: Can be used to repair or reinforce piles and other structures by encasing them in high-quality concrete.
Underwater Installation: Particularly well-suited for projects that require underwater installation, offering reliable performance in submerged conditions.
2.Long-Term Durability:
Medium to Long-Term Protection: Repairs designed with Metalok360 MFG Corp. coatings can significantly extend the lifespan of jetties and marine structures, ensuring long-term durability.
Resistance to Carbonation and Chloride Ion Penetration: Provides robust protection against these common causes of concrete deterioration, enhancing the overall durability of the treated structures.
3.Enhanced Strength:
Inclusion of Steel Reinforcement: Where additional strength is required, steel reinforcement can be incorporated into the repair design, further enhancing the structural integrity of the treated areas.

Overall, Metalok360 MFG Corp. coatings offer a comprehensive solution for the repair, protection, and strengthening of structures, ensuring their longevity and resilience against environmental stressors.

 
 
 
M-Sealer

Metalok360 MFG Corp. M-Sealer solution with our proprietary applications is able to stop leaks for applications in pipes and tanks.

Specific Benefits.

M-Sealer cures under water and will adheres to most surfaces. When cured it has a high comprehensive strength and good adhesion to most surfaces. National Sanitation Foundation (NSF) Approved Epoxy adhesive cures in 10 minutes to a steel like finish.

Welcome to Alberta Custom Pipe Bending & Mfg.

Alberta Custom Pipe Bending & Mfg. (2010) Ltd. located in Edmonton, Alberta is a solely privately owned Canadian company formed in 1988. We are an ASME and National Board Certified Fabrication Facility. We have 31,375 sq. ft. of shop space located in Western Canada in the center of industrial activity. Alberta Custom Pipe Bending & Mfg. (2010) Ltd is well positioned to serve the Resource Industries, including Oil and Gas, Refining, Petrochemical, and Pulp and Paper as well as structural and architectural firms.

We have in house design capabilities for all products that we offer. Our success over the years can be directly paralleled to our knowledge and experience in the fabrication and pipe bending industry. As our customers continue to demand more innovative and effective services, Alberta Custom Pipe Bending & Mfg. (2010) Ltd. will continue to meet the industry requirements.

With focus on safety, compliance and quality, Alberta Custom Pipe Bending & Mfg (2010) Ltd. is dedicated to providing the highest quality product as per customer specification and requirements on-time.

YOUR TRUSTED PLUMBING & HOT WATER HEATING PROFESSIONALS
Quality & Timely Results

At Tri-City Plumbing & Heating we guarantee quality in all our work and, most importantly, timely results.

Licensed, Insured & Bonded

Tri-City Plumbing & Heating is fully licensed, insured and bonded; putting your mind at ease in an often stressful situation.

Continual Staff Training

We ensure our staff is always familiar with the latest technology and are able to apply it in all areas of work.

ABOUT US

Tri-City Plumbing & Heating has been serving the lower mainland as a family owned business for over 20 years. It’s our reputation for being honest and reliable that has kept us as your go-to plumbing provider for so long.

Centrally located in Port Coquitlam, our fleet is always ready to service all areas of the lower mainland from Abbotsford to West Vancouver, Tri-Cities to Richmond.

From our emergency hot water tank replacement service to regular plumbing services provided by our experienced licensed plumbers, Tri-City Plumbing & Heating has the skills that homeowners, contractors, and property managers need to get the job done right the first time.

OUR MISSION

Striving to meet all your plumbing & heating needs with prompt, superior customer service and competitive prices.

OUR SERVICES

You name it, we’ve seen it. Homeowners and property managers are often faced with surprise plumbing problems. There is nothing worse than having your home “out of service” while you’re waiting for the plumber to make it right. Our customers can rely on us to quickly and efficiently get things back in working order.

Repairs, replacements and new installations
Toilets
Sinks & faucets
Tubs and showers
Water heaters (regular and tankless
Boilers
Pumps & sumps
In floor radiant heat
Garbage disposal
Sewer Systems
Water & drain pipes
Exterior hose bibbs
Gas pipes
Exterior drain tile
NEW CONSTRUCTION
Z
	
Commercial Construction

Our portfolio includes a wide variety of tilt up warehouses, restaurants, retail spaces brewery’s and labs. We have worked all over the lower mainland and developed relationships with city development departments.

Z
	
New Home Construction

Tri-City Plumbing & Heating began its career in residential new construction and quickly became a front runner in the residential plumbing market. Excellent quality of service and fair pricing allowed us to be involved in the building of many subdivisions providing hundreds of new homes to families. We have received the Tradesperson of the Year Award two years in a row for our hard work and dedication. It’s the experience that we received in many years of residential housing that brought us to the custom housing market. Builders have been calling on our experience for help in the design and construction of all levels of custom homes from Anmore to West Vancouver.

From a cabin to a condo, whatever your dream is, we’ll build it for you.

Our project management and estimating departments are adept at turning the simplest of ideas into detailed plans for construction. Whether you are building your dream home or commercial space, make Tri-City Plumbing & Heating your go to call. We are known in the industry for never shying away from a challenging project or complex situation.

RENOVATION
Z
	
Home Renovations

In today’s housing market more and more homeowners are choosing to renovate their homes. This can often be challenging and costly. Our extensive knowledge in housing gives us the ability to properly assess a project and build a home quickly and efficiently. We will ensure all city requirements are met and provide only quality fixtures.

Z
	
Commercial Renovations

We have extensive experience with commercial office space, warehouse and retail renovations. Restaurants can often be a challenging task to construct, however our experience has allowed us to refine our skills and work with owners and designers effectively. Tri-City Plumbing & Heating has completed entire hotel renovations in both Vancouver and Whistler.

Z
	
Get Experienced Plumbing and Heating Specialists for Your Home
Tri-City Plumbing & Heating has over 20 years of experience in the business of helping Canadians make their homescomfortable all year round. We are your premier resource for all kinds of plumbing and heating problems. Our dedicated team is ready to provide high-quality, professional service. We are the leading plumbers in Coquitlam and have the experience and the expertise to deal with any problem with the plumbing in Port Coquitlam.

You can count on us for fast, friendly, and knowledgeable services delivered to you throughout the year. We aim to help our clients feel comfortable in their homes or workplaces by offering the best plumbing and heating services in the country. We can handle all of your problems with plumbing in Port Moody, and our team of experts will help identify all your options based on your home and family’s needs. We strive for open, straightforward conversations with our customers to meet their home comfort requirements and budget.

Superior Plumbing and Heating Services

At Tri-City Plumbing & Heating, we offer various quality plumbing services, from fixing issues with water lines to installing new fixtures and faucets. We can also handle emergency hot water tank replacement service to regular plumbing services provided by experienced and licensed plumbers. What makes us the best plumbers in Coquitlam is that we have the skills that homeowners, contractors, and property managers need to get the job done right the first time.

We know that homeowners and property managers can face surprising plumbing problems at the worst times possible. There is nothing worse than dealing with a plumbing or heating problem when you least expect it, and we have the resources to help you out. Our customers can rely on us to quickly and efficiently get things back in working order. Our quick service and our preparedness make us the best choice for plumbing in Port Coquitlam.

Get Emergency Plumbing & Heating Services

We know that emergencies can happen at any given moment in time, which is why we offer 24-hour emergency plumbing and heating services to all our customers. We want to be the first choice for plumbing in Port Moody, and that’s why we never compromise on our services. That is what makes Tri-City Plumbing & Heating so great for homeowners and property managers, and we aim to keep the trust of all our clients.

TESTIMONIALS

“I would highly recommend Tri-City Plumbing. The company staff have been friendly, very helpful and professional. I had to have my drainage tiles replaced around my home. They made the whole process less stressful with their help. They were always ready to listen to your concerns and try to help find a solution. When they say we are here to help. They mean it.”

Eva L.

“I hired Tri-City Plumbing to in stall my dishwasher a few days ago. They sent a young man who was extremely polite and knowledgeable. He did a great job and I wouldn’t hesitate to call them again or recommend them to friends.”

JoAnne B.

Our philosophy

We are committed to the design of high-quality, light weight, durable, versatile, and most innovative confined space rescue/retrieval systems and fall protection systems on the market.

For years, crews worked in confined spaces that did not have adequate systems to ensure a safe working environment.

Our core mission is to guarantee safety by providing solutions that will help industries minimize injuries and maintain a safe workplace environment for confined space crews.

At Xtirpa, our experienced, dedicated staff design and manufacture confined space equipment to create safer, confined space, work environments.

Dump Truck Tarps, Flatbed Tarps,
and Heavy Hauling Trailer Tarps by Cramaro Tarps

 

The tarp systems you want!

 

At Cramaro Tarps we offer the best dump truck tarps, flatbed tarps, truck and trailer tarps systems, and tarp accessories in the heavy hauling and trucking industry. We are the originators of the automated truck tarp system and continue to push the industry forward with innovative truck tarp systems to help truckers haul their loads safely and efficiently. We pride ourselves on your customer service and our ability to make a custom tarp system for any truck or trailer you have, or any type of load you are hauling. Our friendly sales staff can get you the tarp you need, when you need it. Our tarps are among the most durable tarps in the industry so that you have worry free usage for everyday heavy hauling use.

We also service any and all truck tarp systems at our 7 locations throughout North America, Delaware, Florida, Massachusetts, Nevada, Ohio, Texas, and Ontario Canada. We can service your tarp and get you back on the road whether it be a Cramaro Tarp, or any of our competitors like Aero Industries tarps, Donovan tarps, Mountain tarps, Pioneer tarps, Pulltarps, Roll-Rite tarps, Carolina tarps, or any other truck tarp systems you have.

We have tarps available for every truck and trailer or load you are hauling. Our truck tarp systems include:

WHAT WE DO:
Kear Fabrication Inc. is a leading custom fabrication company specializing in material handling equipment for the glass, window, and door manufacturing industries. We provide custom metal fabrication and pre-engineered production line solutions, including windows assembly line equipment, doors assembly line equipment, and glass assembly line equipment. Our commitment to customization, quality, and performance makes us a trusted fabrication company, helping clients optimize their production processes and improve market competitiveness.
	
WHY PEOPLE CHOOSE US:
At Kear Fabrication Inc., we pride ourselves on offering innovative, labor-saving custom fabrication solutions that enhance productivity, safety, and minimize material waste. Manufactured in Toronto, Ontario, our custom metal fabrication products are crafted with precision at our state-of-the-art facilities. By investing in our advanced material handling equipment, businesses ensure lasting success and competitive edge.
WHAT SEPARATES US FROM THE COMPETITION:
Competitive Pricing

Kear Fabrication Inc. offers cost-effective fabrication solutions that maintain the highest quality, ensuring an exceptional return on investment.

Custom Equipment

We excel in custom metal fabrication, tailoring our manufacturing services to meet the specific needs of each client, enhancing the functionality and efficiency of their production line solutions.

Exceptional Customer Service

Our dedication to superior customer support is unmatched, with a proactive and responsive team ready to exceed expectations.

Industry Expertise

Led by our founder, Peter Kear, our team has over two decades of experience in the custom fabrication industry, making us a reliable partner for comprehensive storage solutions and production line solutions.

Scalability

Whether you need small-scale setups or large-scale fabrication solutions, our flexible services can adapt and scale to meet the growing demands of your business.

One-Stop Service: BEND. PROTECT. SHIP.

Degree is the only company than can bend your pipe, protect it with our exclusive injection insulation technique, and ship it to your site ready for installation. Unlike insulating pipes with mitred sections of straight insulation, our injected insulation leaves no seams or gaps.

By having your pipes bent and insulated in our shop—instead of insulating bends on-site-you:

Can install your pipeline faster
Reduce the cost of installing your pipeline
Provide your pipes with the maximum protection possible
Extend the service life of your pipes and pipe bends

Whether we bend your pipes, insulate them or both, our dedicated hauling and hot shot service is available to deliver your pipes when and where you need them, so your project isn’t delayed and you can finish on-time and on-budget.

For structural and architectural bending, Degree provides a full range of steel bending capabilities required to transform a blueprint or design into a physical reality.

Certainly, focusing on support, warranty, parts, and training services can still provide a robust offering to your customers as a fountain parts manufacturer.

View Services
Training

Conducting training sessions or workshops for customers on the proper installation, operation, and maintenance of fountain parts. Providing instructional materials such as manuals, videos, or guides to supplement training efforts. Tailoring training programs to suit the needs and skill levels of different customer groups.

Service Details
Parts

Maintaining an inventory of replacement parts to address common wear and tear or damage. Offering spare parts for sale to customers for DIY repairs or replacements. Ensuring compatibility of replacement parts with existing fountain systems to facilitate easy maintenance.

Service Details
Warranty

Providing a warranty on your fountain parts that covers defects in materials and workmanship for a specified period. Clearly outlining warranty terms and conditions to customers to ensure transparency and understanding. Streamlined processes for warranty claims and resolutions to minimize inconvenience for customers.

Service Details
Support

Technical assistance via phone, email, or online chat to troubleshoot issues or provide guidance on installation and maintenance. Prompt responses to customer inquiries and concerns to ensure a positive experience. Assistance with product selection and recommendations based on customer needs.
