METAL FABRICATING INC.
We are 100% Canadian owned and operated business with over 55 years of metal manufacturing experience, including tooling design for various applications.
ABOUT US

M&K Machine Co. Ltd. founded in 1963 by John Krivec was a small to medium size company specializing in automotive stamping, tube bending, swaging, punching, and robotic welding for prototypes or production parts, including custom metal manufacturing. 

In late 2007, M&K Metal Fabricating Inc. was established to accept the new and ever changing economy and customer requirements. With this brought the next generation of owners and automation to the already stable processes. Areas of change are Engineering capabilities, Real-time Tracking/Costing Models, CNC turret punching, combined with CNC bending for sheet metal products. 

Our focus to details and customer expectations have been passed down with the goal to meet and exceed our customer's requirements. Quality and safety will never be compromised and the knowledge to respect our employees and listen to their suggestions and comments has been maintained. We offer competitive pricing, above standard quality, and the full respect of our customers and their requirements.

M&K PROJECTS INCLUDE PRODUCTS FOR
OUR CLIENTS

M&K Metal Fabricating Inc. will work in partnership with client's associates and vendor partners to provide superior quality, service and value. We will achieve this through our commitment and core values of never losing sight of client goals, never compromising personal or corporate ethics and maintaining a climate of respect and opportunities for our customers, associates, our employees, and our community. 

M&K Metal Fabricating Inc. is a fully integrated manufacturing facility offering full services in the following areas; 

Engineering

Sheet Metal Fabrication

Tube Fabrication
(Forming, Swaging, punching)
Project Management
(Assembly and Kitting)

Tool & Die - Stamping

Fixtures

We fully understand the changing economy and the time to market that is required. At M&K Metal Fabricating Inc. we put Service, Quality, and Cost as the top priority and our customer deserve these expectations.

Over the years, Bestway Casters & Wheels has come to mean excellence in our industry. Since our inception in 1975 our mission has remained the same: To deliver to our customers high quality products and superior service at competitive prices. Dedication to that goal is the foremost priority for every Bestway employee. Our products have earned a reputation for dependability and sustainability and are recognized for performance on the job. Our industry leading patent on the double ball kingboltless caster is a trusted and reliable product for the Industrial market.  From superior design features to high quality manufacturing standards to ample inventory maintenance, Bestway continually strives to be at the very top of our customer’s preferred vendor list.

Bestway Casters & Wheels has experienced significant growth by refusing to compromise on the quality, service and overall value that we provide to our customers. Our consistency as a supplier means our customers can count on us to always provide our usual top level performance.

As of February 1, 2017, Bestway Casters & Wheels has been acquired by the TENTE Casters, Inc family.  TENTE Casters, Inc. is a subsidiary of TENTE International GmbH, located in Cologne, Germany.  TENTE started operations in 1923 and has now developed into a worldwide company.  The TENTE Group gained a leading position in the world market with innovative ideas and high quality products.  TENTE's success is backed up by know-how that has developed over decades and which TENTE uses to solve problems.  Experienced designers and engineers create innovative products, which are produced with self-developed production techniques.  With the combination of Bestway's quality and tradition in Canada and TENTE's global brand reputation for quality and innovation, we look forward to growing both Bestway and TENTE in the North American caster market and continuing to bring efficient and reliable mobility solutions.  ​

​Thank you for your commitment and trust in allowing us to serve your current and future caster needs!  We look forward to meeting the challenge.









​Ben Mulling
Managing Director
TENTE Canada, Inc. & Affiliates

ISO 9001:2015
ISO 9001:2015

www.iso.org

ISO 9001:2015 certified organizations have completed the requirements for a quality management system that has the ability to consistently provide product that meets customer and applicable statutory and regulatory requirements, and aims to enhance customer satisfaction through the effective application of the system, including processes for continual improvement of the system and the assurance of conformity to customer and applicable statutory and regulatory requirements.

CERTIFICATE
Controlled Goods Program (CGP)

ssi-iss.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

The Controlled Goods Program is administered by Public Works and Government Services Canada and is Canada’s domestic industrial security program. It is designed to strengthen Canada’s defence trade controls. CGP Registration is mandatory for anyone in a position to examine, possess or transfer controlled goods in Canada.

CERTIFICATE
RoHS

RoHS, short for Restriction of Hazardous Substances, is specific to the European Union. The law revolves around the handling of hazardous materials, ranging from the manufacturing to the disposal of the material. While created inside of Europe for members of the European Union, other regions around the world have utilized and created offshoots of the RoHS. This includes nations throughout Asia (China, Japan and South Korea) and versions of it inside of North America as well.

OMX

Abbecan understands the requirements of ITB and Value Propositions and has been an active member of OMX, the online marketplace for ITB opportunities, since its inception.

Cima Group
Oltre 70 anni di eccellenza Made in Italy

Il Gruppo Cima è riconosciuto come punto di riferimento nel settore automotive per la produzione di molle ad alte prestazioni e di elementi di fissaggio. Leader mondiale nel settore di sistemi sospensione per il settore elettrodomestico. Lavorando secondo i più alti standard di qualità, il Gruppo Cima utilizza strutture complete di progettazione e test personalizzati per realizzare prodotti di alta precisione e qualità.

Scopri di più

Il Gruppo Cima significa

“Attitudine al cliente e vocazione al co-design, attraverso una visione globale che solo una realtà multinazionale può garantire. Il MADE BY ITALY come ispirazione.”

Sergio Bellazzi
Direttore Industriale C.I.M.A. Spa

6 stabilimenti, 3 continenti, 600 dipendenti nel mondo per un fatturato annuo di 70 Milioni di Euro.

3 uffici R&D e le più alte certificazioni qualitative.

La nostra missione è servire al meglio il cliente, instaurare rapporti di partnership con i nostri fornitori e sviluppare prodotti sempre più all’avanguardia.

Scopri di più

Sistema qualità

Tutti gli stabilimenti produttivi sono certificati ISO 9001 e IATF 16949:2016

Certificazioni

Prodotti per automotive

Con oltre 18.000 mq divisi su due stabilimenti, più di 250 macchine tra cui una pressa da 1500ton, una pressa Transfer e sistemi di saldatura automatici, i prodotti Automotive rappresentano il 40% del nostro fatturato.

Il reparto avvolgimento è il fiore all’occhiello dello stabilimento di Busnago, dal 2003 siamo mono fornitore per la produzione delle molle sospensione al Titanio per Ferrari.

Scopri di più

Prodotti per elettrodomestici

Il settore elettrodomestico rappresenta il 50% del nostro fatturato coinvolgendo 3 stabilimenti per un totale di 21.000mq circa e una capacità di più di 70.000.000 pz all’anno solo di ammortizzatori per lavatrici.

Dal 2018 abbiamo brevettato il nuovo ammortizzatore Rod Suspension diventando così il maggior fornitore per le principali case produttrici di lavatrici ad asse verticale.

Produciamo molle sospensione per cestello lavatrice con fili in SH patentato che vanno dal diametro 2 al 4. Ammortizzatori modello Free stroke, modello Junior e Rod Suspension da 60 a 140 N.

Metal Tech Industries: Your Industrial Machine Solution

Forestry

At Metal Tech Industries, we specialize in repairing and custom manufacturing equipment for the forestry industry. Whether it's coming up with custom solutions or minimizing downtime, our expert team will make sure your equipment runs smoothly and efficiently. 

We Manufacture and Repair:

​

Pumps (Nash, Bingham, Roots)

Screw Conveyors (Thune, Stream Splitter, Repulper/Refiner, Bark Press, etc)  

Chippers & Chutes

Roll/Suction Journals 

Blowers/Star Feeders (Holmes, ACO, Flakt)

Bearing Housings

Kamyr Digesters (Agitator Shafts, Spectacle Blinds, Sleeves)

Doctor Oscillators & Shower Assemblies

Hooper Screens

​​

 and much more...

Hydraulics & Pneumatics

Our hydraulics department is dedicated to providing top-quality hydraulic solutions for all your needs. With years of experience and a commitment to excellence, we offer a wide range of hydraulic and pneumatic products and services to meet your specific requirements. 

We Offer Sales, Rebuild Services, and Testing for:

​

Hose Assemblies (Manuli, Up to Ø2"/6000psi)

Pumps & Motors  

DCV/Mobile Valves 

Cylinders (Custom Manufacturing Available)

Rotary Manifolds/Collectors

Grapple and Machine Attachments

Seal Kits, Cartridge Valves, Filters

Fittings and Adaptors

​

 and much more...

Aggregate and Paving 

We also provide repairs and custom manufacturing services for the aggregate and paving industry. Our team has extensive experience in repairing and fabricating equipment to meet the demanding needs of this industry.

We Have Experience in Manufacturing and Rebuilding:

​

Crusher Components 

Front End Loader Buckets 

Screw Conveyors/Augers

Dryer/Mixing Drums

Chutes/Transitions

Drag Conveyors

Marine

At Metal Tech Industries we have extensive experience with Marine fabrication and repair. Whether for commercial vessels or personal pleasurecraft, our professional team will ensure the work is done right.

We Manufacture and Repair:

​

Prop Shafts 

Steering Pumps/Rams 

Valves/Hydraulic Motors

Winches

Rebar, Fabrication and Installation Experts
Southern Vancouver Island

Since 1965, AAA Rebar Inc. has been supplying and installing reinforcing steel in Victoria and the surrounding areas of Vancouver Island. We are fully stocked with all sizes of reinforcing steel, that we will cut and bend to accommodate your project needs, regardless of size. Big or small, we do it all.

Why Choose Us

Our steel supplier, Nucor Steel, based out of Seattle provides us with new billet mill certified steel. We aim to provide our customers with the best quality of reinforcing steel available.

Our Commitment

We are a family-oriented business with many years of experience in the trade. We service projects both large and small. We are committed to providing the highest quality steel from North American Markets.

At Reelco International Inc. we specialize in providing durable and reliable pipe reels and storage reels that have been produced, manufactured and customized by our in-house professionals. Our production techniques are catered to meet both customer expectations and environmental standards.

For hundreds of years, the technology behind storage reels and pipe reels has been evolving to meet companies' needs and provide an ideal aid to storing cables, ropes, hoses, cords, and more. Our reels are made from light but durable materials to ensure maximum efficiency. If you are looking for conduit reels, collapsible reels, or other reel technologies, you have come to the right place.

We ensure that all of our reels meet customer demands while remaining environmentally friendly. This personal commitment to our product guarantees reliable, high-quality performance and client satisfaction. For more information on storage reels, pipe reels and more, please contact us.

Associated Sheet Metal is a second generation family run business established in 1965. We specialize in custom fabrication and welding of light gauge stainless steel, aluminum and brass work components for the commercial construction, government, electrical, marine, and high tech industries.

CONTACT US
Commercial and Residential Metal Fabrication and Welding Services In Victoria and Surrounding Areas

Associated Sheet Metal is located in the Keating Industrial Park on the Saanich Peninsula halfway between Victoria and Sidney. Our company employs approximately 15 certified tradesmen and apprentices operating out of a 7000 square foot facility. Our aluminum welders are tested and certified to CSA 47.2 in accordance with the Canadian Welding Bureau.

ABOUT US
We believe in quality in all things, our product, our customer support, and our business. We source our steel from Canadian businesses and manufacture our parts locally in an effort to support Canadian business.
We stock many standard products and have the ability to hold certain levels of inventory for customers who submit reoccuring PO's to ensure they are always supplied. We also have the ability to produce custom parts.
WHAT DO WE OFFER
We take pride in offering a comprehensive line of products that can meet the diverse needs of our customers. From standard strut fittings to specialized components we provide a wide range of Canadian made high-quality products designed to enhance structural support across a wide range of applications. Our catalogue includes a variety of strut fittings, brackets, post bases, strut clamps, pipe clips, pipe straps, washers etc. that are built to meet or exceed industry standards. Moreover, we offer custom fabrication services, allowing us to create tailored products that are built to satisfy the unique needs of all our clients. Whether it is a specific size, thickness, hole size, spacing, material, or finish our team is dedicated to delivering what you need, how you need it.

HAPPY CANADA DAY FROM THE EDALICA TEAM!
We are Experts in Metal Fabrication

Started in 2003, Edalica Metal Services provides custom sheet metal fabrication solutions known for precision and quality of service at competitive pricing. Our more than 17 years of experience has enabled us to develop, evolve and innovate a wide range of metal products and components tailored for our customer’s needs.

All our extensive list of custom metal fabrication services are made-to-order for customers across Canada and the United States from our 22,000 sq ft shop located in the city of Brampton located in the heart of Ontario. 

Our team comprises customer-centric metal fabricators specializing in creating and manufacturing light to heavy gauge steel, aluminum, stainless steel, brass, and copper with all kinds of modern techniques according to various industrial requirements. With a comprehensive portfolio of metalworking solutions designed to handle a variety of metal thicknesses, we are capable of executing projects from beginning to end with full efficiency and precision. These in-house competencies, logistical and service support allows us to provide high-availability, dependency and redundancy for a continued supply chain.

OUR SERVICES

We offer a comprehensive list of sheet metal fabrication services tailored to your custom requirements with full commitment towards reliability, accuracy and quality.

All services
 Metal Shearing Service

Acquire the best in class straight cut sheets of any metal material or top-notch checkered plates with our top notch shears that have the capacity to cut metals of upto 10 feet long and 0.25 inches thick.

Get Details
 Metal Rolling Service

Get clean and accurate cylindrical, spherical or curved shapes from sheet metal materials with the help of high-performance three roll hydraulic plate benders that can roll up to 80 inches of length and 0.25 inches of thickness.

Get Details
 Welding Service

Benefit from our fast and efficient metal welding services for steel, aluminum, or stainless steel by our certified welders specialized in MIG, TIG and spot welding jobs. In addition to these, we provide value added services like grinding and polishing to ensure the quality we deliver is never compromised.

Get Details
 Metal Hole Punching

With the hydraulic cylinder press equipment to punch through sheet metal plates of up to 8 mm thickness, get high-volume perforated sheets, punched stair railings pressed into rectangular, square, diamond, spherical and other shapes at fast speeds.

Get Details
 Tube Rolling Service

Experience our reliable and high-tolerance tube rolling services powered by our advanced tube rollers with the capability to fulfil multiple capacities and tolerances. Our team ensures that you get reasonably pliant tubes after careful inspection and load testing.

Get Details
 Plasma Cutting service

Looking forward to getting a neat cutting of your materials? Leverage our high definition plasma cutting systems for clean, balanced and accurate sheet metal cuts for a variety of use-cases.

Get Details
 Laser Cutting Service

Procure fine metal sheets cut for simple to complex profiles with the ability to match your capacity requirements and custom design needs by taking advantage of our advanced laser machines operated by a highly skilled team of technicians.

Get Details
 Press Brakes Service

Enhance your experience with the precision and quality of our bent sheets and plate material cut at straight angles along with other press-brake produced components. Get metal bending orders delivered with modern press brakes having the capacity to bend a variety of sheet metal sizes and materials with weights ranging from 110 tons to 350 tons.

Get Details

Why Edalica?

At Edalica, we strive to provide you with a complete experience of quality and satisfaction through our services and products. Be it the custom fabrication of metals like steel, aluminum, stainless, brass, copper, or our above par in-house services of laser cutting, plasma cutting, shearing, punching, rolling, bending, forming, polishing or welding, you name it - we have it. Having completed a multitude of projects across industries and applications, Edalica is proud to say that we have the expertise and experience to pull off any metal-working project. From store fixtures, tanks, toolboxes, conveyor systems to stairs, railings, security bars, and much more, we have a dedicated team here to cater and deliver the services on time.

State-of-the-Art Equipment

Our manufacturing capabilities are supported by modern technology that facilitates a range of metal work from fancy artistic work and patterns to standard commercial artifacts - anything your business demands.

Quality Control

Custom metal fabrication requires high levels of quality control. At Edalica, we make sure that quality is not compromised and is taken into account at every step in the fabrication process. We deliver the promise of quality through strict adherence to the guidelines and procedures implemented by our Quality Control Managers and experienced fabricators.

Diverse Portfolio

From production runs to custom needs, whether it be Mild steel, Stainless or Aluminium - we have you covered. Our experience is demonstrated in all industrial and commercial industries for all kinds of bespoke metal fabrication from hand railings to heavy equipment and machinery.

Expert Fabricators

Our team comprises highly skilled professionals who come up with the most cost-effective, systematic, and secure approach to complete each new project coming our way. We continuously upgrade ourselves with the technological advances both in equipment and technique to offer complete consistency and dependability with your job.

WE SPECIALIZE IN CUSTOM FABRICATION PROJECTS MADE WITH STEEL, STAINLESS STEEL, ALUMINUM AND COPPER.

Alberta Custom Metal Fabricators Ltd. has fabricated an extensive range of custom projects throughout the province of Alberta since 1999.  We take pride in our crafted work for both commercial and private clients.

Why choose Ferguson?
Full line of products and services

Our in-house team can handle everything from designing high-performing building envelopes to engineering and drafting. And we don’t stop there. We fabricate our products in-house and then our expert team completes the installations.

Specialists in custom projects

We push the envelope with cutting-edge design. Our team has the passion and expertise to handle your most complex and customized projects. If you’re envisioning something brilliant and unique, we can help bring it to life.

Over four decades of excellence

Whether we’re working with you from the outset of a new project or addressing a problem with an existing build, we won’t walk away until the job is done right.That’s how we’ve built our reputation for almost fifty years.

Services

Industry-leading experience and expertise for all stages of your build.

Learn More

Design Assist & Engineering

Because we focus on unique and challenging projects, we can often work with your team right from the start. We help you take the vision you have in your head – or sketch on a napkin – and translate it to a high performing building envelope design that can truly be brought to life.

Procurement & Fabrication

For over 40 years, we’ve built productive, long term relationships with our suppliers so when we source the materials for your building, we can access what we need, when we need it and use it to fabricate high quality, innovative products.

Installation

We offer a large group of highly qualified journeyman glaziers with deep installation experience. We also have our unique rope access team, which regularly repels down buildings to execute the most challenging, hard-to-handle installations. Both teams help you save time and money during a project. And – both teams always operate within out stringent safety guidelines.

Testing

We test rigorously to ensure quality, particularly on unique and custom projects. Through either our in-house testing chamber or third party testing we ensure the products we produce will deliver high performance for a project, now and in the future.

Products

The finest products and materials for your building.

Learn More

Unitized Panel Systems

Our unitized panel systems drastically reduce install time and are customizable for project needs, including sizes, shapes, patterns and glass and aluminum finishes.

View Products

Curtain Wall Systems

Curtain wall is our traditional glazed building envelope system, stick built with aluminum framing and glazing. It is customizable for project needs and the glass, aluminum finish and sizing is all tailored to meet performance or aesthetic requirements.

View Products

Skylights

Our skylights are designed for drainage and deflection to eliminate leaks and stand the test of time. They’re highly customizable, including pressure glazed or structural silicone options.

View Products

Structural Glass Systems

In structural glass systems we engineer the glass to act as part of the structure, creating glass “beams” to support walkways, skylights, and walls. They’re ideal for building entrances and lobbies.

View Products

RS Panel Systems

Rain screens (RS) are a building envelope cladding that use aluminum or glass as the exposed surface. They  have effectively endless varieties of colours and shapes to meet any project needs.

View Products

Advanced & Custom Technologies

The custom technologies and integrations we provide are typically the firsts-of-their-kind or new to the market, and push the envelope for design & function.

View Products

Other Systems

Apart from custom building envelope systems we also offer basic storefront glass & framing, aluminum & glass doors, revolving doors, smoke baffle, vents & mirrors.

View Products

All Products

We fabricate industry-leading products for your building with a focus on highly complex, challenging and aesthetically innovative projects.

Powder Coating









MPL, a powder coating facility, offers a wide range of services tailored to meet the diverse needs of its customers. With a comprehensive approach to surface preparation, MPL utilizes a 5-stage pre-treatment system to ensure optimal adhesion and long-lasting results. One of MPL's key specializations is in providing exceptional powder coating services for aluminum parts. The facility has extensive expertise in working with aluminum substrates and understands the specific requirements and challenges associated with coating this material.









		
Consulting Services

for Small & Big  jobs

 


Ensuring we provide you with the services that you require.




Contact us for your needs, including:







Quick quote
Tailored solutions
Fast turnaround time




Lets not wait to get started.











In addition to our dedication to quality, small part volume, and environmental care, MPL, our highly efficient small powder coating company, also employs a professional green pre-treatment process. This innovative pre-treatment method ensures optimal surface preparation while minimizing the environmental impact associated with traditional pre-treatment techniques.
At MPL, we recognize that proper pre-treatment is crucial for achieving long-lasting, high-quality powder coating finishes. However, traditional pre-treatment methods often involve the use of harsh chemicals and generate harmful byproducts. To address these concerns, we have invested in advanced green pre-treatment technology that offers both superior results and eco-friendliness.
Our professional green pre-treatment process involves the use of environmentally friendly solutions that are non-toxic and biodegradable. These solutions effectively clean and prepare the surfaces of the parts, ensuring excellent adhesion and durability of the powder coating. By eliminating or reducing the use of hazardous chemicals, we minimize the risk to our workers, the surrounding environment, and the wider community.
Furthermore, the green pre-treatment process implemented by MPL is designed to optimize resource utilization. We carefully manage water consumption, ensuring efficient use and recycling wherever possible. By reducing water waste, we contribute to water conservation efforts and promote responsible resource management.
The professional green pre-treatment process not only meets strict environmental regulations but also delivers outstanding results. The surfaces of the parts are thoroughly cleaned and treated, creating an ideal foundation for the powder coating to adhere to. This results in finishes that exhibit superior durability, corrosion resistance, and color vibrancy.
By incorporating professional green pre-treatment into our workflow, MPL exemplifies our commitment to sustainability and responsible practices. Clients can have peace of mind knowing that their parts undergo a safe and environmentally conscious pre-treatment process, ensuring both exceptional powder coating results and a reduced ecological impact.
In summary, MPL, our highly efficient small powder coating company, places great importance on the professional green pre-treatment process. By utilizing environmentally friendly solutions and optimizing resource utilization, we achieve excellent surface preparation while minimizing our environmental footprint. Our commitment to sustainable practices ensures that our clients receive exceptional powder coating results while contributing to a greener and more environmentally conscious industry.

Quality and Competitiveness Through Vertical Integration

Fortune Valve (and the Fortune Group of Companies) has been a global producer of quality valves for more than 30+ years. Fortune Valve is a family owned company head quartered in Taipei City, Taiwan. We own two manufacturing facilities in Taiwan and three in Mainland China. Fortune is a vertically integrated company and this is the singular reason for our price competitive product offering.

Quality is the life of an enterprise. Since its founding in 1981, Fortune has practiced this philosophy and has never compromised to anything other than the highest quality standards. We produce our products with great pride and we stand behind our name. Our brand is well respected around the world in a variety of industries. The Fortune Valve team is dedicated to bringing quality and value to our customers. We provide superior product design and are committed to excellence in manufacturing.

Special Announcements


Casting and Forging Capabilities

Fortune has large casting and forging capacity and welcomes the opportunity to produce fine quality casting and forging components for OEM customers worldwide.

Trunnion Hybrid Capability

Acumen Machine Ltd. is a full-service, certified machine shop that has been offering CNC machining, fabrication, industrial and welding services in Kamloops since 1992. No matter whether you’re a large corporation or a small farmer, we can cater to all your specific requirements with quality workmanship. From personal and hobby-related needs to the commercial and industrial ones, we can serve all.

MÉTODEX MÉTAUX OUVRÉS INC.

 

Une entreprise de confiance qui se différencie par la qualité de sa gestion, ses réalisations et ses prix concurrentiels.

 

 

 

Finaliste au Panthéon de la Performance 2016 dans la catégorie Entreprise manufacturière et/ou de transformation et de distribution

 

  

 

 

	

     Fondée en 1998 par Sébastien Turcotte et Christian Bécotte, Métodex se spécialise dans la fabrication de métaux ouvrés tels que des escaliers, des supports, des rampes et des gardes-corps fabriqués en acier, en aluminium ou en acier inoxydable. L'entreprise oeuvre dans les secteurs commercial, industriel et institutionnel.

    Depuis 3 ans, Métodex connaît une croissance remarquable grâce à son expertise dans son domaine. L'entreprise se démarque par sa capacité à livrer à la perfection des projets dont la complexité donne du fil à retordre à ses concurrents. Bien au fait de cet avantage concurrentiel et de la compétitivité de leurs prix, plusieurs entrepreneurs généraux ont une grande confiance en Métodex.

 

 

   

    Au cours des derniers mois, Métodex a participé à plusieurs projets se démarquant tant par leur envergure que leur degré de difficulté. Parmi ceux-ci, on retrouve la construction d'une usine de fabrication de microprocesseurs pour IBM à Bromont, la construction de la Bibliothèque Monique-Corriveau à Québec et la construction du nouveau centre de détention de Sorel-Tracy.

    Dans le cadre de ces projets, Métodex a dû installer des escaliers, des supports de murs et mécaniques dans des endroits à environnement très contrôlé. Elle a dû livrer la marchandise tout en respectant des normes de propreté extrême. L'aménagement de la bibliothèque a, par ailleurs, nécessité l'installation de métaux ouvrés apparents, dont le fameux escalier en colimaçon qui fait la fierté de l'endroit. Forte de ses réalisations, l'entreprise s'inscrit en tant qu'ambassadrice de la région de l'Érable.

  

 

 

 

 

    Métodex n'a jamais eu peur de relever des défis et de s'adapter à son marché. La compagnie a évolué à travers les demandes de ses partenaires, développant de nouveaux services et de nouvelles façons de faire afin de trouver ce créneau particulier qui le distingue.

   L'entreprise se démarque également par sa capacité à s'ajuster en cours de projet. Il est fréquent que l'installation des métaux ouvrés comporte des défis que l'on n'avait pas discernés au départ. Métodex possède une expertise qui lui permettra de livrer les métaux malgré le fait que les plans aient changé en cours de route.

    Bref, c'est en bâtissant des partenariats solides avec des entrepreneurs qui ont une grande confiance en Métodex que l'entreprise a été en mesure de croître et de faire sa marque dans le domaine de la fabrication et à l'installation d'escaliers, supports et gardes-corps sur mesure.

    

   

	

 

 

    C'est en excellant dans la réalisation de projets complexes, là où ses concurrents ne réussissent pas à être compétitifs, que Métodex s'est développée et s'est démarquée de ses concurrents à travers les années. L'entreprise plessisvilloise s'est choisi un créneau de niche en réussissant à livrer des projets complexes, sans encombre et dans les délais prescrits. Cette particularité lui a permis de se faire des alliés parmi de nombreux entrepreneurs généraux. La qualité de ses escaliers et autres métaux ouvrés conçus sur mesures ont également fait sa renommée. Métodex excelle dans la planification de ses interventions sur les chantiers. Sachant qu'elle devra agir rapidement dans une fenêtre de temps précise lors de chantiers d'envergure, elle doit s'assurer de toujours intervenir en moment opportun afin d'éviter de retarder le chantier en cours. Cette synchronisation parfaite et son exécution sans faille font d'elle un sous-traitant modèle.

    Cette façon de faire permet à Métodex d'offrir un service à la clientèle de qualité supérieure. À travers les années, le référencement a fait son oeuvre auprès des divers entrepreneurs généraux et a permis à l'entreprise de maintenir une croissance soutenue.

 

 

Notre mission

 

Offrir à nos clients des produits de haute précision avec une finition de grande qualité tout en respectant leurs échéanciers et en leur recommandant les meilleures solutions. Être constamment à l'écoute de nos partenaires, afin d'atteindre une efficacité et une productivité optimale, est une priorité pour nous. 

 

 

Nos Valeurs

 

Honnêteté, créativité, transparence et respect.

 

 

Notre implication sociale

 

    Métodex a jeté son dévolu sur Centraide, car il vient en aide à 8 organismes communautaires de la région de l'Érable, dont : l'Organisme de récupération anti-pauvreté de l'Érable (ORAPÉ), les maisons des jeunes de Plessisville, Princeville et de Saint-Ferdinand, ainsi que la Maison des familles de l'Érable. Depuis quatre ans l'entreprise a aussi effectué des dons à la Société canadienne du cancer. Autrement, Métodex achète régulièrement plusieurs billets pour des soupers-bénéfices organisés par des organismes comme la Fondation Jolyane Desjardins et l'Association de chasse et pêche de Plessisville. L'entreprise vient aussi en aide aux équipes sportives de la région.

NOTRE HISTOIRE

C’est en 1982 que Pierre Munoz, outilleur et dessinateur de formation, reprit un atelier artisanal de réparation industrielle.

En 1984, la compagnie s’installa à Montréal Nord jusqu’en 1989.

Aujourd’hui, elle est implantée à Ville Saint Laurent à la croisée des chemins, Autoroute 13 et Autoroute 40, située dans le parc industriel le plus avancé technologiquement du Québec.

Dotée d’une technologie d’usinage enviée de tous ses compétiteurs, le personnel reste la force majeure de cette compagnie qui a su évoluer avec toutes les nouvelles technologies.

Les services et la gamme de pièces d’usinage sont très variés : conception, accélération de procédé sur les lignes de production, dépannage, exportation internationale, usinage de grande série, usinage de pièces unitaires, usinage de moules 3D, usinage d’outils de découpe et d’emboutissage fabrication et reproduction de cames multiaxes et de pièces de tous genres, modification et amélioration de pièces existantes.

EFL Fabrication Shop

ELLESMERE FABRICATORS LTD is an Ontario based Fabricator, which was founded in 1986 by Paul J Kamphuys who had 25 years of prior experience in the custom steel fabricating industry. ELLESMERE started out in a modest 3,000 sq ft shop located on Ellesmere Road in Scarborough. Production increased due to high quality of work and many satisfied customers, thus outgrowing the small shop. In 1994 Ellesmere moved to a 10,000 sq ft building, with an extensive yard for storage.

ELLESMERE is proud to have served a variety of business sectors including

Automotive
Hospitals
Schools
Government
Sewage and Water Treatment Plants

ELLESMERE is a certified CWB fabricating shop and is committed to satisfying all of their customer's needs. ELLESMERE has the ability, experience and knowledge to manufacture many different items, from simple to complex projects.

At Ellesmere Fabricators quality is our moto!

Specializing in custom machinery weldment fabrication, structural steel, guarding, platform stairs/handrails, welding, cutting and punching, TASK Custom Metal Fabricators draws upon over 30 years of experience to deliver a quality final product. Dedicated customer service ensures that every project progresses seamlessly from the initial specifications to the completed piece. Located in Elmira, Ontario our new 22,000 square foot facility houses 4 bridge cranes (5 ton), 25' under hook clearance for large weldments, 6 jib cranes (2 ton), 2x 16'x16' and 2x 14'x14' drive-in doors, a dock level door as well as an extensive array of custom metal fabrication equipment.

St. Catharines Pattern Limited
If you are looking to get models and prototypes made using high quality equipment, then visit St. Catharines Pattern Limited. With a staff of 12 (including office staff) we are always ready to meet or exceed your expectations. Our production team is composed of tradesmen, all of which are either patternmakers, machinists or apprentices.

We are housed in a modern 8,000 square foot building, close to major highways. We have plenty of manufacturing equipment for you to choose from to get anything from a single prototype to a large volume of models.

We have proudly maintained an ongoing program of apprentice training during the past 30 plus years that we have been in business.

4 CAD/CAM Workstations (SURFCAM/SolidWorks)
7 CNC Mills

HOSE AND FITTINGS

Stirling Hydraulic is one of the most trusted suppliers of hose products for the transfer of high-pressure fluids. Our name says it all. Stirling Hydraulic is a complete source for all types of flexible hose. For over twenty five years, Stirling Hydraulic has been a leading supplier of hose and fittings.

READ MORE
HYDRAULIC CYLINDER SERVICE

We are capable of servicing almost any size cylinder with exceptional turnaround time. We accomplish this by investing in the most experienced people and by using the most advanced equipment available in the industry. As a result, we are capable of rebuilding to OEM specs on all cylinders with testing capabilities of 7200psi.

READ MORE
CUSTOM TUBE & PIPE BENDING

Stirling Hydraulic is equipped with digital tube benders. In short, we can duplicate almost any hydraulic line from any manufacturer.

Hydraulic auxiliary lines can be bent in-house to fit on your excavator seamlessly. We can also come to your site and take measurements for replacements.

READ MORE
ABOUT STIRLING HYDRAULIC

For over 50 years our business has focused on Hose, Fittings, and Custom Tube Bending. In 2018 we expanded our service to Hydraulic Cylinders. We are capable of servicing any size cylinder with exceptional turnaround time. We accomplish this by investing in the most experienced people and by using the most advanced equipment available in the industry. As a result we are capable of rebuilding to OEM specs on all cylinders.

We have 4 Cylinder Benches; and our largest is capable of 125,000 ft/lb torque. Test capability to 7200psi and comes with laser measuring and data logging. At Stirling Hydraulic we have our own machine shop and cleaning tank that accepts the largest cylinders made.

PRECISION IS OUR STANDARD

Schmidt Laserworks has been providing world-class metal fabrication services since 1975. We are a family-owned business that puts strong customer relationships at the center of our operations. Our specialized team of technicians is capable of working with a variety of materials to cater to a multitude of industries. We are committed to staying on top of the latest technologies, including investing in state-of-the-art equipment to provide our clients with superior laser cutting and metal fabrication. Our ability to serve our customers' growing needs and maintain strong relationships with them has enabled us to become one of the leading metal fabrication companies in North America.

At Schmidt Laserworks, we build long-lasting client relationships by consistently delivering outstanding quality products.

THE
RMW INDUSTRIES ADVANTAGE
COIL SPRINGS
A PASSION FOR QUALITY

Our hot and cold wound springs are made from the highest quality spring materials available. Our springs are created using state-of-the-art and time tested efficient manufacturing processes that live up to our high standards. We have testing capabilities and a quality control program in place to ensure your springs meet your required specifications. The finished products can be either dipped in enamel paint, plain finished, or powder coated to the colour you want.

TEAM OF TROUBLESHOOTERS AND
PROBLEM SOLVERS

With over 65 years of experience in designing and manufacturing coil springs, our spring design engineers are highly creative and skilled. Our design and operations teams have a history of manufacturing springs for a variety of industries, including the industrial and the automotive suspension markets. Our teams are fully equipped to exceed your high standards.

PRICING THAT WORKS WITH YOUR BUDGET

We optimize our spring designs and implement an efficient and cost effective manufacturing process in order to provide you with the most competitive pricing, without sacrificing quality. At RMW Industries, we work closely with you to develop and build a plan that will fit your budget.

INNOVATIVE MANUFACTURING PROCESSES

At RMW Industries, we only wind our springs, both hot and cold, using the highest quality material available. All of our hot wound springs are also quenched and tempered at the optimum temperature for strength and endurance. We use a continuous oven for stress relieving cold wound springs and tempering hot wound springs. Shot peening and set removal are used to increase fatigue life, and reduce sagging over time. Before any of our springs are shipped, they are run through a series of rigorous, state-of-the-art testing capabilities to ensure that the springs conform to the required load and rate specifications. All finished spring products can be powder coated, dipped in enamel paint, or shipped with plain finish, as required.

Our team is highly skilled and knowledgeable in designing and manufacturing custom springs that are perfectly suited for you and your industry needs. At RMW Industries, we understand that each industry faces its own challenges. That is why our team always takes the time to create custom springs that will be more than capable of handling the unique application you need them for.

OUR REPUTATION

Trimet Building Products Inc has established a reputation for reliable metal products and timely service for Alberta’s new home, commercial development and modular trailer industries. As a custom fabricator of metal roofing and siding products, we are known for speed, service and accuracy. We produce light gauge metal products for the residential and commercial construction markets, and the modular trailer industry.

Our customers include roofing and siding installation companies, building supply yards, modular trailer manufacturers and window & door manufacturers.

We welcome the opportunity to consult with you or your clients, architects or design departments to improve upon existing product offerings and/or design new ones to your specifications.

With over 40 years in the suspension industry, Pacific Spring & Axle is one of the most experienced specialists in Greater Vancouver Area. We specialize in spring & trailer axle parts distribution. We provide specialty springs for various industries, like leaf, coil, torsion and extension.

Pacific Spring and Axle is a provider of Hellwig, Timbren, and Air Lift brand overload systems. For more information, visit our Springs and Suspension page.

Pacific Spring & Axle Ltd. commenced its family owned business in 1974, serving the Greater Vancouver area. We continue to expand product lines to provide customers with a full range of automotive & trailer products. Our modern Parts Department is able to supply your many needs with our direct access to major manufacturers. Our own warehousing allows us to carry a large stock at all times for immediate delivery to you.

BUILD AMERICA, BUY AMERICA

Looking to upgrade your water distribution system? Ready to replace those old lead pipes? Now’s the time to plan your federally funded water infrastructure projects for the betterment of your community. Mueller makes it easy. Our team stands ready to assist you throughout the process — from quote to delivery. We’ll identify and document products within our portfolio that qualify for your infrastructure project.

BUILDING AMERICA’S WATER INFRASTRUCTURE TOGETHER

WHAT'S COVERED UNDER BABA?

The Build America, Buy America Act offers federal funding for projects built with a preference for domestic products. Items can only qualify for one of the following categories.



IRON & STEEL PRODUCTS

Under BABA, this refers to articles, materials or supplies that consist wholly or predominantly of iron and/or steel.



MANUFACTURED PRODUCTS

Under BABA, this category does not include iron or steel products, construction materials or Section 70917(c) materials. It does include other articles, materials or supplies that have been (i) processed into a specific form and shape, or (ii) combined with other articles, materials or supplies to create a product with different properties than the individual articles, materials or supplies.



CONSTRUCTION MATERIALS

Under BABA, this refers to non-ferrous metals, plastic and polymer-based products, glass, fiber optic cable, optical fiber, lumber, engineered wood and drywall. Minor additions of articles, materials, supplies or binding agents do not change categorization of the construction materials.

WELCOME TO CPC FABRICATING INC.

Your Complete Fabricating and Machining Solution

CPC FABRICATING is a top-notch machine shop that offers an extensive range of capabilities to its customers. With the backing of its parent company, Canada Tool Company, it is equipped with cutting-edge technology and machinery to meet the evolving demands of the industry. The services offered by CPC FABRICATING include laser cutting, CNC punching, CNC machining, toolmaking, stamping, brake press forming, panel bending, stake locking, stud and nut welding and inserting, spot welding specializing in aluminum, MIG welding, and TIG welding.

The expertise and experience of CPC FABRICATING’s team make them capable of providing high-quality, custom-made solutions to meet the unique requirements of each customer. The company is committed to providing exceptional customer service, which includes prompt delivery, flexibility in accommodating urgent orders, and an open communication channel with customers throughout the process. CPC FABRICATING’s mission is to ensure that its clients receive the best possible experience by consistently delivering quality products that meet or exceed their expectations. Overall, CPC FABRICATING’s reputation for excellence and reliability has made it a go-to machine shop for many customers.

Shearing & Bending

Spring Specialty Ltd’s Truck and Trailer Services for Berry Mills

Since 1976, Spring Specialty Ltd has provided Berry Mills, Moncton and the Maritimes with quality service and repairs for heavy trucks, transports and trailers. We offer specialized solutions for diesel exhaust, suspension, wheel alignment and balancing systems.




Suspension Systems

For your truck and trailer, we offer repairs and replacements on springs, beam bushings, kingpins, shocks and air bag suspension systems. For kingpins, we can even bore and sleeve the axle while it’s still on your truck!




Spring Specialty isn’t just a spring and suspension shop, learn more about our diesel exhaust and wheel alignment services!




As a professional service and repair facility, you can count on our services to be completed correctly and on time. Through our experience and efficiency, we are able to offer competitive rates for our specialized service, repair and replacement work.




Quality Parts

Spring Specialty Ltd is proud to carry the quality parts brands of Hendrickson, SAF Holland (formerly Neway), Nelson, and Grand Rock.




Locate Our Shop in Berry Mills

Twenty minutes northwest of Moncton, our shop in Berry Mills is situated north of Berry Mills Rd (Route 128), near the intersection of Christie Road and Old Route 128. For more information, check out our contact page for a complete list of contact options.

Combustion Air Dampers vs Combustion Air Pots

Check out our Brochure on our Hoyme Furnace Fan Generated Air Exchanger(HRV)

Check out our Brochure on How to Get the Most from your Mid and Hi Efficient Heating Systems!

The COMBUSTION FRESH AIR DAMPER, Series ‘ HOM ‘ is motorized and used for the control of fresh air for combustion. It is patented and Code Certified to be field installed and interlocked with a thermostat of a furnace or aqua-stat of a boiler, using either oil, propane or natural gas. The damper is placed at the terminating end of an Insulated Fresh Air Inlet Duct beside the furnace. When the thermostat asks for heat, this Motorized Damper opens to allow fresh air for complete combustion. When the furnace stops, the damper closes to prevent the entry of unnecessary cold air. This results in added comfort with a definite saving of fuel.

Another HMI HOYME Damper is the Series ‘ HAC ‘ AIR CONTROL DAMPER,  These Dampers are placed in-line and are used for FRESH AIR VENTILATION and ZONE AIR CONTROL. When used for ventilation, any Exhaust Fan turned on will open the Fresh Air Damper and thus fresh air is brought in to replace air being exhausted.

 

HMI HOYME also manufactures a CSA Certified Flue Damper called a ‘ HAC-F ‘ Flue Damper – These dampers are placed in-line and are designed to save energy by stopping the escape of warm air up the chimney vent while the heating appliance is not firing and is interlocked to be open during firing. This damper is spring loaded and fails-safe-open in the event of power failure.

Yes! HMI HOYME Manufacturing also makes Rectangular Dampers, known as the HCR and HSI series which are available as a single blade rectangular and also an easy install slip-in type. These are available by customer request and are made with the same care and attention as our famous round dampers. The standard dampers are 24 volt, Power Open or Power Close with optional End Switches. They can be outfitted with our patented drive motors or various types of larger Belimo motors with various shaft sizes. Contact factory for ordering information.


Check out our Interface Relay Adaptors page. These adaptors have a number of uses related to controlling our Fresh Air Dampers and interlocking with but not interfering with your existing HVAC system. They are also useful for zone air control, with a thermostat in each room it will open the damper for proper air flow to that room.


Click on Furnace Fan Generated Air Exchangers for another innovative product developed by HMI HOYME Manufacturing Inc. that saves you money and adds comfort to your home.

Check out our Latest Brochure on Furnace fan Generated Hi-Efficiency Counter-Flow Air to Air Heat Exchanger!

HMI HOYME dampers are Canadian-made helping save you money and live in comfort. Click to Canadian Contractors or Wholesalers near you.

HMI HOYME dampers and accessories are internationally certified by the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) to include both United States and Canada.

HMI HOYME Manufacturing Inc. is a proud Member of the Sheet Metal Contractors Association of Alberta


HMI HOYME Manufacturing Inc. is an Associate Member of the Electrical Contractors Association of Alberta

Our Company

Since 1990, Mariner Forge Enterprises Ltd has served the communities of the Halifax Regional Municipality by providing a wide range of services, including water jet cutting, plasma profile cutting, custom metal fabrication, machining services, welding and more.

We are an owner operated business, and we have the capabilities to tackle jobs ranging from the very small to very large. Our experienced technicians have the skills it takes to tackle even the most challenging jobs that require the utmost precision. No matter how complicated, we'll get the job done right, all at competitive rates.

We're able to sustain excellent shop fabrication production levels as well as great customer satisfaction. There is no limit to what our team of skilled Canadian tradesmen can accomplish for your project, and our completed work speaks for itself. Whether you're coming to us as an individual or on behalf of a large company, we'll take on your project with the same level of dedication. Contact us today to get started.

Metal Fabrication & Welding Experts

Regardless of the scale or complexity of the work you need done, the Mariner Forge team can step in at any stage, from planning and design, to metal fabrication and installation. Choosing us, you can always tap into our creative mindset, and you can use our knowledge and experience having been a miscellaneous steel fabrication company in the HRM for over 30 years. We can certainly tackle any commercial or residential projects that come our way.

As a company, we’ve developed many creative ways to get our jobs done with accuracy and precision and have developed many processes for bending, cutting, shearing, welding, and fitting up very unique architectural and structural jobs.

Located in Trail, BC, XL Quality Industrial Services Inc. has positioned itself to service engineering and industrial contractors who need specialized fabrication, welding, machining and corrosion prevention services.

XL: The first letters of our name derives from eXceptionaL, as this is the standard to which we strive throughout all facets of our organization.

QUALITY: This speaks directly to our ability to perform at the highest level in our trades. Our Quality Assurance and Quality Control conforms to the most stringent industry standards. We are also CWB certified to 47.1 & 47.2 standards. We work to NACE and SSPC standards.. XLQ invites third party inspections at all phases of projects.

INDUSTRIAL: Our work encompasses a very wide spectrum of industry. Our abilities included but are not limited to the following. Precision Machining, Welding, Fabricating, Sand Blasting and Industrial Coating Applications. All performed to the highest industry standard.

SERVICES: We are a service company through and through. With a knowledgeable staff having cumulative 151 Journeyman years of experience, we can provide service to large infrastructure projects as well as emergency jobs when hours matter.

DISCOVER THE DIFFERENCE

Foundry Tooling

We have been a ‘full service’ pattern shop since 1916, and we continue to offer a wide range of wood, metal, and plastic patterns and coreboxes to our customers.  We have extensive experience in building tooling for a variety of foundry requirements and processes, and have excellent working relationships with over a 40 active foundries in Canada, the United States and Europe.

Learn More
3D Printing / Prototyping

We have a range of 3D printing and prototyping options to suit your needs.  We can print in PLA or ABS, as well as some other specialty materials.  We can also CNC cut your prototypes to meet tight deadlines.  Our prototyping services are complimented by our laser scanning and engineering design services.

Learn More
Casting Design

We have in house casting designers that can help as much or as little as you need.  We can work up new designs from scratch or reproduce designs from existing parts.  We can produce full featured models and drawings in a range of formats.  Our involvement as patternmakers results in significant cost savings, quality improvement and reduced learning curves for our customers.

Learn More
North American Made

At Dominion we believe in manufacturing in North America... not for national pride, but because it makes sense.  Our customers want products that are done right and are delivered on time.

The only way we can ensure quality product without costly delays is to work closely with our foundry partners and manufacture in-house using the latest technologies.

Anyone who has purchased significant volumes overseas can tell you how frustrating timing can be.  It can take many months to see your first articles and many more if any issues are found.  Not at Dominion.

Learn More...

Speak with one of our salespeople and find out what Dominion can do for you.

April 2017

Accelerating commercialization
from science
We are the interface bridging TRIUMF—Canada's national particle accelerator laboratory—with the business world.  We link cutting-edge science and technology to tangible business opportunities. 

 

"The Canadian Medical Isotope Ecosystem Development Fund has been created with the goal of identifying, funding and ultimately commercializing promising early-stage medical isotope technologies and radiopharmaceutical research from across the country. Our primary objective is to accelerate the development of great Canadian technology for the benefit of Canadian patients and the medical community." - Owen Roberts, CEO of the Centre for Probe Development and Commercialization, Co-Lead for the CMIE 

 

 

TRIUMF provides us with a unique ability to test our space borne systems, and present insights into how our electronics will behave in harsh radiation environment of space over several years. Our group has been coming to TRIUMF PIF for over two decades and on many occasions the results were quite surprising. Testing at TRIUMF allowed us to save time, money, and a significantly reduced risk of failure of our products for our customers. Last but not least, the TRIUMF team played a vital role in the success of our test campaigns. They did so by accommodating us in various ways to ensure we could complete our tests in a more efficient manner than originally scheduled." - Valeri Kirischian, Ph.D., P.Eng, FPGA/Embedded Systems Engineer,MDA Robotics and Automation

AEROCOM SPECIALTY FITTINGS, ADAPTERS AND CUSTOM HOSE ASSEMBLIES
Stainless steel fluid connector and flexible piping solutions for challenging pressure-related applications
Stainless steel fluid connector and flexible piping solutions for challenging pressure-related applications

Specializing in SS316 products, Aerocom’s knowledgeable, engineer supported team provides solutions for the most demanding industry applications. Hydraulic adapters, aerospace fittings and custom hose assemblies all are stocked, assembled and tested to meet Aerocom’s extensive quality assurance programs. Speed of quote and quick product turnaround has built our reputation as leaders in specialty fluid connectors that exceed our customers’ expectations. Imagine having custom fittings, designed and machined in a matter of a few days! We look forward to hearing from you.

ABOUT US
PRODUCTS

Aerocom offers engineered solutions that address specific fluid connector and flexible piping challenges. Featuring a wide array of stainless steel hose couplings, tube and pipe adapters, PTFE and metallic hose assemblies, all our products undergo quality checks prior to shipping. For aerospace and military clients, we provide fluid connectors and hoses that comply with all industry standards through our AS9120 quality system. In addition, specialty GSE (Ground Support Equipment) interconnect adapters and fittings are produced under our ISO9001 quality program.

Aerocom can build just about any custom fittings and flex connectors, so if you don’t see what you are looking for, please contact us so we can find a solution to your requirements.

Hose fittings
Precision engineered products for the most challenging industry conditions

Aerocom’s SS316 crimp style hose couplings are precision manufactured for many different types of hose applications and SAE standards. They are precisely machined to deliver unparalleled quality and fast customized solutions. Our 710 series are weld-on couplings for metal hose assemblies, available in a variety of threads and configurations. We also offer reusable and one-piece crimp fittings in stainless steel for push lock, hydraulic braided and industrial hose applications.

If needed, Aerocom can assemble hoses for you with our specialty ss couplings. We can even provide pressure test reports and custom graphs validating our final product along with certificates of conformance for each of your orders.

SEE ALL HOSE FITTINGS
Adapters
High-quality stainless steel tube and NPT adapters for all applications

Aerocom designs and manufactures stainless steel adapters that address specific connector challenges found in pressure-related flexible and fixed piping applications. Our adapters meet or exceed JIC, SAE and international specifications. We offer a large inventory of JIC, NPT, ORB, BSPP and metric adapters (in straight, bulkhead, swivel, tee, elbow, caps and plug) in sizes from 1/8” to 2”.

Standard production and inventory are in stainless steel 316L material. Our durable adapters provide long-lasting performance, even in highly corrosive environments. If you can’t find the combination that you are looking for, please contact us for special adapters manufactured to your exact specifications.

SEE ALL ADAPTERS
Aerospace fittings
Aerospace adapters and GSE test fittings

Aerocom offers fluid connectors and adapters for the aerospace industry, both military and commercial, that meet specific fluid connector challenges. Contact us for aerospace fittings standards: AN, AS, NAS, MS which conform to AS4841, AS4842, AS4842/1, AS4843/1, AS4843/2, AS4875, AS4875/1, AS4875/2 (as applicable). All documentation and certificates are controlled as per our AS9120 Quality System.

Aerocom conversion adapters conform to all aerospace standards and can connect to commercial SAE J514 threads. What’s more, various custom fittings with aerospace threads can connect to common JIC/NPT threads for easy interface to pressure hoses for testing and maintenance at the ground support level. As per our ISO 9001 quality system procedures, conversion adapters (or GSE adapters) are precision manufactured from solid SS316L material respecting aerospace thread specifications to better protect existing airframe flight parts.

SEE ALL AEROSPACE FITTINGS
PTFE hose products
Hose, fittings and custom-manufactured hose assemblies designed for corrosive applications

Aerocom’s PTFE hose solutions address specific flexible piping challenges such as vibration, thermal-, or pressure-related applications involving the transfer of liquids or gases. We stock and supply PTFE hoses for all your applications: conductive and non-conductive, standard medium pressure, ultra high-pressure, convoluted, smooth-bore, rubber-covered, and large bore hoses of PTFE with their associated fittings, adapters and accessories.

As a value added company, Aerocom can custom manufacture PTFE hose assemblies to your specified hose dimensions and end fitting requirements. Prior to final inspection, hydrostatic tests provide you with reassurance that you are provided  hose assemblies that meet your technical criteria.

SEE ALL PTFE HOSE PRODUCTS
Metal hose products
Custom-manufactured corrugated hose assemblies

Aerocom fabricates medium and high-pressure corrugated flexible metal hose assemblies with their associated fittings, adapters and accessories. We stock and supply SS316 corrugated metal hoses with SS304 braid in various combinations to meet your pressure and temperature requirements. Other stainless steel material combinations are available upon request. We can perform hydrostatic testing or pneumatic submersion tests or liquid penetrant inspection prior to shipping your stainless steel hoses. We also offer CSA/CGA, CRN and other types of hoses/certifications as well as certificates with full material traceability. Please see the Aerocom series 710 weld-on couplings with various threads and configurations (straight, 90 and 45º) in SS316L material.

SEE ALL METAL HOSE PRODUCTS
PRODUCTS FOR AEROSPACE INDUSTRY

Aerocom Specialty Fittings was founded 17 years ago based on its first major aerospace fluid connector and hose contract and has maintained the same customer-integrated mandate to this day. From the outset, Aerocom has excelled at becoming a trusted supplier for our aerospace clientele thanks to our perfect custom stocking program together with the correct product certifications.

Aerocom is proud to offer aerospace test fittings, designed specifically to help test sensitive aircraft frame and aircraft components. Made from stainless steel grade 316/316L, parts are stocked here at our Montreal location for quick shipping directly to test facilities.

Aerospace fluid connectors
Certified fittings and connectors for aerospace

Aerocom offers fluid connectors and adapters for the aerospace industry, both military and commercial, that address specific fluid connector challenges. Contact us for aerospace fittings standards: AN, AS, NAS, MS which conform to AS4841, AS4842, AS4842/1, AS4843/1, AS4843/2, AS4875, AS4875/1, AS4875/2 (as applicable). All documentation and certificates are controlled as per our AS9120 Quality System.

SEE ALL AEROSPACE FLUID CONNECTORS
Aerospace interconnect test adapters
The perfect interconnect solution for all aircraft ground support test equipment

Aerocom conversion adapters conform to all aerospace standards and can connect to commercial SAE J514 threads. What’s more, various custom fittings with aerospace threads can connect to common JIC/NPT threads for easy interface to pressure hoses for testing and maintenance at the ground support level. As per our ISO 9001 quality system procedures, our conversion adapters (or GSE adapters) are precision manufactured from solid SS316L material respecting aerospace thread specifications to better protect existing airframe flight parts.

SEE ALL AEROSPACE INTERCONNECT TEST ADAPTERS
OUR CLIENTS SAY:

Aerocom Team, I would like to thank You and Your whole team for the fast and professional job on the receiving, manufacturing, proofing, packaging, and returning the Aerocom Series ATSB6 hoses properly manufactured and tested (with the data) on time. It is absolutely a pleasure to work and do business with you. We will look forward to doing more business with you in the future.

Mark Stevens, Staff Design Engineer
NASA White Sands Test Facility

We are proud to have created a made-in Canada ventilator in record time with the help of over 130 Canadian suppliers like Aerocom. We are thankful for Aerocom’s support which has proven to be agile and essential in the development of the CAE Air1 ventilator. Thanks to collaborators like Aerocom, we are one step closer to saving the lives of patients treated for COVID-19 across the country.

Stéphane Roche, Vice President
CAE, Global Strategic Sourcing and Real Estate

Competitive, On-Time Metal Fabrication Supplier

Wal-Dor Industries supplies metal fabrication services for manufacturing, agriculture, and construction. We provide reliable, on-time solutions for millwrights and design-build contractors and directly to manufacturers. Whether your project is large or small, we are committed to understanding and exceeding your expectations every time.

Wal-Dor Industries has supplied metal fabrication solutions to millwrights and contractors for multi-million-dollar projects, including Toyota, Honda, and GM. We also supply metal fabrication directly to small manufacturing and agricultural operations. At Wal-Dor Industries, we care enough not to set a deadline that we know we can’t meet just to get the contract. We will make the success of your project our number one priority.

Discover Wal-Dor Industries
Comprehensive Custom Metal Fabrication Services

Wal-Dor Industries offers you a full range of custom metal fabrication services and products with expedited and standard delivery available.

Custom Metal Fabrication Solutions
Learn More
Custom Structural Steel and Bolt Assembly
Learn More
MIG and Tig Welding Services
Learn More
A VERS-A-BELT Dryer – Your Commercial Dehydration Solution

Since 1979, food, feed, fertilizer, and pet care producers worldwide have come to Wal-Dor Industries for commercial dehydration solutions. Our clients include small-to-medium commercial processors of agricultural, timber, post-consumer, and bio-waste materials. VERS-A-BELT Dryers preserve the integrity and quality of your raw material to produce the highest quality end-product.

Learn More
Wal-Dor Industries began with an innovative farmer
The legacy of Waldron and Doreen Eckstein

Steeped in agriculture, Waterloo Region has been known for centuries for its work ethic and innovation. Farm producers like Waldron and Doreen Eckstein developed innovative machines to process their raw materials. Other agricultural producers benefited from these innovations and new industries were born.

In 1979, Waldron founded Wal-Dor Industries to provide customized grain drying solutions. The company name reflects the lifelong partnership between himself and his wife Doreen, who died in 2017. Until his recent retirement, Waldron created VERS-A-BELT Dryer solutions for hundreds of clients in agriculture, forestry, and fishery. Waldron still checks in at Wal-Dor Industries to keep current on industry trends and the company’s latest custom dehydration projects.

Learn About Our History
Talk With Us Today

We provide competitive quotes on custom metal fabrication, structural steel, and welding services. Call us today at 519-662-2820 or contact us now to find out how we can provide the on-time solution you need.

ABOUT US
OMINECA

At Omineca Industrial we take our commitments seriously.

Located in Prince George, BC, Omineca Industrial (formerly Omineca Fabricating) is a fabrication, welding, machining, and industrial maintenance and construction services company with over twenty five years of experience delivering excellence in Western Canada and the United States. We are committed to supporting our clients to reach their project goals, whether that be custom fabrication, specialty parts machining, large scale turn-key industrial construction projects, or short-term trade coverage for mill and mine maintenance.

Safety is a core tenet of our company culture and business practices. For us, that means consistent dedication to the safety of our employees, our environment, and our partners through rigorous safety and testing procedures, strict environmental standards, and quality backed by certifications and expertise.

Our Commitment to Safety
More About Omineca Industrial
EXPLORE OUR SERVICES

CERTIFIED PERSONNEL

Omineca Industrial is committed to maintaining the highest quality standards in our work, supported by a diverse team of qualified and resilient tradespeople who possess the expertise and experience to tackle even your most challenging project needs. We are proud supporters of the Canadian Red Seal Program and actively engage with our employees to help them achieve their maximum potential through opportunities for mentorship and professional development.

FABRICATION

Our expansive welding and fabrication shop is CWB-certified to the requirements of CSA Standard W47.1 (fabrication, welding, and installation of Structural Steel), and CSA Standard W47.2 (fabrication, welding, and installation of Structural Aluminum) which makes us one of the only CWB-certified Structural Steel and Aluminum Welding shops in Prince George!

FULL SERVICE MACHINING

Our experienced machinists work with manual lathes, mills, and CNC machines to execute a variety of milling and turning capabilities. The machine shop supports our maintenance and construction divisions with precision manufacturing of custom parts and equipment. Additionally, the machine shop provides specialty parts and repairs for the drilling and exploration industries. Our machining division includes line boring & wear sleeve manufacturing which can be done in our shop or in the field.

CONSTRUCTION

Our industrial construction division undertakes projects of various size and complexity. Some of our projects are short-term equipment installs that are completed on a tight timeline while others are large, turn-key projects or facility upgrades requiring months of commitment. We plan and schedule strategically with our partners to reduce downtime and interruptions to their operations that might occur during the construction period.

FIELD MAINTENANCE

We work with our partners to address their regular and emergent maintenance needs. Our maintenance personnel provide shift coverage/relief, weekend maintenance, shutdowns, and breakdown maintenance. With our diversity of skilled tradespeople, Omineca Industrial is able to offer support in a variety of unique and challenging environments.

WOULD YOU LIKE TO DISCUSS YOUR NEXT PROJECT?

We are committed to expanding the services we offer to our partners. If you have a unique or specific requirement that is not addressed here, please contact us for further information.

Masters in manifold solutions

Multi Instruments Instrumentation focuses on supplying complete turnkey instrumentation solutions.

We are your “One stop solution provider” for instrument valves, manifolds, monoflanges, heated instrument enclosures and a wide range of accessories.

We are ready to assist you!

Contact
Masters in manifold solutions

In a market where workmanship, qualified personel, labour costs, time and/or cost savings are of the essence, Multi Instruments Instrumentation focuses on supplying complete instrumentation solutions, rather then selling single instrumentation components. Of course the market for manifolds is often considered a commodity one, resulting often in chaos on site, where a non-specialised contractor has to spend a lot of time and manpower to make heads or tails from all separate components, resulting in mistakes, wrong assembling, leakage, loss of parts and sometimes even dangerous or lethal and therefore costly failures. That is where the expertise and supply program of Multi Instruments Instrumentation comes to the rescue. No hassle on site, a “plug-and-play” solution delivered to the contractor/end-user, ready for installation, tagged, tested, well documented and assembled completely.

One stop global shopping

To be able to supply complete manifold solutions it is essential that all components within that solution are designed to match each other.That is where Multi Instruments Instrumentation differs from its competitors, as all products and parts used within instrumentation assemblies are engineered, produced and tested in-house, making it a perfect fit. This means that you only need to deal with one supplier to get a fully engineered and documented solution to your manifold problems, which makes procurement and expediting a lot more efficient. You’ll only deal with the best partner in the manifold solution business. A partner that is globally qualified for the job, having the European ISO9001, PED and ATEX certifications, the Russian GOST-R and Application Permits and CSA explosion proof certification for the USA and Canadian market.

Magest Since 1990

The Magest history is one that spans over 25 years in the construction industry. We specialize in project management, the use of cold formed steel, offsite manufacturing and we offer the highest quality products and services.

Superior strength, calculated savings

Structural cold formed steel wall panels provide mid-rise projects with a cost-effective solution for their structure. Through Magest’s experience, we can afford owners the ability to entrust their project’s structure to our team for a quick and economical installation time using our cold formed steel wall panels and a variety of floor solutions.

Learn More

 

Revolutionize construction using a new standard; cold formed steel.

Our builder-first mentality provides our customers with peace of mind knowing that we understand their business & we offer the highest quality products & services.

 

Brock Martin, President

 
Complete Building Structure

Through Magest’s 30+ years of experience in the construction industry, our previous life as a general contractor gives us the unique ability to manage our customer’s projects structural needs.

Load Bearing Cold Formed Steel Wall Panels

MBSL can manufacture both load bearing and non-load bearing cold formed steel wall panels uniquely designed to each projects specifications. Our experienced staff can work through the most complex of designs to achieve economical and practical framing solutions, paired with our on-site experience in the construction industry.

Learn More

Hollowcore

As part of Magest’s service to our clients, we can either manufacture a cold formed steel flow option, or provide a myriad of other floor systems through our industry partners to create an efficient and economical solution for our clients. Utilizing Hollowcore Concrete, Bar-Joist Floor Systems, Cold Formed Steel Truss Systems and Cold Formed Steel Deck are all within MBSL’s comfort and ability to execute for our clients.

Learn More

Roof Systems

MBSL can supply multiple roof system types ranging from a continuation of the floor on a project. For example, Hollowcore, Bar-Joist, Steel Deck with Concrete, OR Magest can manufacture, supply and install steel roof trusses in either a flat configuration or pitched to match a project’s design.
