Safe & Sound, Every Time
Speak with a specialist today!
Bank-grade safes for your home & business
COMMERCIAL SAFES

Safes for every office and any business: documents safekeeping, cash deposits drop-boxes for crowded stores and restaurants, drugs and medicine safes for pharmacies and labs. Customization is available!

GUN SAFES

Ensure responsible storage of your firearms. INKAS® Safes offer highest-level protection of your weapons – from being stolen or get into hands of household members.

RESIDENTIAL SAFES

High-level security home safes for any purpose: store your documents, cash, jewelry and other household valuables. Our safes are burglary rated & fire-resistant.

VAULT DOORS

Create a safe-room in your business or your home by installing impenetrable vault door. INKAS® Safes offer solid vaults for commercial properties or special modular vault doors for residential houses.

SAFES BUILT FOR REAL SECURITY

Unlike safes from big box stores, INKAS® Safes keep your valuables in place and offer true protection from theft, fire, and flood. They are engineered for security and rigorously tested to ensure they can’t be pried, unscrewed, drilled or cut open. Our smart locking systems ensure that the lock can’t be manipulated or tricked in order to prevent tampering. Additionally, INKAS® Safes are so heavy that they cannot be carried out of your building. Once installed, INKAS® Safes cannot be broken into or removed from your premises – ensuring the highest level of security for your irreplaceable valuables.

THE GOLD STANDARD IN SAFE MANUFACTURING

Renowned for their toughness and durability, INKAS® safes have undergone stringent third-party testing and are certified to the highest industry standards to ensure protection against theft, fire, and flood.

Our industry-leading safes are:

Proven to withstand extreme heat, at levels that exceed industry standards for fire-resistance
Rigorously tested to ensure our proprietary composite materials can successfully withstand prying, drilling, punching, and other brute force attempts
Expertly tested to ensure that all locks and hinges are tamper-proof
PROTECTION YOU CAN TRUST

Not all safes are made equally. Typical store-bought safes give you a false sense of security, and do not provide an adequate level of protection. INKAS® Safes offers the standard in protection to outlast disaster and secure your valuables in any circumstance. INKAS® Safes stands behind our products to guarantee protection, and our safes are covered by our workmanship warranty.

About All Metal Manufacturing
Our Story

Founded in 1997, All Metal Manufacturing offers exceptional steel fabrication services throughout Calgary and Western Canada. From concept, through production, to finished product delivery, we pride ourselves on providing outstanding quality metal products and service to our valued customers. We proudly serve a variety of industries including Oil and Gas, Construction and Architecture, Hydrovac and Vacuum Truck Manufacturers, Truck/Transport Manufacturers, and many more.

About Us
Services

What We Offer

Fabrication, Welding, and Finishing

Custom Solutions

We provide an extensive selection of machines designed to effectively meet and accommodate your specific manufacturing needs. Our variety ensures that you can find the perfect fit for your production requirements. Also, our welding expertise guarantees strong and durable metal joints for a wide range of applications. We combine skillful techniques with modern equipment to deliver precise, reliable welding solutions. Finally, the finishing touches on metal products can make all the difference. We offer a variety of finishing services to enhance the appearance and durability of metal components, ensuring a polished and professional end result. All Metal also offers several other additional services to help you get the results you are looking for, check the full page to learn more.

Learn More
Products & Partnerships

Quality Hydrovac Innovations

All Metal Manufacturing has designed our own line of hydrovac booms and boom components that are both high quality, and competitively priced. Known throughout North America and featured on trucks from a range of companies, our booms are fabricated with ensuring impressive product quality kept first in mind. From individual component sales, to full truck and trailer manufacturing, All Metal has you covered. Additionally, with our extensive time in the industry we have been able to create partnerships to provide you with quality hydrovac products, and give you the best experience we possibly can working with us.

Trusted Lawn Sprinklers and Drip Irrigation Systems in Toronto

EZ Lawn Sprinklers is one of the oldest and best sprinkler companies in Toronto. We are your destination if you’re looking for lawn irrigation system products and services that go beyond your expectations. We don’t only provide you with top-notch irrigation systems services, installation or repair, we offer you satisfaction-guaranteed work that will last years — and with a fitting warranty!


EZ Lawn Sprinklers — Serving the GTA & Surrounding Areas for Over 35 Years

EZ Lawn Sprinklers started with the goal of providing quality products to our customers along with excellent customer service. We take pride in our collaborative approach when it comes to your watering needs and knowing that no question goes unanswered. We believe in working together with you to nourish your lawn and garden while being able to conserve water at the same time.

Easy-to-Use Sprinkler Systems

Once you learn the ins and outs of the system, your lawn maintenance will seem like it is on autopilot and you will be wondering why you didn’t call us years ago. With our system, your lawn and gardens are always kept healthy without having to spend too much time and effort worrying about it.

Tailor-Fit Solutions for Your Lawn

Size Matters

Our core business is residential properties ranging from a few hundred square feet to ones over an acre. A lawn sprinkler or irrigation system for your property has to be specific to the size of your property, the sun it receives, the type of plant material and the amount of water pressure you have.

Strategic Design

We design our systems to water the grass separately from the gardens and this is done by separating the system into various zones and by choosing the correct head for each area. Controlled by a fully automatic timer that is WIFI compatible, your system will eliminate the guessing of when to and how much water your lawn and garden require. An optional rain sensor will override the system in case of rain.

A Lawn Sprinkler Company for All

We also service various commercial properties, condo buildings, strip malls, and places of worship.

What You Can Expect From Our Toronto Lawn Sprinkler and Irrigation System Services

5 Year Warranty

The standard warranty is 3 years. We, however, offer a 5-year warranty, which is longer than any of that offered by our competitors.

No Deposit

We don’t ask you for a deposit. You pay upon completion.

Guidance

For your reference, we will leave you with a package with descriptions regarding the components and their descriptions, uses, and maintenance requirements.

No Upselling

We won’t sell you things you don’t need.

FAQs

Is a sprinkler system better than watering by hand?

Yes, sprinkler systems save time, water, and deliver consistent coverage.

How often should I water my lawn with a sprinkler system?

Frequency depends on weather, soil, and grass type. Twice a week in most cases, but adjust based on rainfall.

What’s the best time to water my lawn with a sprinkler system?

Early morning (4 am to 6 am) minimizes evaporation.

How much does a sprinkler system cost?

Average cost varies, but expect a few hundred to a thousand dollars depending on size and complexity.

Can I install a sprinkler system myself?

DIY systems exist, but professional installation ensures proper coverage and avoids buried utility line damage.

ABOUT US

Altyp Welding & Fabricating (1983) LTD. is a privately owned Canadian Corporation based in Edmonton, Alberta and has been serving all branches of industry since 1970. Altyp provides reliable machining and welding services for pressure piping, stainless steel, aluminum and custom fabrication applications.

Being owned by people who live in the Edmonton area, Altyp is aware of the great community that it is a part of, and therefore values both the connections it has made in Edmonton over the years and the possibility of making new business and community connections for the years to come.

The staff at Altyp are customer oriented so that you know that you will always get the best service and top quality products. Because of this focus we maintain a qualified – and competent – staff to deliver exactly what you need.

Mission Statement

Altyp Welding is committed to producing the highest quality metal products with superior workmanship while providing exceptional customer service.

Our Facilities
Administration office – 1200 sq. ft.
Covered storage yard – 4200 sq. ft.
Two shop bays – 9400 sq. ft.
Both bays are services by 5 ton overhead bridge cranes.
Bay one is equipped with a full line of modern welding and production equipment, including welding machines, both standard power source and semi-automatic, pipe rotators, radiographs, camograph, oxygen acetylene cutting, plasma cutting, gouging equipment, auto bar feed horizontal band saw and metal ironworker.
Bay two is a modern machine shop, equipped with CNC lathes, engine lathes, CNC milling machine, drill presses, and hydraulic shop presses with a 150 ton capacity.

Atlas Industries is an industry leader in custom forming, plate work, fabrication, and machining services. Atlas was founded in 1974 on the principles of hard work and integrity above profit, quickly gaining a reputation for being the go-to company across various industries for the most challenging jobs. That reputation has continued over several decades, and today our customers still seek our expertise on how to solve their biggest industry challenges.

Capability
Design

Black Box Manufacturing designs and manufactures your enclosure system to your needs. All our products meet the necessary Codes and Standard for the National Building Code and Provincial Codes applicable. When needed, we can provide Engineering support using 3rd Party Engineering.

Manufacturing

 Black Box Manufacturing builds in-house using a team of light gauge welders, metal fabricators, and electricians. Keeping manufacturing in-house using our own team allows for tight controls of the product workmanship. This allows you to know your product is being built to the highest standards.

Integration

Whether your project calls for a Small POS system or a large Transformer, Black Box Manufacturing will work with your team to integrate your control components at our facility. This saves you the hassle of finding an integrator to complete your project.

Project Management

Project management is handled in-house and overseen by the owner. Black Box Manufacturing follows proven PMP theory, which strictly controls all internal processes and inspects the products as they are being produced. 

Quality Control

Your product will come with a written record of the inspections done, who they were done by, drawings they relate to, and standards they abide by.  Black Box Manufacturing also offers 3rd party testing for Controls Equipment you may need to be installed. 

Transport

Through local transportation specialists,  Black Box Manufacturing can help you organize, pack, and deliver your unit to almost any location.

Bhogal stands out as a leader in laser cutting and welding services. Design

Welding

Trust Bhogal for flawless welding solutions. Our skilled welders ensure durable and reliable connections, contributing to the strength and integrity of your metal structures.

CNC Punching

Precision meets efficiency with our CNC punching service, where intricate patterns and holes are created with speed and accuracy, ensuring a flawless end result.

CNC Machining

For precise and intricate metal parts, our CNC machining service delivers exceptional results. Experience top-tier accuracy and efficiency in every piece we produce.

Sheet Rolling

Achieve perfect curvature and form with our sheet rolling service, where metal sheets are expertly shaped to meet your specifications, ensuring structural integrity and visual appeal.

Customer Satisfaction

We focus on meeting and exceeding the expectations of our clients, delivering top-quality, dependable, and precise results in every project.

Innovation

By embracing cutting-edge manufacturing technologies, we ensure that we remain leaders in the industry and stay ahead of the competition.

Quality Excellence:

Delivering superior products and services is our standard. You can trust us to get it right the first time, every time.

Collaborative Teamwork

 we work together from concept to completion, ensuring every project is executed with precision and expertise.

Custom Products is our Specialty
Design

From idea to finished product – our team will help you to design from scratch and make any quick adjustments as necessary throughout the project’s cycle.

Consulting

Our engineering team will work directly with you or with specifying engineer, consultant, contractor or other person involved in your project.

Manufacturing

Vertical integration allows BDS to manufacture required parts locally or overseas depending on project’s requirements and objections.

Sourcing

When project requires some or all components to be sourced from other suppliers our team of experienced buyers will help you to get them on-time and under budget.

Import / Export

BDS is a registered Importer / Exporter. We can quickly move small and large packages across countries while helping you to cut associated costs.

Delivery

We offer product deliveries directly to site by our drivers, via your preferred couriers or other 3rd parties, if needed.

Installation

Team of certified industry professionals will install all parts at your site, if such service is required.

Customer Service

Happy and satisfied customer is our priority. We strive to deliver exceptional and personalized service from the very first moment you connect with BDS.

Deal Direct

BDS currently does not have sales exclusivity assigned to any resellers. All our services are available DIRECT to you, through your preferred Contractor or Distributor.

Critter Spray Gun

Critter Spray Gun is a lightweight, easy to use spray gun for many small to medium size projects around the house or shop. The 118 Siphon Gun is ideal for spraying polyurethanes, lacquers, stains, chalk paints, latex, enamels, alkyds, ceramic glazes, and even spray grade upholstery adhesives. Some material thinning may be required. Requires a ¾ hp compressor (not included) that can produce 2 – 3 CFM (cubic feet per minute). The 118 Siphon Gun produces a 1/2″ to 3″circular spray pattern depending on the distance held from object spraying. Clean up is easy as a result of the simple design and utilization of mason jars for paint storage

How to Use

The 118 Siphon Gun by Critter Spray Products is easy to use. Start by pouring the material to be sprayed into the mason jar and secure to gun (some thinning may be required). Connect the gun to a ¾ hp or larger air compressor (not included). Pull the trigger and adjust the liquid nozzle position into the air stream to obtain the optimal circular spray pattern. Trial the spray pattern and paint transfer on a scrap piece of cardboard. Make adjustments to air pressure, liquid nozzle position and material viscosity as necessary. When ready to spray your projects, hold spray gun approximately 5” away from surface to be painted. Pull the trigger and move across surface to be painted at a constant travel speed. Overlap each pass to obtain uniform coverage.

 

EASY TO USE

 

EASY TO CLEAN

Empty paint from jar, add a couple onces of thinners, remount jar to gun, splash thinners around and spray through nozzle, dissassemble, wipe down indicated surfaces and reassemble for the next use

FEATURES
Light weight – comfortable design
Standard 16oz mason jar

Requires a 3/4 hp or larger compressor that produces 2 -3 Cubic Feet/Minute (CFM )
Fast colour change when utilizing mason jars

Adaptable to other containers

Sprays: Paints, Stains, Polyurethanes, Foam & Fabric Adhesives and Ceramic Glazes

PROJECTS
Freshen up that wicker furniture with a quick coat of latex enamel paint
This live edge bench was brought to life with several coats of a fast dry polyurethane
Used in the upholstery industry over 30 years spraying Foam and Fabric adhesives
Ideal for applying ceramic and pottery glazes
Finishing with chalk paint is a popular way to bring that old furniture back to life. The 118 Siphon Gun is a great tool to quickly apply a brush stroke free base.
Oil Based Rust Paint is being applied to this weathered yard trailer that was in need of a little attention.
Shutters can take a lot of time to finish using a brush. The 118 Siphon will do a beautiful job in a fraction of the time - without the brush marks.
Beautiful polyrethane and lacquer finishes can be applied with professional results. No brush marks to spoil your efforts either.
These are great projects, you can save time finishing when using the 118 Siphon whether you are staining or painting
Whether it is Chalk, Rust or High Temperature BBQ paint it takes very little time to revitalize antiques like this old metal milk can with a beautiful brush free finish.

Shown here is a oil based polyurethane finish being applied to this bench. Take note of the metal can used rather than the glass mason jar. A small paint can was drilled out and screwed onto the bottom of the gun.
FAQ’S (CRITTERS SPRAY PRODUCTS)
These are some of the most commonly asked questions:

What is the spray pattern?

the 118 Sihon gun produces a circular spray pattern in size from 1/2″ to 3″ diameter
depending on the adjustment of the position of the tip of the liquid nozzle in the air stream. The closer to the surface you spray the narrower the spray pattern is. The further away from the surface you are spraying i.e. 4 to 6 inches, the larger the circular spray pattern is on the work surface.

Where can I get individual replacement parts?

follow this link to our distributor that carries many of the replacement parts individually https://www.highlandwoodworking.com/critter-spray-guns.aspx

Won’t connect to my hose

The quick connect plug is a “M” style 1/8″NPT threaded plug. It is one of the most commonly used air hose connectors supplied on retail air tools. If your air tools are equipped with a different style of plug then you will need to purchase and install a 1’8″ NPT to 1/4″ NPS union to connect your style of quick connect plug to the 118 Siphon Gun.

Won’t spray

Check out the 118 Siphon Gun Setup video on this site for tips on how to remedy this issue These are the top issues that our customers encounter:

1) Plugged vent hole in top of jar – clean vent hole so jar can breath
2) Tube is plugged with solids or dried up material – pass pipe cleaner or bbq skewer through tube as shown in video
3) Liquid nozzle is plugged with solid or dried up material – clean out material in nozzle with paper clip
4) tip of liquid nozzle is not positioned in the middle of the air stream of air nozzle – adjust as indicated in video
5) material is too thick and needs to be thinned – thin material and increase pressure (not all materials can be atomized
well enough to spray)

 

 

Won’t stop spraying:

This can be caused by the air valve disc not sealing or a dry o-ring restricting movement of the air valve when the trigger is depressed. The first remedy is to apply a drop of oil on the air valve behind the trigger and depress the trigger back and forth to lubricate oil along the valve stem and into the oring just inside the casting. Also, excessive moisture from the compressor can migrate down the air lines, into the gun and corrode the air valve retaing washer. If this is the case you may need to replace the retaining washer on the air valve. Contact us via email at sale@crittersprayproducts.ca to resolve this issue.

Can the 118 siphon gun spray upholstery adhesives?

This spray gun has been used in the professional upholstery trade for over 40 years spraying both solvent based and water based spray grade upholstery adhesives. Don’t be fooled by imitations the our name is cast on the handle so you know you have the original 118 Siphon Gun from Critter Spray Products.

Can the 118 siphon gun spray Ceramic Glazes?

This spray gun is sold by many ceramic and pottery supply distributors to apply glazes.

Global Leader in Fluid Power Safety
Pneumatic, Hydraulic, and Electrical
Pneumatic and Hydraulic Safety Services and Training

Machine Safety Services include Conformity Audits, Lockout Audits, APM Audits, Risk Assessments, Safety Mitigation Plan Development, and Validation of Safety Systems.

Electrical Safety

The Electro-Guard Plus remote alternative lockout systems streamline operator Lockout/Tagout procedures and safely isolate hazardous electrical, pneumatic, and hydraulic energy for zones, machines, or processes to ensure secure access. Dual-channel low-voltage safety switches can be locked to provide alternative lockout and conveniently placed in various locations throughout the hazardous area, forming a single-point lockout system. Additionally, e L-O-X Energy Isolation Devices offer local electrical energy isolation and verification. You can be confident ROSS will always meet your electrical safety requirements.

Hydraulic Safety

Hydraulic systems pose potential hazards due to their high operating power. For increased hydraulic safety and reliability in production tasks requiring safe access, hydraulic safety valves like block and bleed or block and stop valves can be utilized. ROSS offers a variety of functions, including redundant 3/2 hydraulic safety valve systems designed for safe block & bleed, safe block & stop, and dual safe block & stop applications. Trust ROSS for all your hydraulic safety requirements.

Pneumatic Safety

The ROSS pneumatic safety valves are advanced valves specifically designed to regulate fluid power energy in accordance with contemporary safety guidelines for control reliability. These valves facilitate the removal, supply, and trapping of energy to ensure the utmost pneumatic safety in operations. The functions of ROSS pneumatic safety valves encompass lockout/energy isolation, safe exhaust, safe air entry, safe return, safe control and stop, and safe load holding. Additionally, we offer engineered pneumatic safety solutions suitable for application in explosion-proof and intrinsically safe hazardous areas.

Customer Defined Application Solutions with ROSS/FLEX®

When you need the function of a standard product in a different package, ROSS/FLEX® is the answer. We’ll work directly with your engineering team to design the optimum solution, and then by repackaging the existing internal parts of our standard products, we eliminate the need for life-cycle testing. Our ROSS/FLEX® solutions are built to reduce costs, improve productivity, and provide a unique solution that is manufactured to your requirements but is developed in days, rather than weeks or months.

About Global Metal and Iron Inc.

Global Metals and Iron Inc. is a full waste management solution in Toronto & Mississauga. We purchase scrap metals from both commercial clients and general public. Our scrap car removal services will help you get rid of your old unwanted, scrap or damaged car. We purchase non-ferrous metals by the pound and ferrous metals by the ton and pound. We collect, buy and upgrade all kinds of non-ferrous and ferrous scrap metals and catalytic converters for resale purposes.
In Toronto and Mississauga, we have built a solid reputation for providing friendly and quick metals recycling service along with great pricing. Our knowledgeable staff strives to exceed expectations. We have special equipment to offer our customers with quick and efficient loading, processing and delivery of their metal. Our computerized point of scale management system and testing equipment ensure that all the materials are properly graded and priced. We consistently monitor the local and international markets to offer fair and honest value for our customers’ metals.

Providing Customers A Top Notch Line Of Production And Special Order Hinges Like No Other. Contact Us Now

Scissor Doors Inc. is the leading global manufacturer of all types of hinge door systems for vehicles. The company’s journey started over a decade ago as a designer and manufacturer of custom hinge applications for a wide variety of industrial applications. Scissor Doors is known for its tradition of designing, building, and testing of state of the art hinge systems that are also custom made upon special request. We operate with a long term vision of offering the finest range of custom hinge technologies available in today’s market. At present, we are we are the most renowned manufacturer in the worldwide market for bolts on specialty suicide doors, lambo doors, and different hinge applications, including custom one off/military grade.

Lambo Doors
Lifetime warranty and require NO modifications

Lambo doors have always been one of our major areas of specialization. We manufacture direct weld on and bolt on lambo door hinges for vehicles belonging to more than 750 makes and models. Our lambo door hinges are the most preferred choice in the market because they open much further in both directions comparing to others in the market. Our state of the engineering ensures that our lambo door hinges never come out of its adjustment. These hinges never move or sag over a period of time. To ensure rigid and sturdy conversion for your vehicle, we only use 6061 billet aluminum or thick high carbon steel to manufacture bolt on lambo door hinges.

Suicide Doors
Quality built product that will last a lifetime

We are proud to be the only manufacturer in the market that manufactures unique suicide doors for all types of vehicles. Instead of offering an universal fit design, our suicide door conversions are designed keeping each specific vehicle into consideration. To ensure quality built and long life, our suicide door hinges are only manufactured using at least ½ inch thick steel and 5/8 inch thick aluminum. In addition to traditional 90 degree suicide doors, we also manufacture top quality, 180 degree suicide doors. These 180 degree hinges allow users the freedom of opening their doors fully in a way that keeps them parallel to the vehicle’s body. Our specially designed zero flex hinges are tailor-made for daily driven vehicles.

Gull Wing ZLR Doors
Specifically designed to work on your unique vehicle

Our world class Gull Wing doors hinges are yet another specialty of Scissor Doors Inc. Our Gull Wing Door kits can be lifted straight up by 180 degrees to ensure they are perpendicular to the ground. We provide a lifetime warranty on all our door conversions. Instead of fixed point fittings, we use dual pivot end fittings for gas lift supports so that the lifespan of the shocks are extended.

Shaved Doors
Kits come with two remote key fobs for activation

We also have shaved door kits of the highest quality for over 1000 vehicle makes and models. These are designed to be easily upgradable and compatible with your existing OEM key fobs and car alarms. Our shaved door kits are manufactured from heavy duty solenoids to ensure extraordinary durability. No matter how complex your hinge door systems related requirements are, contact us for the best in the market.

FRONTIER CONSTRUCTION PRODUCTS LTD.

Frontier Construction Products Ltd. is the preferred supplier to many of the top companies in the Western Canadian construction industry. With over 50 years of management experience in the drainage and fabrication industry, in addition to our unrelenting focus on providing superior products with exceptional service and unbiased expertise, you’ll be in good hands every step of the way.

Our ProductsContact Us
ABOUT FRONTIER CONSTRUCTION PRODUCTS LTD.

As specialists in the Western Canadian market, we are uniquely positioned to provide versatile, cost-effective solutions to the challenges posed by tight budgets and stringent timelines common in our market. Frontier’s modern equipment and knowledgeable staff work in sync to ensure that your products meet the stringent CSA G401 specification.

This flexibility and dedication to ongoing excellence has resulted in our preferred supplier status with a wide range of clients in the municipal, civil, forestry and oilfield roadbuilding industries.

Whether your requirement is standard or custom, we would be pleased to be of service to you.

From our strategically located manufacturing facility in Thorsby, Alberta, we are able to ship to your location or job site on short notice via our dedicated delivery service, always on standby for urgent shipments throughout Alberta. In addition, we have also partnered with several leading freight companies to ensure the best combination of flexible and efficient delivery options throughout the western provinces. You can rest assured that your product will be delivered safely and on time, every time!

OUR PRODUCTS
CORRUGATED STEEL PIPE (CSP)

Corrugated steel pipe is the correct choice for a wide range of drainage and pass-through applications. Typical applications include roads, underpasses, conduits, caissons, cisterns, wells, and small bridges. Steel culverts are popular because they are lightweight, low cost, and are easy to install. They can be cut to your required length and can also be bevelled to conform to the roadside slope.

We offer CSP in diameters ranging from 150mm-3600mm and lengths suited to your needs. In addition to diameter and length, we offer three additional customization options (thickness, profile and coating type) to perfectly suit your application/requirements.

Customization Options
CSP COUPLERS

Annular couplers come in two widths – single wide (1 foot) and double-wide (2 foot) and are used to attach culverts with re-corrugated ends. Dimpled couplers are also available in the single wide and double wide options and are best suited for culverts that have been cut to length in the field.

GEOFABRICS

Geofabrics and related products are widely accepted as essential support for many civil engineering applications to filter, stabilize, reinforce, separate, drain and isolate soils, erosion or contamination. In many cases, geotextiles replace or reduce the need to use natural aggregate construction materials providing both economic and environmental benefits.

We can provide comprehensive products and support to fulfill all of your geotextile requirements, from wovens and non-wovens to geogrid, straw blankets, and silt fence.

GUARDRAILS

Guardrails are used to minimize accident severity, personal injuries, and property damage by helping to keep vehicles on the road in the event of loss of control and/or collision. We supply standard W-Beam and Thrie Beam guardrail, in addition to a wide variety of related accessories to meet your job requirements. These materials meet AASHTO M180 and CSA G164 specifications. This product can be customized to fit any application, including those which require concave and convex designs.

READY TO GET STARTED?

Use any of our contact methods to get started with Frontier Construction Products Ltd. for your construction needs in Western Canada.

Contact Us
OUR SERVICES
UNBIASED ADVICE

Leveraging over 50 years of management experience in the drainage and fabrication industry in Western Canada, we are uniquely qualified and capable of understanding the specific circumstances and conditions present throughout our market, allowing us to react promptly and professionally, each and every time.

DELIVERY SERVICE

From our strategically located manufacturing facility in Thorsby, Alberta, we are able to ship to your location or job site on short notice via our dedicated delivery service, always on standby for urgent shipments throughout Alberta.

CUSTOMER SERVICE

As a family-run business, we have built strong long-term business relationships based on honesty and equitable business practices. We strive each day to provide a more personal, yet extremely professional approach to quickly and effectively analyzing our customer’s needs. We pride ourselves on being able to react to situations quickly and effectively, solving problems without the burden of “red tape” so common in larger organizations, helping us to maintain a consistently high standard of customer service and timely product delivery.

CUSTOMER FABRICATION

Our shop will fabricate custom fittings to meet the specific requirements of your project, including elbows, wyes, tees, reducers, saddles, manhole risers and fish baffles. Send us your drawings or requirements, and leave the rest up to us!

ABOUT ANS
Amazing Neon Signs

Amazing Neon Lights is a top provider of high-quality neon signs in the USA. From custom designs to ready-to-hang pieces, we offer a wide selection to suit every need. Our signs are crafted with premium materials, built to last, and come with a 12 months warranty.

We take pride in delivering exceptional customer service and work closely with clients to create designs that leave a lasting impression. With various mounting options and a commitment to excellence, Amazing Neon Lights is your go-to choice for neon signs.

Contact us today for a free quote and let us brighten your space!

WHY ARE NEON SIGNS USED?
Amazing Neon Signs

Neon lights are versatile and impactful, known for their bright colors and vibrant glow. They create excitement, attract attention, and add personality to spaces, making them ideal for businesses like bars, restaurants, and nightclubs. Their eye-catching design also makes them perfect for advertising and signage.

Neon lights evoke nostalgia with their retro appeal, popularized in the 1950s and 1960s, and are a favorite for creating vintage atmospheres. Durable and stylish, neon lights are a lasting choice for adding energy and charm to any space.

Family owned and operated
Personalized and Engraved Handmade Pewter Home Décor Gifts

Hampshire Pewter is a family-owned and operated business based in Somersworth, North Hampshire. We are your one-stop shop for handmade pewter home décor ornaments and collectibles. You will find it here whether you are looking for handcrafted Christmas ornaments, wine glasses, candle holders, oil lamps, baby gifts, or something completely different.

Made from locally sourced materials, all of our hand-cast pewter gifts come with our full guarantee. This is more than just a business for us; it is something we are truly passionate about. We are always looking to not only meet but exceed our customers' expectations.

HAND CAST PEWTER: ONLY COMPANY IN NORTH AMERICA

MADE IN THE USA PRODUCTS

SHOP NOW
Handmade Pewter – Made in the USA

We pride ourselves on being the only North American company still using the same centuries-old hand-casting method for our pewter hollowware. Every piece, from toddler and baby cups to water goblets and wine glasses, candle holders, and beer steins, is made individually, one at a time, from bronze in molds. The doors of our workshop first opened in 1974, and from there, we have continued to design and make our molds and pewter gifts.

FEATURED PRODUCTS
OUR LOCATIONS
Visit Our Locations for Handmade Pewter Ornaments and Pewter Collectables

We currently have a workshop and gift store at our original location, Hampshire Pewter, at Barclay Square in Somersworth, and a gift store in Wolfeboro. You can order online, but visiting one of these stores lets you see some of our work up close and in person.

WORKSHOP AND GIFT STORE

Hampshire Pewter At Barclay Square
350 Route 108, Unit 201
Somersworth, NH 03878

OPEN MONDAY - FRIDAY 10 AM to 4 PM

CLOSED SATURDAY & SUNDAY

GIFT STORE IN WOLFEBORO

Hampshire Pewter
9 Railroad Ave

CLOSED FOR SEASON - REOPEN IN SPRING 2025


Handcrafted Christmas Ornaments

One of our specialties here at Hampshire Pewter is our beautiful Christmas ornaments. These pewter ornaments are ideal decorations and home décor gifts during Christmas. With a two-sided detailed design, most can be engraved with names, dates, memories, or messages personal to you or the gift recipient. Check out our collection of Christmas gifts here.

Pewter Baby Gifts

The birth of a child is a beautiful and monumental event for everyone involved, but especially for the newborn's parents. At Hampshire Pewter, we also design and hand-cast various baby gifts in bronze. These can range from engraved candle holders to practical items like spoons, drinking cups, picture frames, and different ornaments.

Wedding and Anniversary Pewter Ornaments

Celebrate the big day of a couple you love with pewter ornaments hand-cast by our team of professionals, who are fully trained and experienced in the ancient art form. Rather than using modern practices, we still work on each item individually, creating old-fashioned casts. You can have a special message engraved into any of our pewter gifts for the couple in question, like the date of their big day, a vital quote phrase, or your best wishes and love.

Pewter Collectables and Jewelry

We also design and hand craft personalized jewelry and other accessories like bracelets, charms, purse mirrors, and keychains. Whether for a spouse, relative, or friend, we have beautiful and unique pewter gifts for everyone. Treat someone special today with a truly remarkable gift they won’t forget.

Glass Railings: Today, home owners and builders in Vancouver, BC love to use glass railings for not only their elegant design but for their customization abilities as well. AM Precision is one of Southern Ontario’s premiere custom machine shops. It is hosted in a 10,000 sq. ft. building in St. George, Ontario.
We are a proud company that takes every job seriously. Equipped with state-of-the-art machinery, we provide a machining service second to none. We produce quality parts for a variety of industries, from proto type to production runs, and our quality and delivery record is 99.7%.

CROSS CONTROLS INC. VALVE, ACTUATOR, INSTRUMENTATION, STRAINER, PUMP & COMPRESSOR SUPPLIER
SERVING CANADA & USA WITH HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS

Cross Controls Inc. Is a service-oriented company, we pride ourselves on our “customer-first” attitude. As a privately owned company, Cross Controls can offer personalized service to meet your needs and be flexible when those needs change. Our strength is in our service – getting orders right the first time and making sure we’re responsive to the requests you’re most likely to make. We pride ourselves with a organization that can make decisions quickly and efficiently.

INDUSTRIES SERVED

We provide quality products and services to a broad spectrum of industrial, refining, oil field, energy, pharmaceutical, pulp and paper, and food processing concerns across Canada. Whether you are handling projects or day-to-day maintenance, we are sure to have the material you need to get the job done efficiently.

DEPENDABLE SERVICE, COST-EFFECTIVE PRODUCTS

We provide a full range of Ball, Buttterfly, Check, Gate, Globe, Knife Gate, Plug, Pressure Relief, Safety Relief and Specialty valves. We provide Pneumatic, Electric and Hydraulic actuation direct acting and fail safe, along with accessories. (ie: Solenoids, Limit Switches and Positioners) We provide a wide range of Instrumentation for analyzing and measuring flow, pressure and temperature requirements. We provide Basket, Wye, Duplex, Temporary and Fabricated Strainers. We provide Sump. Drain, Condensate, Utility, Effluent, Sewage and Grinder Pumps
We provide Portable, Gas, Single-Stage, Two-Stage, and Rotary Compressors.

WHO WE ARE

Based in Lethbridge, Alberta, C4 Fabricating Inc. is Southern Alberta's Premier Custom Metal Fabrication Shop.

We are proud to provide over 37 Years of Trade Experience and Boast Red Seal Certification for Service throughout Canada. 

HAPPY CUSTOMERS

Brent and his team at C4 Fabricating provide a one of a kind ‘solution shop’. We have been using their services for years. C4F give all of our technicians prompt and personalized service that is expected, but rarely found elsewhere. Often we have unique one of a kind issues that need to be solved and more times than not, it is the collaborative approach and attention to detail that we receive at C4F that results in our technicians leaving with refined designs and improved products for our customers.

Whether it is a small last minute emergency or an everyday problem, we have come to rely on C4F for our fabricating needs.

C4F delivers…. Period.

Mike Whiting, Gateway Mechanical Services

We have been working with C4 for a few years now and they have been an excellent fab shop to work with since day 1. The staff have creative designs and truly work for their customers needs. 5 Stars *****!!!

Dan DeBona, Banditos Incorporated  

Having C4 has been an asset to our success out in the field. From the daily odds and ends to the specialty requests, you guys are sure appreciated! Thank you!

Dave Mathieu, Southwest Design & Construction
